hypothesis: Le sida est principalement dû à des saignements, généralement gastro-intestinaux, tandis que le fid est lié au syndrome inflammatoire.

source: Furthermore, C-reactive protein levels are high, and there is non-regenerative non-macrocytic anemia.
hypothesis: En outre, les taux de protéine c-réactive sont élevés et il existe une anémie non macrocytaire non régénérative.

source: FID is characterized by elevated serum ferritin, normal or low TS, and normal sTfR levels.
hypothesis: Le fid est caractérisé par des taux élevés de ferritine sérique, des taux de ts normaux ou faibles, et des taux normaux de stfr.

source: Iron deficiency (ID) is characterized by a deficit in circulating iron.
hypothesis: La carence en fer (id) est caractérisée par un déficit en fer circulant.

source: AID is characterized by low serum ferritin and transferrin saturation (TS).
hypothesis: L'aid se caractérise par une faible saturation de la ferritine et de la transferrine sériques (ts).

source: Iron is a major mineral in the human body.
hypothesis: Le fer est un minéral majeur du corps humain.

source: It participates in various metabolisms, including oxygen transport in hemoglobin.
hypothesis: Il intervient dans divers métabolismes, y compris le transport de l' oxygène dans l' hémoglobine.

source: Hypochromic microcytic anemia is frequent.
hypothesis: L'anémie microcytaire hypochrome est fréquente.

source: New biological tests (serum hepcidin) may be useful in case of doubt.
hypothesis: De nouveaux tests biologiques (hepcidine sérique) peuvent être utiles en cas de doute.

source: However, they are not yet commonly used.
hypothesis: Cependant, ils ne sont pas encore couramment utilisés.

source: Vision restoration: science fiction or reality?
hypothesis: Restauration de la vision: science-fiction ou réalité?

source: Visual prostheses aim at restoring useful vision to patients who have become blind.
hypothesis: Les prothèses visuelles visent à rendre la vision utile à des patients devenus aveugles.

source: This useful vision should enable them to regain autonomy in society for navigation, face recognition or reading.
hypothesis: Cette vision utile devrait leur permettre de retrouver leur autonomie dans la société pour la navigation, la reconnaissance du visage ou la lecture.

source: Two retinal prostheses have already obtained market authorization for patients affected by retinal dystrophies while a new device is in clinical trials for patients affected by age-related macular degeneration.
hypothesis: Deux prothèses rétiniennes ont déjà obtenu une autorisation de mise sur le marché pour des patients atteints de dystrophies rétiniennes alors qu'un nouveau dispositif est en cours d'essai clinique pour des patients atteints de dégénérescence maculaire liée à l'âge.

source: Other innovating strategies have obtained proofs of concepts in rodents but require a further validation in large animals prior to their evaluation on patients.
hypothesis: D'autres stratégies innovantes ont obtenu des preuves de concepts chez les rongeurs mais nécessitent une validation supplémentaire chez les grands animaux avant leur évaluation sur les patients.

source: Various prostheses, in particular cortical prostheses, are currently in clinical trials for optic neuropathies (glaucoma).
hypothesis: Différentes prothèses, notamment corticales, font actuellement l'objet d'essais cliniques pour les neuropathies optiques (glaucome).

source: Optogenetic therapy, an alternative strategy, has now reached the stage of clinical trials at the retinal level while moving forward at the cortical level.
hypothesis: La thérapie optogénétique, une stratégie alternative, a maintenant atteint le stade des essais cliniques au niveau rétinien tout en progressant au niveau cortical.

source: Restoring vision should therefore become a reality for many patients even if this vision will not be as extensive and perfect as natural vision.
hypothesis: La restauration de la vision devrait donc devenir une réalité pour de nombreux patients, même si cette vision ne sera pas aussi vaste et parfaite que la vision naturelle.

source: A model to predict SARS-CoV-2 infection based on the first three-month surveillance data in Brazil
hypothesis: Un modèle de prédiction de l'infection par le sras-cov-2 basé sur les premières données de surveillance à trois mois au brésil

source: COVID-19 diagnosis is a critical problem, mainly due to the lack or delay in the test results.
hypothesis: Le diagnostic de la Covid-19 est un problème critique, principalement en raison de l'absence ou du retard dans les résultats des tests.

source: We aimed to obtain a model to predict SARS-CoV-2 infection in suspected patients reported to the Brazilian surveillance system.
hypothesis: Nous avons voulu obtenir un modèle de prédiction de l'infection par le sras-cov-2 chez les patients suspects signalés au système de surveillance brésilien.

source: We analysed suspected patients reported to the National Surveillance System that corresponded to the following case definition: patients with respiratory symptoms and fever, who travelled to regions with local or community transmission or who had close contact with a suspected or confirmed case.
hypothesis: Nous avons analysé les patients suspects signalés au système national de surveillance qui correspondaient à la définition de cas suivante: patients présentant des symptômes respiratoires et de la fièvre, qui se sont rendus dans des régions de transmission locale ou communautaire ou qui ont eu un contact étroit avec un cas soupçonné ou confirmé.

source: Based on variables routinely collected, we obtained a multiple model using logistic regression.
hypothesis: Sur la base de variables recueillies en routine, nous avons obtenu un modèle multiple par régression logistique.

source: The area under the receiver operating characteristic curve (AUC) and accuracy indicators were used for validation.
hypothesis: L'aire sous la courbe des caractéristiques de fonctionnement du récepteur (auc) et les indicateurs de précision ont été utilisés pour la validation.

source: We described 1468 COVID-19 cases (confirmed by RT-PCR) and 4271 patients with other illnesses.
hypothesis: Nous avons décrit 1468 cas de Covid-19 (confirmés par rt-pcr) et 4271 patients atteints d'autres maladies.

source: With a data subset including 80% of patients from Sao Paulo (SP) and Rio Janeiro (RJ), we obtained a function which reached an AUC of 95.54% (95% CI: 94.41-96.67%) for the diagnosis of COVID-19 and accuracy of 90.1% (sensitivity 87.62% and specificity 92.02%).
hypothesis: Avec un sous-ensemble de données incluant 80% des patients de sao paulo (sp) et rio janeiro (rj), nous avons obtenu une fonction qui a atteint une auc de 95,54% (ic à 95%: 94,41-96,67%) pour le diagnostic de Covid-19 et une précision de 90,1% (sensibilité 87,62% et spécificité 92,02%).

source: We obtained a model suitable for the clinical diagnosis of COVID-19 based on routinely collected surveillance data.
hypothesis: Nous avons obtenu un modèle convenant au diagnostic clinique de la Covid-19 à partir de données de surveillance recueillies en routine.

source: Applications of this tool include early identification for specific treatment and isolation, rational use of laboratory tests, and input for modelling epidemiological trends.
hypothesis: Les applications de cet outil comprennent l'identification précoce en vue d'un traitement et d'une isolation spécifiques, l'utilisation rationnelle de tests de laboratoire, et des données d'entrée pour la modélisation de tendances épidémiologiques.

source: Degenerative lesions of the anterior cruciate ligament: a frequent but poorly understood phenomenon
hypothesis: Lésions dégénératives du ligament croisé antérieur: un phénomène fréquent mais mal compris

source: Three separates entities are reported (mucoid degeneration, ganglion cyst and mucoid degeneration with ganglion cysts) but it is probably a continuum of the same degenerative process.
hypothesis: Trois entités séparées sont rapportées (dégénérescence mucoïde, kyste ganglionnaire et dégénérescence mucoïde avec kystes ganglionnaires) mais il s'agit probablement d'un continuum du même processus dégénératif.

source: In middle aged individuals, it would result of repeated microtrauma in the setting of a narrow intercondylar notch and/or increased posterior tibial slope.
hypothesis: Chez les personnes d'âge moyen, cela entraînerait des microtraumatismes répétés dans le cadre d'une encoche intercondylienne étroite et/ou une augmentation de la pente tibiale postérieure.

source: Most cases are incidental findings.
hypothesis: La plupart des cas sont des constatations fortuites.

source: It is effective for pain relief and motion recovery.
hypothesis: Il est efficace pour le soulagement de la douleur et la récupération du mouvement.

source: Although it produces postoperative instability, secondary reconstruction is not always required.
hypothesis: Bien qu'elle entraîne une instabilité postopératoire, une reconstruction secondaire n'est pas toujours nécessaire.

source: Making more use of MRI, degenerative lesions of the anterior cruciate ligament are more frequently diagnosed.
hypothesis: En utilisant davantage l'irm, les lésions dégénératives du ligament croisé antérieur sont plus fréquemment diagnostiquées.

source: In the older patient, it would be part of a whole organ disease with the onset of osteoarthritis.
hypothesis: Chez le patient plus âgé, il s'agirait d'une maladie d'un organe entier avec l'apparition de l'arthrose.

source: For symptomatic patients, a complete resection of the ligament is our first option when conservative treatment failed.
hypothesis: Pour les patients symptomatiques, une résection complète du ligament est notre première option lorsque le traitement conservateur a échoué.

source: As a practice example, the division of pediatric oncology from the Children's Hospital St. Gallen describes their use and experience of two different methods of integrative medicine on a daily basis.
hypothesis: A titre d'exemple pratique, la division d'oncologie pédiatrique de l'hôpital pour enfants de saint-gall décrit l'utilisation et l'expérience de deux méthodes différentes de médecine intégrative sur une base quotidienne.

source: Integrative medicine in pediatric oncology
hypothesis: Médecine intégrative en oncologie pédiatrique

source: This article provides an overview of the integrative medicine approach in pediatric oncology that combines conventional medicine with complementary therapies.
hypothesis: Cet article présente une vue d'ensemble de l'approche de la médecine intégrative en oncologie pédiatrique qui combine la médecine conventionnelle aux thérapies complémentaires.

source: However, this review article also shows the lack of studies dedicated to integrative medicine in pediatric oncology, particularly regarding efficacy and safety of the different applications.
hypothesis: Cependant, cet article de revue montre également le manque d'études consacrées à la médecine intégrative en oncologie pédiatrique, en particulier en ce qui concerne l'efficacité et la sécurité des différentes applications.

source: New developments in systemic sclerosis-associated interstitial lung disease
hypothesis: Nouveautés dans la pneumopathie interstitielle associée à la sclérodermie systémique

source: Various risk factors are associated with the occurrence of interstitial lung disease, including the presence of anti-topoisomerase I antibodies (Scl-70) and the diffuse cutaneous form of systemic sclerosis.
hypothesis: Divers facteurs de risque sont associés à la survenue d'une pneumopathie interstitielle, notamment la présence d'anticorps anti-topoisomérase i (scl-70) et la forme cutanée diffuse de la sclérodermie systémique.

source: The most common radio-pathological presentation is nonspecific interstitial pneumonia, followed by usual interstitial pneumonia.
hypothesis: La présentation radio-pathologique la plus fréquente est la pneumonie interstitielle non spécifique, suivie par la pneumonie interstitielle habituelle.

source: The classical immunosuppressive treatment of systemic sclerosis-associated interstitial lung disease is evolving, as recent studies suggest a beneficial effect of biological agents such as rituximab and tocilizumab, and antifibrotic drugs such as nintedanib.
hypothesis: Le traitement immunosuppresseur classique de la pneumopathie interstitielle systémique associée à la sclérose évolue, des études récentes suggérant un effet bénéfique d' agents biologiques tels que le rituximab et le tocilizumab, et de médicaments antifibrotiques tels que le nintedanib.

source: It mainly occurs during the first five years after the diagnosis of systemic sclerosis.
hypothesis: Elle survient principalement au cours des cinq premières années suivant le diagnostic de sclérodermie systémique.

source: Voice disorder in children : what can be done ?
hypothesis: Troubles de la voix chez l'enfant: que faire?

source: A child having a hoarse, raspy or broken voice, is not normal.
hypothesis: Un enfant qui a une voix rauque, râpeuse ou cassée n'est pas normal.

source: Child voice problems are too often ignored and neglected.
hypothesis: Les problèmes de voix de l'enfant sont trop souvent ignorés et négligés.

source: Such problem should be treated as quickly as possible, as they have important academic and social consequences and significant implications for the choice of their future adult life.
hypothesis: Ces problèmes devraient être traités le plus rapidement possible, car ils ont des conséquences scolaires et sociales importantes et des implications significatives pour le choix de leur vie adulte future.

source: The problem must be solved before adolescence, because many professions and activities are not accessible to dysphonic children.
hypothesis: Le problème doit être résolu avant l'adolescence, car de nombreuses professions et activités ne sont pas accessibles aux enfants dysphoniques.

source: Our society gives a lot of importance to the voice, but curiously without having sufficient knowledge of vocal hygiene.
hypothesis: Notre société accorde beaucoup d'importance à la voix, mais curieusement sans avoir une connaissance suffisante de l'hygiène vocale.

source: Information and awareness among doctors and parents is paramount so that school-aged children can benefit from adequate treatment.
hypothesis: L'information et la sensibilisation des médecins et des parents sont primordiales pour que les enfants d'âge scolaire puissent bénéficier d'un traitement adéquat.

source: Rhabdomyolysis: early management
hypothesis: Rhabdomyolyse: prise en charge précoce

source: Depletion of myocyte' s adenosine triphosate (ATP) leads to an increase in intracellular calcium and myocyte death.
hypothesis: La déplétion de l'adénosine triphosate (atp) des myocytes entraîne une augmentation du calcium intracellulaire et la mort des myocytes.

source: Diagnosis relies on creatine kinase (CK) levels.
hypothesis: Le diagnostic repose sur les taux de créatine kinase (ck).

source: The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes an asymptomatic increased amount of CK as well as severe, life threatening complications such as acute renal failure and electrolyte disorders.
hypothesis: Le spectre clinique de la rhabdomyolyse comprend une augmentation asymptomatique de la cpk ainsi que des complications graves, mettant en jeu le pronostic vital, telles que l' insuffisance rénale aiguë et les troubles électrolytiques.

source: Rhabdomyolysis is defined by myalgia, potentially painful myoedema and muscular weakness due to death of muscular fiber in the striated muscle.
hypothesis: La rhabdomyolyse est définie par une myalgie, un myoedème potentiellement douloureux et une faiblesse musculaire due à la mort des fibres musculaires du muscle strié.

source: Frequent etiologies include physical effort, intoxication (alcohol, drugs and medication) and physical trauma.
hypothesis: Les étiologies fréquentes incluent l'effort physique, l'intoxication (alcool, drogues et médicaments) et les traumatismes physiques.

source: Treatment is based on prevention and addressing complications.
hypothesis: Le traitement repose sur la prévention et le traitement des complications.

source: Efficacy of macro-clips for perforations and fistulas following endoscopic or surgical procedures. Retrospective analysis of 25 consecutive cases
hypothesis: Efficacité des macro-clips pour perforations et fistules après interventions endoscopiques ou chirurgicales. analyse rétrospective de 25 cas consécutifs

source: Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from endoscopic perforation, surgical fistula, invasive medical procedure or spontaneous perforation.
hypothesis: Entre 2010 et 2015,25 patients consécutifs ont subi une suture endoscopique avec des macro-agrafes pour sceller une brèche résultant d'une perforation endoscopique, d'une fistule chirurgicale, d'une intervention médicale invasive ou d'une perforation spontanée.

source: The endoscopic efficacy was immediate for all patients whose perforation was of endoscopic aetiology.
hypothesis: L' efficacité endoscopique a été immédiate pour tous les patients dont la perforation était d' étiologie endoscopique.

source: Secondary complementary endoscopic treatment was only used in 6/25 patients.
hypothesis: Le traitement endoscopique complémentaire secondaire n'a été utilisé que chez 6/25 patients.

source: Post-endoscopic, spontaneous perforations and surgical fistulas are included.
hypothesis: Les perforations post-endoscopiques spontanées et les fistules chirurgicales sont incluses.

source: The aim of our retrospective study is to analyse the results of endoscopic macro-clips used for closing intestinal breaches in the real life.
hypothesis: Le but de notre étude rétrospective est d'analyser les résultats des macro-clips endoscopiques utilisés pour fermer les brèches intestinales dans la vie réelle.

source: Our results are compared with principal published series.
hypothesis: Nos résultats sont comparés aux principales séries publiées.

source: None of them required surgery.
hypothesis: Aucun n'a dû être opéré.

source: All of them had non-endoscopic aetiology for their perforation.
hypothesis: Tous avaient une étiologie non endoscopique pour leur perforation.

source: The survival at 1 month was 84 % and at 3 months of 76 %.
hypothesis: La survie à 1 mois était de 84% et à 3 mois de 76%.

source: Our results confirm the high efficiency of macro-clips in the treatment of endoscopic breaches in a regional hospital center.
hypothesis: Nos résultats confirment la grande efficacité des macro-clips dans le traitement des brèches endoscopiques dans un centre hospitalier régional.

source: The use of macro-clips seems less convincing for the closure of some postoperative fistula.
hypothesis: L'utilisation de macro-clips semble moins convaincante pour la fermeture de certaines fistules postopératoires.

source: The suture with macro-clips associated with endoscopic and medical treatments allowed to avoid surgical redo in some cases.
hypothesis: La suture avec macro-clips associée à des traitements endoscopiques et médicaux a permis d'éviter la reprise chirurgicale dans certains cas.

source: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 然而，这些药物是通过玻璃体内注射给药的，这与威胁视力的并发症有关。

source: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
hypothesis: 这些并发症中最令人担心的是眼内炎，这是一种严重的眼睛感染，视力极差。

source: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.
hypothesis: 因此，人们对开发抗VEGF药物到眼睛后段的持续递送平台非常感兴趣。

source: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.
hypothesis: 近年来，已经有各种战略被概念化。

source: The characteristics of an ideal sustained delivery platform will then be discussed.
hypothesis: 然后将讨论理想的持续交付平台的特征。

source: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.
hypothesis: 近年来，已经有各种战略被概念化。

source: Through the above, this review attempts to provide an overview of the sustained delivery platforms in their various phases of development.
hypothesis: 通过以上所述，本审查试图概述持续交付平台在不同发展阶段的情况。

source: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.
hypothesis: 抗血管内皮生长因子（抗VEGF）已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。

source: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
hypothesis: 这些包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性（n-AMD）、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变（PDR）和视网膜静脉阻塞（RVO）。

source: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
hypothesis: 视网膜疾病患者通常必须接受多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。

source: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 每次注射都会产生威胁视力的并发症。

source: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.
hypothesis: 这些包括不可生物降解的植入物、纳米制剂和水凝胶。

source: In this review, the barriers of drug delivery to the posterior segment of the eye will be explained.
hypothesis: 在这篇综述中，将解释药物输送到眼睛后段的障碍。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字修复技术通过提高假体质量、增加新型修复体、将修复体的制造方式从手工制作转变为计算机辅助制造、带来牙科实验室新的操作模式、提升修复技术的学术地位，给中国的修复技术带来了巨大的变化。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology still has some problems, such as insufficient precision for some manufacturing methods and shortage of professionals.
hypothesis: 数字修复技术还存在一些问题，如一些制造方法精度不够，专业人员短缺。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字修复技术通过提高假体质量、增加新型修复体、将修复体的制造方式从手工制作转变为计算机辅助制造、带来牙科实验室新的操作模式、提升修复技术的学术地位，给中国的修复技术带来了巨大的变化。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字修复技术通过提高假体质量、增加新型修复体、将修复体的制造方式从手工制作转变为计算机辅助制造、带来牙科实验室新的操作模式、提升修复技术的学术地位，给中国的修复技术带来了巨大的变化。

source: Scarce qualitative literature has focused on understanding the perspective of parents of adolescents involved in crime, and no prior literature has examined how the status of being a parent of an adolescent who is involved in delinquency intersects with being an immigrant parent.
hypothesis: 缺乏定性文献侧重于理解参与犯罪的青少年的父母的观点，以前没有文献研究参与犯罪的青少年的父母身份与移民父母的身份如何交叉。

source: The current phenomenological study examined, through the eyes of immigrant parents, how they comprehend their children's involvement in delinquent behavior.
hypothesis: 当前的现象学研究，通过移民父母的眼睛，他们如何理解他们的孩子参与犯罪行为。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 这项研究审查了对以色列前苏联14名移民父母（10名母亲和4名父亲）进行的半结构深入访谈，这些父母是在犯罪青年康复设施接受治疗的儿童。

source: Data analysis revealed a gradual decline in children's behavior ascribed to the developmental stage of adolescence, the pressures of immigration, and cultural conflict.
hypothesis: 数据分析显示，由于青春期的发展阶段、移民压力和文化冲突，儿童行为逐渐下降。

source: These three factors are interwoven together to create a fabric within which they see their children turning to crime.
hypothesis: 这三个因素交织在一起，形成了一种结构，在这种结构中，他们看到自己的孩子转向犯罪。

source: Parents' gradual loss of control is balanced by attempts to idealize the parent-child relationship and to minimize the severity of the offenses committed.
hypothesis: 父母逐渐失去控制是通过试图理想化亲子关系和尽量减少所犯罪行的严重性来平衡的。

source: They describe various differing and even contradictory experiences of themselves as parents and their struggles to piece together incohesive, alternating experiences of themselves as parents.
hypothesis: 他们描述了自己作为父母的各种不同甚至矛盾的经历，以及他们努力拼凑自己作为父母的不连贯、交替的经历。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 这项研究审查了对以色列前苏联14名移民父母（10名母亲和4名父亲）进行的半结构深入访谈，这些父母是在犯罪青年康复设施接受治疗的儿童。

source: Despite the critical role they can play in their children's rehabilitation, as well as the distress that they themselves experience, parents of children involved in delinquent behavior have often been ignored in research.
hypothesis: 尽管他们在孩子的康复中可以发挥关键作用，而且他们自己也经历了痛苦，但参与犯罪行为的孩子的父母在研究中经常被忽视。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
hypothesis: 在过去的十年里，手持式激光诱发黄斑病变（HLIM）病例的报告急剧上升，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会继续下去，因为不受监管的在线高功率激光接入。

source: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.
hypothesis: 尽管HLIM具有独特的临床特征，但它可能伪装成其他视网膜疾病并不罕见。

source: It is critical therefore to recognise the clinical and multimodal imaging characteristics of this important and potentially devastating condition.
hypothesis: 因此，认识到这种重要和潜在破坏性疾病的临床和多模态成像特征至关重要。

source: As HLIM patients are typically young, unique issues need to be considered, such as delayed presentation, difficult history, poor compliance and behavioural or psychiatric comorbidity.
hypothesis: 由于HLIM患者通常很年轻，需要考虑独特的问题，如延迟出现、困难的历史、依从性差以及行为或精神共病。

source: In addition, we present a unique case of HLIM, resembling the presentation of a placoid disease variant and illustrating choroidal ischaemia using advanced retinal imaging, that offers further insight into the mechanisms of laser injury and its complications.
hypothesis: 此外，我们提出了一个独特的HLIM病例，类似于胎盘疾病变体的演示文稿，并说明脉络膜缺血使用先进的视网膜成像，提供了进一步深入了解激光损伤及其并发症的机制。

source: The issues addressed in this review aim to increase recognition of an increasingly important and trending condition with potentially profound visual complications.
hypothesis: 本综述中涉及的问题旨在提高对一种日益重要和趋势性的疾病的认识，这种疾病具有潜在的深刻的视觉并发症。

source: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.
hypothesis: 本文将综述激光损伤的临床和诊断特点，特别强调多模态视网膜的发现。

source: A meta-analysis of 2530 eyes from 48 real-world studies of therapies for macular oedema secondary to BRVO was conducted.
hypothesis: 对来自48个真实世界的治疗BRVO继发黄斑水肿的研究中的2530只眼睛进行了荟萃分析。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
hypothesis: 随机效应模型的加权平均值和加权估计分别计算了6、12和24个月时的视力（VA）和中央子场厚度（CST）变化。

source: Ocular and systemic adverse events were discussed in 79% and 42% of treatment arms respectively, with possible under-reporting.
hypothesis: 79%和42%的治疗组分别讨论了眼部和全身不良事件，可能存在漏报。

source: Visual and anatomical gains achieved in the real-world for anti-VEGF therapy were not as impressive as seminal RCTs, possibly due to reduced injection frequency in the real world and differences in baseline characteristics.
hypothesis: 抗VEGF治疗在现实世界中取得的视觉和解剖学进展不如精液RCT令人印象深刻，可能是由于现实世界中注射频率的降低和基线特征的差异。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in VA was 14.6 (12.5, 16.7) letters at 12 months (n = 1727).
hypothesis: 在12个月时，VA平均（95%CI）变化的随机效应估计为14.6（12.5，16.7）个字母（n=1727）。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in VA was 14.6 (12.5, 16.7) letters at 12 months (n = 1727).
hypothesis: 在12个月时，VA平均（95%CI）变化的随机效应估计为14.6（12.5，16.7）个字母（n=1727）。

source: Primary outcome was change in VA (logMAR letters) at 12 months.
hypothesis: 主要预后为12个月时VA改变（logMAR字母）。

source: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).
hypothesis: 这篇综述评估了视网膜分支静脉阻塞（BRVO）继发黄斑水肿治疗的真实证据。

source: Baseline characteristics, visual, anatomical and safety outcomes were recorded.
hypothesis: 记录基线特征、视觉、解剖和安全结果。

source: Study quality was assessed using the quality appraisal checklist for case series developed by Institute of Health Economics.
hypothesis: 使用卫生经济研究所开发的病例系列质量评估清单评估研究质量。

source: The mean baseline VA for the pooled data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the mean baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) µm.
hypothesis: 汇集数据的平均基线VA为54.0（51.5，56.5）个字母，平均基线CST为501.3（483.5，519.1）μm。

source: The quality of studies varied considerably.
hypothesis: 研究的质量差异很大。

source: There is an urgent need for consensus on the minimum efficacy, treatment burden and safety data to collect to strengthen the real-world evidence base.
hypothesis: 迫切需要就收集的最低疗效、治疗负担和安全数据达成共识，以加强现实世界的证据基础。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
hypothesis: 比较前骨盆皮下内固定器（INFIX）和钢板内固定治疗不稳定骨盆前环骨折的疗效。

source: The clinical data of 48 patients with unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures who met the selection criteria between June 2014 and December 2019 were retrospectively analyzed.
hypothesis: 回顾性分析2014年6月至2019年12月期间符合选择标准的48例不稳定前骨盆环骨折患者的临床资料。

source: There was no significant difference in gender, age, body mass index, cause of injury, time from injury to operation, Injury Severity Score (ISS), and fracture type between the two groups (  The patients in both groups were followed up for an average of 12.5 months (range, 6-16 months).
hypothesis: 两组患者在性别、年龄、体重指数、损伤原因、损伤至手术时间、损伤严重程度评分（ISS）、骨折类型等方面均无显著性差异（两组患者平均随访12.5个月（范围6~16个月）。

source: The operation time and intraoperative blood loss in INFIX group were significantly lower than those in plate group (  Compared with the plate internal fixation, the INFIX internal fixation can obtain the similar effectiveness for the unstable anterior pelvic ring fracture and has the advantages of shorter operation time, less blood loss, and lower risk of infection.
hypothesis: INFIX组的手术时间和术中出血量明显低于钢板组（与钢板内固定相比，INFIX内固定对不稳定的前骨盆环骨折可获得相似的疗效，具有手术时间短、出血少、感染风险低的优点。

source: Among them, 21 cases were treated with INFIX (INFIX group), and 27 cases were treated with plate (plate group).
hypothesis: 其中21例采用INFIX治疗（INFIX组），27例采用钢板治疗（钢板组）。

source: There was no significant difference in age, gender composition, body mass index, disease type, number of screws implanted, and segmental distribution between the two groups (  The operation time of group A was significantly longer than that in group B (  Compared with traditional freehand pedicle screw placement, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement significantly improves the accuracy and safety of screw placement without increasing the bleeding and postoperative drainage.
hypothesis: 两组在年龄、性别构成、体重指数、疾病类型、植入螺钉数量、节段分布等方面均无显著性差异（A组手术时间明显长于B组）（与传统徒手椎弓根螺钉置入相比，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入在不增加出血和术后引流的情况下，显著提高了螺钉置入的准确性和安全性。

source: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.
hypothesis: 比较机器人系统辅助椎弓根螺钉置入与徒手椎弓根螺钉置入在上胸手术中的安全性和准确性。

source: There were 104 screws implanted in group A and 108 screws in group B.
hypothesis: A组植入螺钉104颗，B组植入螺钉108颗。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 使用KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚、异氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相似，七氟醚明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

source: Conclusion Halogenated hydroxy-alkanes interfere with determination of ethanol content in blood by headspace gas chromatography.
hypothesis: 结论卤代羟基烷烃干扰顶空气相色谱法测定血液中乙醇含量。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 在KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2和J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱的不同检测条件下，探讨卤化羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱法测定血液中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Objective To study the influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes inhalation anesthetic on the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 目的研究卤代羟基烷烃吸入麻醉剂对血液中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法采用顶空气相色谱双柱验证法分析卤代羟基烷烃。

source: Results The retention time of sevoflurane and enflurane was similar to that of ethanol and tert butanol respectively when using the J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column, and interfered with the detection of ethanol content in blood; only J&W DB-ALC1 gas chromatographic column can separate the sevoflurane and ethanol components, so as to eliminate their influence on the detection of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 结果使用J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚和恩氟醚的保留时间分别与乙醇和叔丁醇相似，并干扰了血液中乙醇含量的检测；只有J&W DB-ALC1气相色谱柱可以分离七氟醚和乙醇组分，以消除它们对血液中乙醇含量检测的影响。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 在KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2和J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱的不同检测条件下，探讨卤化羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱法测定血液中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Currently, China has licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3) which includes split-virus influenza vaccine and subunit vaccine, quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV4) which is split, and trivalent live attenuated influenza vaccine (LAIV3) which was newly licensed.
hypothesis: 目前，中国已批准了三价灭活流感疫苗（IIV3），包括分裂病毒流感疫苗和亚单位疫苗、分裂的四价灭活流感疫苗（IIV4）和新批准的三价减毒活流感疫苗（LAIV3）。

source: The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences especially studies of China, including disease burden, effectiveness, Vaccine-avoidable disease burden, vaccine safety monitoring, and cost-effectiveness and cost-benefit.
hypothesis: 该版本的主要更新包括：第一，新的研究证据，特别是中国的研究，包括疾病负担、有效性、疫苗可避免的疾病负担、疫苗安全性监测以及成本效益和成本效益。

source: Second, policies and measures for influenza prevention and control issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.
hypothesis: 二是国家卫生健康委员会在过去一年发布的流感防控政策措施。

source: Thirdly, new type seasonal influenza vaccine licensed and issued in 2020-2021 in China.
hypothesis: 第三，新型季节性流感疫苗于2020-2021年在中国获得许可和发行。

source: Fourth, northern hemisphere influenza vaccination composition for the 2020-2021 season which included trivalent and quadrivalent influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 第四，2020-2021年北半球流感疫苗接种组成，包括三价和四价流感疫苗。

source: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
hypothesis: 本报告所述的建议包括：疫苗接种点诊所应向所有愿意接种疫苗且没有禁忌症的6个月及以上的人提供流感疫苗接种。

source: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
hypothesis: 考虑到新冠疫情全球流行的形势，为降低流感病毒感染的风险，最大限度地减少对新冠疫情防控的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗接种的优先事项如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士、公共卫生专业人员、检疫专业人员；居住在养老院或福利院的弱势群体和照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在人口密度高的地方工作或居住的人，如幼儿园、中小学的教师和学生、监狱的囚犯和工作人员；其他流感高危群体，包括≥60岁的成年人、6-59个月的儿童、患有特定慢性病的人、6个月以下婴儿的家庭成员和护理人员，以及孕妇或计划在流感季节怀孕的妇女。

source: People whoever get IIV or LAIV all apply to the principle.
hypothesis: 得到IIV或LAIV的人都适用于这个原则。

source: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
hypothesis: 一旦接种疫苗，应立即提供流感疫苗接种。

source: Influenza vaccine is also recommended for use in pregnant women during any trimester.
hypothesis: 流感疫苗也建议孕妇在任何三个月内使用。

source: To strengthen the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza and operational research on influenza vaccination in China, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG), updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .
hypothesis: 为加强我国流感防控技术指导和流感疫苗接种操作研究，国家免疫咨询委员会（NIAC）流感疫苗接种技术工作组（TWG）更新了2019-2020年技术指南，编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南（2020-2021年）》。

source: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
hypothesis: 五、2020-2021年流感季节流感疫苗接种建议。

source: No preferential recommendation is made for one influenza vaccine product over another for persons for whom more than one licensed, recommended, and appropriate product is available.
hypothesis: 对于可获得一种以上许可、推荐和适当产品的人，不会优先推荐一种流感疫苗产品。

source: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
hypothesis: 随着新证据的出现，这些准则将定期更新。

source: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
hypothesis: 流感病毒感染是一种会严重影响人体健康的呼吸道传染病。

source: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
hypothesis: 流感病毒会有频繁的抗原变异和变化，导致快速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和疗养院等公共聚集场所流行和爆发。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
hypothesis: 根据世界卫生组织的估计，季节性流感流行病每年在全球造成300万至500万严重病例和29万至65万人死亡。

source: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
hypothesis: 孕妇、幼儿、老年人和慢性病患者面临与流感病毒感染相关的严重疾病和死亡的高风险。

source: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
hypothesis: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，新冠疫情大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。

source: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
hypothesis: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。

source: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
hypothesis: 除少数大城市外，流感疫苗为Ⅱ类疫苗，这意味着流感疫苗接种是自愿的，接种者必须付费。

source: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
hypothesis: 2018年和2019年，中国疾控中心发布了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南》。

source: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
hypothesis: 在过去的一年里，国内外新的研究证据已经发表，新的季节性流感疫苗已经在中国获得许可。

source: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
hypothesis: 6个月至8岁的儿童需要在接种疫苗的第一个季节间隔至少4周接种2剂流感疫苗，以获得最佳保护。

source: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.
hypothesis: 如果他们在2019-2020年流感季节或前一个季节接种疫苗，建议接种1剂。

source: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 8岁以上的人需要接种1剂流感疫苗。

source: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
hypothesis: 建议人们在10月底之前接种流感疫苗。

source: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
hypothesis: 对于10月底前无法接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整个季节的流感疫苗接种。

source: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
hypothesis: 本指引供各级疾病控制中心从事流感控制和预防工作的工作人员、PoV工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病部门的医务人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 在KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2和J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱的不同检测条件下，探讨卤化羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱法测定血液中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Results The retention time of sevoflurane and enflurane was similar to that of ethanol and tert butanol respectively when using the J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column, and interfered with the detection of ethanol content in blood; only J&W DB-ALC1 gas chromatographic column can separate the sevoflurane and ethanol components, so as to eliminate their influence on the detection of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 结果使用J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚和恩氟醚的保留时间分别与乙醇和叔丁醇相似，并干扰了血液中乙醇含量的检测；只有J&W DB-ALC1气相色谱柱可以分离七氟醚和乙醇组分，以消除它们对血液中乙醇含量检测的影响。

source: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
hypothesis: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱验证检测，可以有效地鉴别干扰。

source: To evaluate the effectiveness of cement-injectable cannulated pedicle screw combined with multiple level Schwab grade Ⅰ osteotomy for chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures with kyphosis.
hypothesis: 评价水泥注射空心椎弓根螺钉联合多级施瓦布Ⅰ级截骨术治疗慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴后凸的疗效。

source: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.
hypothesis: 无褥疮、实体性肺炎或深静脉血栓形成等并发症。

source: All patients were followed up 8-24 months, with an average of 16.6 months.
hypothesis: 所有患者随访8~24个月，平均16.6个月。

source: The incisions healed by first intention in 26 cases, and 1 incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood glucose control.
hypothesis: 26例切口初诊愈合，1例因血糖控制不佳，换药后愈合。

source: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
hypothesis: 回顾性分析2015年6月至2017年6月治疗的27例症状性慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松骨折合并后凸患者的临床资料。

source: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).
hypothesis: 其中，男8人，女19人，平均年龄69.5岁（范围，56-81岁）。

source: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
hypothesis: 最担心的这些并发症是眼内炎,这是一种眼部严重感染,视觉结果极差。

source: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.
hypothesis: 近年来,已经对各种战略进行了概念化。

source: In this review, the barriers of drug delivery to the posterior segment of the eye will be explained.
hypothesis: 在本次审查中,将解释药物递送到眼睛后段的障碍。

source: The characteristics of an ideal sustained delivery platform will then be discussed.
hypothesis: 然后将讨论理想的持续交付平台的特征。

source: Through the above, this review attempts to provide an overview of the sustained delivery platforms in their various phases of development.
hypothesis: 通过以上所述,本综述旨在概述各个开发阶段的持续交付平台。

source: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 然而,这些药物通过玻璃体内注射给药,这些注射与威胁视力的并发症有关。

source: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.
hypothesis: 因此,人们对开发抗 VEGF 药物到眼后段的持续给药平台非常感兴趣。

source: Finally, the current available strategies will be analysed with the above-mentioned characteristics in mind to determine the advantages and disadvantages of each sustained drug delivery modality.
hypothesis: 最后,将结合上述特征分析当前可用的策略,以确定每种持续给药模式的优缺点。

source: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.
hypothesis: 抗血管内皮生长因子(抗VEGF)已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。

source: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
hypothesis: 这些包括新生血管年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增生性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 和视网膜静脉闭塞 (RVO)。

source: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
hypothesis: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常在达到期望的治疗效果之前必须接受多次注射。

source: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 每次注射都有发生威胁视力的并发症的风险。

source: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.
hypothesis: 这些包括不可生物降解的种植体、纳米配方和水凝胶。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字修复技术通过提高修复体质量、增加新型修复体、将修复体的制造方法从手工制造改为计算机辅助制造、引入牙科实验室的新运营模式、提升修复技术学术地位,为中国的修复技术带来了巨大变化。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字修复技术通过提高修复体质量、增加新型修复体、将修复体的制造方法从手工制造改为计算机辅助制造、引入牙科实验室的新运营模式、提升修复技术学术地位,为中国的修复技术带来了巨大变化。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字修复技术通过提高修复体质量、增加新型修复体、将修复体的制造方法从手工制造改为计算机辅助制造、引入牙科实验室的新运营模式、提升修复技术学术地位,为中国的修复技术带来了巨大变化。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字修复技术通过提高修复体质量、增加新型修复体、将修复体的制造方法从手工制造改为计算机辅助制造、引入牙科实验室的新运营模式、提升修复技术学术地位,为中国的修复技术带来了巨大变化。

source: The dentists and the dental technicians should learn together and enhance communication to each other, to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.
hypothesis: 牙医和牙科技师应共同学习,加强相互沟通,促进数字修复技术在中国的进步。

source: Scarce qualitative literature has focused on understanding the perspective of parents of adolescents involved in crime, and no prior literature has examined how the status of being a parent of an adolescent who is involved in delinquency intersects with being an immigrant parent.
hypothesis: 缺乏定性文献的重点是了解涉及犯罪的青少年的父母的观点,并且没有既往文献检查过作为参与犯罪的青少年的父母的状况如何与作为移民的父母发生交叉。

source: The current phenomenological study examined, through the eyes of immigrant parents, how they comprehend their children's involvement in delinquent behavior.
hypothesis: 目前的现象学研究通过移民父母的眼睛检查了他们如何理解孩子参与不良行为。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 本研究对来自以色列前苏联的14名移民父母(10名母亲和4名父亲)对在青少年康复设施中接受治疗的儿童进行了深入的半结构化访谈。

source: Data analysis revealed a gradual decline in children's behavior ascribed to the developmental stage of adolescence, the pressures of immigration, and cultural conflict.
hypothesis: 数据分析显示,由于青春期发育阶段、移民压力和文化冲突,儿童的行为逐渐下降。

source: These three factors are interwoven together to create a fabric within which they see their children turning to crime.
hypothesis: 这三个因素相互交织,形成一种结构,让他们看到他们的孩子转向犯罪。

source: Parents' gradual loss of control is balanced by attempts to idealize the parent-child relationship and to minimize the severity of the offenses committed.
hypothesis: 父母逐渐失去控制是通过试图使父母与子女的关系理想化并尽量减少所犯罪行的严重性来平衡的。

source: They describe various differing and even contradictory experiences of themselves as parents and their struggles to piece together incohesive, alternating experiences of themselves as parents.
hypothesis: 他们描述自己作为父母的各种不同甚至矛盾的经历,以及他们拼凑自己作为父母的不凝聚、交替经历的斗争。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 本研究对来自以色列前苏联的14名移民父母(10名母亲和4名父亲)对在青少年康复设施中接受治疗的儿童进行了深入的半结构化访谈。

source: Acknowledging parents' perspectives and experiences can allow development of appropriate therapeutic strategies to support them and maximize their abilities to support their children.
hypothesis: 承认父母的观点和经验,可以制定适当的治疗策略来支持他们,并最大限度地提高他们支持孩子的能力。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
hypothesis: 在过去十年中,报告的手持激光诱导性黄斑病变 (HLIM) 病例急剧增加,这一趋势可能由于不受监管的在线使用高功率激光而继续存在。

source: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.
hypothesis: 尽管 HLIM 具有明显的临床特征,但它可能像其他视网膜疾病一样伪装。

source: It is critical therefore to recognise the clinical and multimodal imaging characteristics of this important and potentially devastating condition.
hypothesis: 因此,认识到这种重要和潜在破坏性病症的临床和多模式成像特征至关重要。

source: As HLIM patients are typically young, unique issues need to be considered, such as delayed presentation, difficult history, poor compliance and behavioural or psychiatric comorbidity.
hypothesis: 由于 HLIM 患者通常是年轻患者,因此需要考虑独特的问题,例如表现延迟、病史困难、依从性差以及行为或精神共病。

source: In addition, we present a unique case of HLIM, resembling the presentation of a placoid disease variant and illustrating choroidal ischaemia using advanced retinal imaging, that offers further insight into the mechanisms of laser injury and its complications.
hypothesis: 此外,我们展示了一个独特的 HLIM 病例,类似于乳状疾病变异的呈现,并说明了使用高级视网膜成像的脉络膜缺血,这为激光损伤及其并发症的机制提供了更深入的见解。

source: The issues addressed in this review aim to increase recognition of an increasingly important and trending condition with potentially profound visual complications.
hypothesis: 本综述中涉及的问题旨在提高对具有潜在严重视觉并发症的日益重要和趋势性状况的认识。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
hypothesis: 在过去十年中,报告的手持激光诱导性黄斑病变 (HLIM) 病例急剧增加,这一趋势可能由于不受监管的在线使用高功率激光而继续存在。

source: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).
hypothesis: 该综述评估了继发于分支视网膜静脉阻塞 (BRVO) 的黄斑水肿的实际管理证据。

source: A meta-analysis of 2530 eyes from 48 real-world studies of therapies for macular oedema secondary to BRVO was conducted.
hypothesis: 对来自 48 项 BRVO 继发黄斑水肿治疗的真实世界研究的 2530 只眼睛进行了荟萃分析。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
hypothesis: 对于第 6、12 和 24 个月时的视力 (VA) 和中心子场厚度 (CST) 变化,计算随机效应模型的加权平均值和加权估计值。

source: Primary outcome was change in VA (logMAR letters) at 12 months.
hypothesis: 主要结局为 12 个月时 VA(logMAR 字母)的变化。

source: Ocular and systemic adverse events were discussed in 79% and 42% of treatment arms respectively, with possible under-reporting.
hypothesis: 分别有 79% 和 42% 的治疗组讨论了眼部和全身不良事件,可能报告不足。

source: Visual and anatomical gains achieved in the real-world for anti-VEGF therapy were not as impressive as seminal RCTs, possibly due to reduced injection frequency in the real world and differences in baseline characteristics.
hypothesis: 在现实世界中,抗 VEGF 治疗获得的视觉和解剖学改善不如开创性 RCT 令人印象深刻,这可能是由于现实世界中注射频率降低和基线特征差异所致。

source: The mean baseline VA for the pooled data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the mean baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) µm.
hypothesis: 汇总数据的平均基线 VA 为 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) 个字母,平均基线 CST 为 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) 微米。

source: Baseline characteristics, visual, anatomical and safety outcomes were recorded.
hypothesis: 记录基线特征、视觉、解剖学和安全性结果。

source: Study quality was assessed using the quality appraisal checklist for case series developed by Institute of Health Economics.
hypothesis: 使用卫生经济学研究所制定的病例系列质量评估清单评估研究质量。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in VA was 14.6 (12.5, 16.7) letters at 12 months (n = 1727).
hypothesis: 12 个月时 VA 平均 (95% CI) 变化的随机效应估计值为 14.6 (12.5, 16.7) 个字母 (n = 1727)。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in CST was -181.7 (-230.7, -132.7) µm at 12 months (n = 1325).
hypothesis: 12 个月时 CST 平均 (95% CI) 变化的随机效应估计值为 -181.7 (-230.7, -132.7) 微米 (n = 1325)。

source: The quality of studies varied considerably.
hypothesis: 研究的质量差异很大。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
hypothesis: 比较前皮下盆腔内固定器(INFIX)和接骨板内固定治疗不稳定前盆腔环骨折的有效性。

source: The clinical data of 48 patients with unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures who met the selection criteria between June 2014 and December 2019 were retrospectively analyzed.
hypothesis: 回顾性分析2014年6月至2019年12月48例符合选择标准的不稳定前盆腔环骨折患者的临床资料。

source: Among them, 21 cases were treated with INFIX (INFIX group), and 27 cases were treated with plate (plate group).
hypothesis: 其中21例采用INFIX治疗(INFIX组),27例采用平皿治疗(平皿组)。

source: There was no significant difference in gender, age, body mass index, cause of injury, time from injury to operation, Injury Severity Score (ISS), and fracture type between the two groups (  The patients in both groups were followed up for an average of 12.5 months (range, 6-16 months).
hypothesis: 两组患者在性别、年龄、体重指数、损伤原因、从损伤到手术的时间、损伤严重程度评分(ISS)、骨折类型等方面无明显差异(两组患者平均随访12.5个月(范围,6~16个月)。

source: The operation time and intraoperative blood loss in INFIX group were significantly lower than those in plate group (  Compared with the plate internal fixation, the INFIX internal fixation can obtain the similar effectiveness for the unstable anterior pelvic ring fracture and has the advantages of shorter operation time, less blood loss, and lower risk of infection.
hypothesis: INFIX组手术时间和术中失血明显低于平皿组(与平皿内固定相比,INFIX内固定对不稳定的前盆腔环骨折效果相似,操作时间短,失血少,感染风险低等优点。

source: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.
hypothesis: 比较机器人系统辅助下椎弓根螺钉放置与上胸手术中徒手椎弓根螺钉放置的安全性和准确度。

source: There was no significant difference in age, gender composition, body mass index, disease type, number of screws implanted, and segmental distribution between the two groups (  The operation time of group A was significantly longer than that in group B (  Compared with traditional freehand pedicle screw placement, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement significantly improves the accuracy and safety of screw placement without increasing the bleeding and postoperative drainage.
hypothesis: 两组在年龄、性别构成、体重指数、疾病类型、植入螺钉数、节段分布等方面无明显差异(A组手术时间明显长于B组(与传统的徒手椎弓根螺钉置入相比,机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入明显提高了螺钉置入的准确性和安全性,不增加出血和术后引流。

source: Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, including 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).
hypothesis: 2017年12月至2019年12月,共纳入39例上胸椎弓根螺钉内固定病例,其中机器人组(A组,机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉放置)19例,徒手组(B组,徒手椎弓根螺钉放置)20例。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法采用双柱确证检测方法顶空气相色谱法分析卤代羟基烷烃。

source: Results The retention time of sevoflurane and enflurane was similar to that of ethanol and tert butanol respectively when using the J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column, and interfered with the detection of ethanol content in blood; only J&W DB-ALC1 gas chromatographic column can separate the sevoflurane and ethanol components, so as to eliminate their influence on the detection of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 结果使用J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱时,七氟醚和氟醚的保留时间分别与乙醇和叔丁醇的保留时间相似,干扰了血液中乙醇含量的检测;只有J&W DB-ALC1气相色谱柱可以分离七氟醚和乙醇组分,从而消除其对血液中乙醇含量检测的影响。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 使用KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2气相色谱柱时,七氟醚、异氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相似,尤其是七氟醚和乙醇,七氟醚明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

source: Conclusion Halogenated hydroxy-alkanes interfere with determination of ethanol content in blood by headspace gas chromatography.
hypothesis: 结论卤代羟基烷烃干扰顶空气相色谱法测定血液中的乙醇含量。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法采用双柱确证检测方法顶空气相色谱法分析卤代羟基烷烃。

source: Objective To study the influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes inhalation anesthetic on the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 目的研究卤代羟基烷烃吸入麻醉剂对血液中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 在 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 和 J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 气相色谱柱的不同检测条件下,探索卤代羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱法测定血样中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
hypothesis: 流感病毒具有频繁的抗原变异和变化,可导致快速和广泛的传播,导致每年在学校、幼儿园和疗养院等公共聚会场所发生流行和爆发。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
hypothesis: 据世卫组织估计,季节性流感流行病每年导致300万至500万例严重病例,全球有290 000至650 000例死亡。

source: To strengthen the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza and operational research on influenza vaccination in China, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG), updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .
hypothesis: 为加强我国流感疫苗防控技术指南和流感疫苗接种操作研究,国家免疫咨询委员会(NIAC)流感疫苗接种技术工作组(TWG)更新了2019-2020年技术指南,并编制了“我国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南(2020-2021)”。

source: The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences especially studies of China, including disease burden, effectiveness, Vaccine-avoidable disease burden, vaccine safety monitoring, and cost-effectiveness and cost-benefit.
hypothesis: 本版本的主要更新内容包括:首先,新的研究证据,尤其是中国的研究,包括疾病负担、有效性、疫苗可避免的疾病负担、疫苗安全性监测以及成本效益和成本效益。

source: Fourth, northern hemisphere influenza vaccination composition for the 2020-2021 season which included trivalent and quadrivalent influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 第四,2020-2021 赛季的北半球流感疫苗组成,包括三价和四价流感疫苗。

source: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
hypothesis: 本报告中描述的建议包括以下内容:疫苗接种点诊所 (PoV) 应向所有愿意接种疫苗且无禁忌症的 6 个月及以上人群提供流感疫苗接种。

source: No preferential recommendation is made for one influenza vaccine product over another for persons for whom more than one licensed, recommended, and appropriate product is available.
hypothesis: 对于获得一种以上许可、推荐和适当产品的人员,对一种流感疫苗产品不推荐优于另一种流感疫苗产品。

source: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
hypothesis: 考虑到 COVID-19 的全球大流行情况,为了降低流感病毒感染的风险,最大限度地减少对 COVID-19 预防和控制的影响,我们建议季节性流感疫苗疫苗接种的优先级如下:医疗工作者,包括临床医师和护士、公共卫生专业人员、检疫专业人员;生活在疗养院或福利院的弱势群体,以及照顾弱势群体的工作人员,包括高龄儿童和年幼儿童,包括年幼者和幼儿保育者,以及年龄为6岁的人群和年龄为6岁的老年人的妇女,包括儿童和老年人和年龄为6岁的老年人的老年人的老年人、儿童。

source: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
hypothesis: 本报告中描述的建议包括以下内容:疫苗接种点诊所 (PoV) 应向所有愿意接种疫苗且无禁忌症的 6 个月及以上人群提供流感疫苗接种。

source: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
hypothesis: 一旦接种疫苗,应尽快提供流感疫苗接种。

source: Influenza vaccine is also recommended for use in pregnant women during any trimester.
hypothesis: 也建议孕妇在任何孕期使用流感疫苗。

source: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
hypothesis: 特别是,在即将到来的冬季春天,COVID-19 大流行病可能会与其他呼吸道传染病(如流感)共同传播。

source: Currently, China has licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3) which includes split-virus influenza vaccine and subunit vaccine, quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV4) which is split, and trivalent live attenuated influenza vaccine (LAIV3) which was newly licensed.
hypothesis: 目前,中国已许可三价灭活流感疫苗(IIV3),包括分裂病毒流感疫苗和亚单位疫苗、分裂四价灭活流感疫苗(IIV4)和新许可的三价减毒活疫苗(LAIV3)。

source: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
hypothesis: 除少数主要城市外,流感疫苗是二类疫苗,这意味着流感疫苗是自愿的,接种者必须为此付费。

source: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
hypothesis: 2018 年和 2019 年,中国疾病预防控制中心发布了“中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指导原则”。

source: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
hypothesis: 过去一年,国内外发表了新的研究证据,新的季节性流感疫苗在中国获得许可。

source: Thirdly, new type seasonal influenza vaccine licensed and issued in 2020-2021 in China.
hypothesis: 第三,新型季节性流感疫苗于2020-2021年在中国获得许可并发行。

source: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
hypothesis: 第五,2020-2021年流感季节的流感疫苗接种建议。

source: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
hypothesis: 为获得最佳保护,6 个月至 8 岁的儿童需要接种 2 剂流感疫苗,在接种第一季至少间隔 4 周。

source: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
hypothesis: 对于 10 月底前无法接种疫苗的人,将继续提供整个季节的流感疫苗接种。

source: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
hypothesis: 随着新证据的出现,这些指南将定期更新。

source: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
hypothesis: 流感病毒感染是一种可严重影响人类健康的呼吸道传染病。

source: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
hypothesis: 孕妇、幼儿、老年人和慢性病患者面临与流感病毒感染相关的严重疾病和死亡的高风险。

source: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
hypothesis: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症最有效的方法。

source: Second, policies and measures for influenza prevention and control issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.
hypothesis: 第二,国家卫生健康委员会(PRC)在过去一年颁布的流感防治政策和措施。

source: People whoever get IIV or LAIV all apply to the principle.
hypothesis: 接受 IIV 或 LAIV 的人都适用该原则。

source: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 8 岁以上的人需要接种 1 剂流感疫苗。

source: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
hypothesis: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。

source: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
hypothesis: 这些指南旨在供从事流感控制和预防工作的 CDC 各级工作人员、PoV 工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构工作人员使用。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 在 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 和 J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 气相色谱柱的不同检测条件下,探索卤代羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱法测定血样中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Results The retention time of sevoflurane and enflurane was similar to that of ethanol and tert butanol respectively when using the J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column, and interfered with the detection of ethanol content in blood; only J&W DB-ALC1 gas chromatographic column can separate the sevoflurane and ethanol components, so as to eliminate their influence on the detection of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 结果使用J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱时,七氟醚和氟醚的保留时间分别与乙醇和叔丁醇的保留时间相似,干扰了血液中乙醇含量的检测;只有J&W DB-ALC1气相色谱柱可以分离七氟醚和乙醇组分,从而消除其对血液中乙醇含量检测的影响。

source: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
hypothesis: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证性检测,可以有效地区分干扰。

source: To evaluate the effectiveness of cement-injectable cannulated pedicle screw combined with multiple level Schwab grade Ⅰ osteotomy for chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures with kyphosis.
hypothesis: 评价骨水泥注射空心椎弓根螺钉联合多级 Schwab I 级截骨术治疗慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸的有效性。

source: The incisions healed by first intention in 26 cases, and 1 incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood glucose control.
hypothesis: 26例切口初衷愈合,1例因血糖控制不佳换药后愈合。

source: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.
hypothesis: 无甲床、低静性肺炎或深静脉血栓等并发症。

source: All patients were followed up 8-24 months, with an average of 16.6 months.
hypothesis: 所有患者随访8-24个月,平均16.6个月。

source: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).
hypothesis: 其中男8例,女19例,平均年龄69.5岁(范围56-81岁)。

source: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
hypothesis: 回顾性分析2015年6月至2017年6月27例症状性慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折合并脊柱后凸患者的临床资料。

source: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.
hypothesis: 因此，人们对开发抗VEGF药物到眼后段的持续递送平台产生了极大的兴趣。

source: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.
hypothesis: 因此，人们对开发抗VEGF药物到眼后段的持续递送平台产生了极大的兴趣。

source: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.
hypothesis: 抗血管内皮生长因子(anti-vascular endothelial growth factor,anti-VEGF)已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。

source: Through the above, this review attempts to provide an overview of the sustained delivery platforms in their various phases of development.
hypothesis: 通过以上内容，本综述试图概述处于不同发展阶段的持续交付平台。

source: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.
hypothesis: 近年来，已经概念化了各种战略。

source: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
hypothesis: 在这些并发症中，最可怕的是眼内炎，这是一种严重的眼部感染，视力结果极差。

source: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
hypothesis: 包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性(n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变(PDR)和视网膜静脉阻塞(RVO)。

source: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 然而，这些药物是通过玻璃体内注射给药的，玻璃体内注射与威胁视力的并发症有关。

source: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
hypothesis: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常要经过多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。

source: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 每次注射都有威胁视力的并发症的风险。

source: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.
hypothesis: 这些包括不可生物降解植入物、纳米制剂和水凝胶。

source: The characteristics of an ideal sustained delivery platform will then be discussed.
hypothesis: 然后将讨论理想的持续给药平台的特点。

source: Finally, the current available strategies will be analysed with the above-mentioned characteristics in mind to determine the advantages and disadvantages of each sustained drug delivery modality.
hypothesis: 最后，将在考虑到上述特点的情况下对现有的策略进行分析，以确定每种持续给药方式的优缺点。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字化修复技术提高了修复体的质量，增加了新的修复体类型，将修复体的制造方法由手工制作转变为计算机辅助制造，带来了牙科实验室新的操作模式，提升了修复体技术的学术地位，给我国修复体技术带来了巨大的变化。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字化修复技术提高了修复体的质量，增加了新的修复体类型，将修复体的制造方法由手工制作转变为计算机辅助制造，带来了牙科实验室新的操作模式，提升了修复体技术的学术地位，给我国修复体技术带来了巨大的变化。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字化修复技术提高了修复体的质量，增加了新的修复体类型，将修复体的制造方法由手工制作转变为计算机辅助制造，带来了牙科实验室新的操作模式，提升了修复体技术的学术地位，给我国修复体技术带来了巨大的变化。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字化修复技术提高了修复体的质量，增加了新的修复体类型，将修复体的制造方法由手工制作转变为计算机辅助制造，带来了牙科实验室新的操作模式，提升了修复体技术的学术地位，给我国修复体技术带来了巨大的变化。

source: The dentists and the dental technicians should learn together and enhance communication to each other, to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.
hypothesis: 牙科医生和口腔技术人员应共同学习，加强交流，以促进中国数字化修复技术的进步。

source: Scarce qualitative literature has focused on understanding the perspective of parents of adolescents involved in crime, and no prior literature has examined how the status of being a parent of an adolescent who is involved in delinquency intersects with being an immigrant parent.
hypothesis: Scarce定性文献侧重于理解参与犯罪的青少年的父母的观点，以前的文献没有研究作为参与犯罪的青少年的父母的地位如何与作为移民父母的交叉。

source: The current phenomenological study examined, through the eyes of immigrant parents, how they comprehend their children's involvement in delinquent behavior.
hypothesis: 目前的现象学研究通过移民父母的眼睛考察了他们如何理解其子女参与犯罪行为。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 这项研究调查了对14名来自前苏联在以色列的移民父母(10名母亲和4名父亲)在犯罪青年康复设施中接受治疗的儿童进行的深入的半结构化访谈。

source: Data analysis revealed a gradual decline in children's behavior ascribed to the developmental stage of adolescence, the pressures of immigration, and cultural conflict.
hypothesis: 数据分析显示，由于青春期发育阶段、移民压力和文化冲突，儿童的行为逐渐下降。

source: These three factors are interwoven together to create a fabric within which they see their children turning to crime.
hypothesis: 这三个因素交织在一起，形成了一种结构，在这种结构中，他们看到自己的孩子转向犯罪。

source: They describe various differing and even contradictory experiences of themselves as parents and their struggles to piece together incohesive, alternating experiences of themselves as parents.
hypothesis: 他们描述了自己作为父母的各种不同甚至矛盾的经历，以及他们努力拼凑自己作为父母的缺乏凝聚力的、交替的经历。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 这项研究调查了对14名来自前苏联在以色列的移民父母(10名母亲和4名父亲)在犯罪青年康复设施中接受治疗的儿童进行的深入的半结构化访谈。

source: Acknowledging parents' perspectives and experiences can allow development of appropriate therapeutic strategies to support them and maximize their abilities to support their children.
hypothesis: 评估父母的观点和经验可以制定适当的治疗策略来支持他们，并最大限度地提高他们支持子女的能力。

source: Parents' gradual loss of control is balanced by attempts to idealize the parent-child relationship and to minimize the severity of the offenses committed.
hypothesis: 试图将亲子关系理想化，并将所犯罪行的严重程度降到最低，以平衡父母逐渐失去控制的情况。

source: It is critical therefore to recognise the clinical and multimodal imaging characteristics of this important and potentially devastating condition.
hypothesis: 因此，识别这种重要且潜在破坏性疾病的临床和多模态成像特征是至关重要的。

source: As HLIM patients are typically young, unique issues need to be considered, such as delayed presentation, difficult history, poor compliance and behavioural or psychiatric comorbidity.
hypothesis: 由于HLIM患者通常较年轻，需要考虑独特的问题，如延迟出现、困难病史、依从性差以及行为或精神合并症。

source: In addition, we present a unique case of HLIM, resembling the presentation of a placoid disease variant and illustrating choroidal ischaemia using advanced retinal imaging, that offers further insight into the mechanisms of laser injury and its complications.
hypothesis: 此外，我们报告了一个独特的HLIM病例，类似于安慰剂疾病变异型的表现，并使用高级视网膜成像说明脉络膜缺血，为激光损伤及其并发症的机制提供了进一步的见解。

source: The issues addressed in this review aim to increase recognition of an increasingly important and trending condition with potentially profound visual complications.
hypothesis: 本综述中讨论的问题旨在提高对一种具有潜在严重视觉并发症的日益重要的趋势疾病的认识。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
hypothesis: 在过去十年中，报告的手持激光诱发黄斑病变(HLIM)病例急剧增加，由于在线获取高功率激光不受监管，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。

source: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.
hypothesis: 虽然HLIM具有独特的临床特征，但并非罕见，它可伪装成其他视网膜疾病。

source: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.
hypothesis: 本文将综述激光损伤的临床和诊断特点，并特别强调多模态视网膜表现。

source: A meta-analysis of 2530 eyes from 48 real-world studies of therapies for macular oedema secondary to BRVO was conducted.
hypothesis: 对来自48项治疗继发于BRVO的黄斑水肿的真实世界研究的2530只眼进行了荟萃分析。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
hypothesis: 计算6个月、12个月和24个月时视力(VA)和中心亚场厚度(CST)变化的来自随机效应模型的加权平均和加权估计值。

source: Primary outcome was change in VA (logMAR letters) at 12 months.
hypothesis: 主要结局为12个月时VA(logMAR字母)的变化。

source: Visual and anatomical gains achieved in the real-world for anti-VEGF therapy were not as impressive as seminal RCTs, possibly due to reduced injection frequency in the real world and differences in baseline characteristics.
hypothesis: 在现实世界中抗VEGF治疗获得的视觉和解剖学收益不如精液RCT令人印象深刻，这可能是由于现实世界中注射频率的降低和基线特征的差异。

source: The mean baseline VA for the pooled data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the mean baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) µm.
hypothesis: 汇总数据的平均基线VA为54.0(51.5，56.5)个字母，平均基线CST为501.3(483.5，519.1)微米。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in VA was 14.6 (12.5, 16.7) letters at 12 months (n = 1727).
hypothesis: 12个月时VA平均(95% CI)变化的随机效应估计值为14.6(12.5,16.7)个字母(n=1727)。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in CST was -181.7 (-230.7, -132.7) µm at 12 months (n = 1325).
hypothesis: 12个月时CST平均(95% CI)变化的随机效应估计值为-181.7(-230.7，-132.7)μm(n = 1325)。

source: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).
