hypothesis: 本综述评估了视网膜分支静脉阻塞(BRVO)继发黄斑水肿治疗的真实世界证据。

source: Baseline characteristics, visual, anatomical and safety outcomes were recorded.
hypothesis: 记录基线特征、视觉、解剖和安全性结果。

source: Study quality was assessed using the quality appraisal checklist for case series developed by Institute of Health Economics.
hypothesis: 使用卫生经济研究所开发的病例系列质量评估检查表评估研究质量。

source: The quality of studies varied considerably.
hypothesis: 研究的质量差异很大。

source: Ocular and systemic adverse events were discussed in 79% and 42% of treatment arms respectively, with possible under-reporting.
hypothesis: 分别有79%和42%的治疗组讨论了眼部和全身不良事件，可能存在漏报。

source: There is an urgent need for consensus on the minimum efficacy, treatment burden and safety data to collect to strengthen the real-world evidence base.
hypothesis: 迫切需要就收集的最低疗效、治疗负担和安全性数据达成共识，以加强真实世界的证据基础。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
hypothesis: 比较前路皮下骨盆内固定器(INFIX)与钢板内固定治疗不稳定型骨盆前环骨折的疗效。

source: The clinical data of 48 patients with unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures who met the selection criteria between June 2014 and December 2019 were retrospectively analyzed.
hypothesis: 方法回顾性分析2014年6月至2019年12月期间符合入选标准的48例不稳定型骨盆前环骨折患者的临床资料。

source: There was no significant difference in gender, age, body mass index, cause of injury, time from injury to operation, Injury Severity Score (ISS), and fracture type between the two groups (  The patients in both groups were followed up for an average of 12.5 months (range, 6-16 months).
hypothesis: 两组患者在性别、年龄、体重指数、损伤原因、损伤至手术时间、损伤严重程度评分(ISS)、骨折类型等方面差异无统计学意义(两组患者平均随访12.5个月(范围，6~16个月))。

source: The operation time and intraoperative blood loss in INFIX group were significantly lower than those in plate group (  Compared with the plate internal fixation, the INFIX internal fixation can obtain the similar effectiveness for the unstable anterior pelvic ring fracture and has the advantages of shorter operation time, less blood loss, and lower risk of infection.
hypothesis: INFIX组手术时间及术中出血量均显着低于钢板组(与钢板内固定相比，对于不稳定的前骨盆环骨折，INFIX内固定可获得相似的效果，具有手术时间短、出血量少、感染风险低的优点。

source: Among them, 21 cases were treated with INFIX (INFIX group), and 27 cases were treated with plate (plate group).
hypothesis: 其中21例采用INFIX治疗(INFIX组)，27例采用钢板治疗(钢板组)。

source: There was no significant difference in age, gender composition, body mass index, disease type, number of screws implanted, and segmental distribution between the two groups (  The operation time of group A was significantly longer than that in group B (  Compared with traditional freehand pedicle screw placement, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement significantly improves the accuracy and safety of screw placement without increasing the bleeding and postoperative drainage.
hypothesis: 两组在年龄、性别构成、体重指数、疾病类型、植入螺钉数量、节段分布等方面差异无统计学意义(A组手术时间明显长于B组)(与传统徒手椎弓根螺钉置入相比，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入显着提高了螺钉置入的准确性和安全性，且不增加出血和术后引流。

source: Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, including 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).
hypothesis: 2017年12月至2019年12月，39例采用上胸椎椎弓根螺钉内固定术的患者纳入研究，其中机器人组(A组，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入)19例，徒手组(B组，徒手椎弓根螺钉置入)20例。

source: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.
hypothesis: 比较机器人系统辅助下椎弓根螺钉置入与徒手椎弓根螺钉置入在上胸外科手术中的安全性和准确性。

source: There were 104 screws implanted in group A and 108 screws in group B.
hypothesis: A组植入螺钉104枚，B组植入螺钉108枚。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 探讨了KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2和强生DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱不同检测条件下卤代羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱测定血液样品中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Results The retention time of sevoflurane and enflurane was similar to that of ethanol and tert butanol respectively when using the J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column, and interfered with the detection of ethanol content in blood; only J&W DB-ALC1 gas chromatographic column can separate the sevoflurane and ethanol components, so as to eliminate their influence on the detection of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 结果使用强生W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚和安氟醚的保留时间分别与乙醇和叔丁醇的保留时间相似，干扰了血液中乙醇含量的检测；只有强生DB-ALC1气相色谱柱可以分离七氟醚和乙醇成分，从而消除了它们对血液中乙醇含量检测的影响。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 当采用KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚、异氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相似，尤其是七氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相似，且七氟醚明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

source: Conclusion Halogenated hydroxy-alkanes interfere with determination of ethanol content in blood by headspace gas chromatography.
hypothesis: 结论卤代羟基烷烃干扰顶空气相色谱法测定血液中乙醇含量。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法采用顶空气相色谱双柱确证检测方法对卤代羟基烷烃进行分析。

source: Objective To study the influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes inhalation anesthetic on the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 目的研究卤代羟基烷烃类吸入麻醉药对血液中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法采用顶空气相色谱双柱确证检测方法对卤代羟基烷烃进行分析。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
hypothesis: 根据世卫组织的估计，季节性流感流行每年在全球造成300万至5 00万重症病例，29万至65万人死亡。

source: Currently, China has licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3) which includes split-virus influenza vaccine and subunit vaccine, quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV4) which is split, and trivalent live attenuated influenza vaccine (LAIV3) which was newly licensed.
hypothesis: 目前，我国已获得许可的三价流感灭活疫苗(IIV3)包括裂解病毒流感疫苗和亚单位疫苗、裂解的四价流感灭活疫苗(IIV4)和新获得许可的三价流感减毒活疫苗(LAIV3)。

source: The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences especially studies of China, including disease burden, effectiveness, Vaccine-avoidable disease burden, vaccine safety monitoring, and cost-effectiveness and cost-benefit.
hypothesis: 本版更新主要包括以下几个方面：第一，新的研究证据，特别是中国的研究，包括疾病负担、有效性、疫苗可避免的疾病负担、疫苗安全性监测、成本效益和成本效益。

source: Second, policies and measures for influenza prevention and control issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.
hypothesis: 二是去年国家卫生健康委发布的流感防控政策和措施。

source: Thirdly, new type seasonal influenza vaccine licensed and issued in 2020-2021 in China.
hypothesis: 三是新型季节性流感疫苗于2020-2021年在中国获批上市。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
hypothesis: 根据世卫组织的估计，季节性流感流行每年在全球造成300万至5 00万重症病例，29万至65万人死亡。

source: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
hypothesis: 本报告中描述的建议包括：疫苗接种点诊所(POV)应为所有6个月及以上愿意接种且无禁忌症的人提供流感疫苗接种。

source: No preferential recommendation is made for one influenza vaccine product over another for persons for whom more than one licensed, recommended, and appropriate product is available.
hypothesis: 对于有一种以上许可、推荐和适当产品可用的人，不优先推荐一种流感疫苗产品而不是另一种流感疫苗产品。

source: People whoever get IIV or LAIV all apply to the principle.
hypothesis: 得到IIV或LAIV的人都适用这个原则。

source: Influenza vaccine is also recommended for use in pregnant women during any trimester.
hypothesis: 流感疫苗也建议孕妇在任何妊娠三个月内使用。

source: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
hypothesis: 流感病毒感染是一种严重影响人类健康的呼吸道传染病。

source: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
hypothesis: 流感病毒可具有频繁的抗原变异和变化，可导致快速和广泛的传播，导致每年流行，并在学校、幼儿园和疗养院等公众聚集场所爆发。

source: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
hypothesis: 孕妇、幼儿、老年人和慢性病患者患与流感病毒感染相关的重症和死亡的风险很高。

source: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
hypothesis: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。

source: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
hypothesis: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。

source: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
hypothesis: 除个别大城市外，流感疫苗属于二类疫苗，也就是说流感疫苗是自愿接种的，受种者必须自费。

source: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
hypothesis: 2018年和2019年，中国疾控中心分别发布了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南》。

source: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
hypothesis: 在过去的一年里，国内外新的研究证据陆续发表，新型季节性流感疫苗在中国获得了许可。

source: To strengthen the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza and operational research on influenza vaccination in China, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG), updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .
hypothesis: 为加强我国流感防控技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会(NIAC)流感疫苗接种技术工作组(TWG)对2019-2020年技术指南进行了更新，编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南(2020-2021)》。

source: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
hypothesis: 第五，2020-2021年流感季节的流感疫苗接种建议。

source: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
hypothesis: 考虑到COVID-19全球大流行的情况，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险并将对COVID-19防控的影响降至最低，我们建议季节性流感疫苗接种的重点如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士，公共卫生专业人员，检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体和照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在人口密度高的场所工作或居住的人，如幼儿园、中小学校的教师和学生、服刑人员和监狱工作人员；其他流感高危人群，包括≥60岁的成年人、6-59个月的儿童、患有特定慢性疾病的人、<6个月婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者、孕妇或计划在流感季节怀孕的妇女。

source: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
hypothesis: 6个月至8岁的儿童需要在第一个接种季节至少间隔4周接种2剂流感疫苗，以达到最佳保护效果。

source: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.
hypothesis: 如果他们在2019-2020年流感季节或之前的流感季节接种过疫苗，建议接种1剂。

source: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 8岁以上的人需要接种1剂流感疫苗。

source: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
hypothesis: 建议人们在10月底之前接种流感疫苗。

source: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
hypothesis: 一旦有了流感疫苗，就应提供流感疫苗接种。

source: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
hypothesis: 对于无法在10月底前接种流感疫苗的人，将继续提供整个季节的流感疫苗接种。

source: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
hypothesis: 本指南供各级疾控中心从事流感防控工作的工作人员、POV工作人员、儿科、内科、传染病科医护人员、各级妇幼保健机构工作人员使用。

source: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
hypothesis: 随着新证据的出现，这些指南将定期更新。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 探讨了KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2和强生DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱不同检测条件下卤代羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱测定血液样品中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Results The retention time of sevoflurane and enflurane was similar to that of ethanol and tert butanol respectively when using the J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column, and interfered with the detection of ethanol content in blood; only J&W DB-ALC1 gas chromatographic column can separate the sevoflurane and ethanol components, so as to eliminate their influence on the detection of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 结果使用强生W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚和安氟醚的保留时间分别与乙醇和叔丁醇的保留时间相似，干扰了血液中乙醇含量的检测；只有强生DB-ALC1气相色谱柱可以分离七氟醚和乙醇成分，从而消除了它们对血液中乙醇含量检测的影响。

source: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
hypothesis: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地鉴别干扰。

source: To evaluate the effectiveness of cement-injectable cannulated pedicle screw combined with multiple level Schwab grade Ⅰ osteotomy for chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures with kyphosis.
hypothesis: 评价骨水泥注射空心椎弓根螺钉联合多水平Schwab Ⅲ级截骨术治疗慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴后凸畸形的疗效。

source: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
hypothesis: 方法回顾性分析2015年6月至2017年6月期间收治的27例症状性慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折合并后凸畸形患者的临床资料。

source: The incisions healed by first intention in 26 cases, and 1 incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood glucose control.
hypothesis: 26例切口均以原意愈合，1例因血糖控制不佳，经换药后切口愈合。

source: All patients were followed up 8-24 months, with an average of 16.6 months.
hypothesis: 所有患者均获随访8~24个月，平均16.6个月。

source: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).
hypothesis: 其中男性8例，女性19例，平均年龄69.5岁(范围56~81岁)。

source: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.
hypothesis: 无褥疮、坠积性肺炎、深静脉血栓形成等并发症发生。

source: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 然而，这些药物是通过玻璃体内注射给药的，这与并发症有关。

source: The characteristics of an ideal sustained delivery platform will then be discussed.
hypothesis: 然后讨论理想的持续交付平台的特点。

source: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.
hypothesis: 近年来，有各种各样的战略被构想出来。

source: The characteristics of an ideal sustained delivery platform will then be discussed.
hypothesis: 然后讨论理想的持续交付平台的特点。

source: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.
hypothesis: 抗血管内皮生长因子（Anti-VEGF）已成为许多视网膜疾病最常用的治疗手段。

source: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
hypothesis: 这些并发症中最可怕的是眼内炎，一种严重的眼部感染，视力极差。

source: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.
hypothesis: 因此，开发抗血管内皮生长因子药物在眼后段的持续给药平台引起了极大的兴趣。

source: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
hypothesis: 其中包括新生血管年龄相关性黄斑变性（n-AMD）、增生性糖尿病视网膜病变（PDR）和视网膜静脉阻塞（RVO）。

source: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
hypothesis: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常要进行多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。

source: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 每次注射都会引起威胁视力的并发症。

source: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.
hypothesis: 近年来，有各种各样的战略被构想出来。

source: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.
hypothesis: 其中包括不可生物降解的植入物、纳米制剂和水凝胶。

source: In this review, the barriers of drug delivery to the posterior segment of the eye will be explained.
hypothesis: 在这篇综述中，将解释药物输送到眼后段的障碍。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字化修复技术通过提高修复体质量、增加新型修复体、将修复体的制作方法从手工制作转变为计算机辅助制造、带来牙科实验室新的操作模式等，给我国的修复技术带来了巨大的变化，提高口腔修复技术的学术地位。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology still has some problems, such as insufficient precision for some manufacturing methods and shortage of professionals.
hypothesis: 数字修复技术还存在一些问题，如某些制造方法精度不够、专业人才不足等。

source: The dentists and the dental technicians should learn together and enhance communication to each other, to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.
hypothesis: 口腔科医师和口腔技术人员应共同学习，加强学习，促进我国数字化口腔修复技术的进步。

source: Technicians and administrators of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems and seize the opportunities, to improve the level of prosthodontic technology and train the highly educated professionals.
hypothesis: 口腔修复技术人员和管理者应正视问题，抓住机遇，提高口腔修复技术水平，培养高素质的专业人才。

source: At the same time, attentions should be payed to the advantages of the traditional prosthodontic technology while grasping the development of the digital prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 同时，在把握数字化口腔修复技术发展的同时，要充分发挥传统口腔修复技术的优势。

source: Scarce qualitative literature has focused on understanding the perspective of parents of adolescents involved in crime, and no prior literature has examined how the status of being a parent of an adolescent who is involved in delinquency intersects with being an immigrant parent.
hypothesis: 很少有定性文献侧重于理解青少年父母参与犯罪的观点，而之前没有文献研究作为青少年父母参与犯罪与作为移民父母的地位如何交叉。

source: The current phenomenological study examined, through the eyes of immigrant parents, how they comprehend their children's involvement in delinquent behavior.
hypothesis: 目前的现象学研究，通过移民父母的眼睛，检查他们如何理解他们的孩子参与违法行为。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 本研究探讨了深入的半结构式访谈进行了14个移民父母（10母亲和4父亲）从前苏联在以色列的儿童治疗康复设施的少年。

source: Data analysis revealed a gradual decline in children's behavior ascribed to the developmental stage of adolescence, the pressures of immigration, and cultural conflict.
hypothesis: 数据分析显示，由于青春期的发展阶段、移民的压力和文化冲突，儿童的行为逐渐下降。

source: These three factors are interwoven together to create a fabric within which they see their children turning to crime.
hypothesis: 这三个因素交织在一起，形成了一种结构，让他们看到自己的孩子转向犯罪。

source: Parents' gradual loss of control is balanced by attempts to idealize the parent-child relationship and to minimize the severity of the offenses committed.
hypothesis: 父母逐渐失去控制是平衡的尝试理想化的亲子关系，并尽量减少所犯的罪行的严重性。

source: They describe various differing and even contradictory experiences of themselves as parents and their struggles to piece together incohesive, alternating experiences of themselves as parents.
hypothesis: 他们描述了自己作为父母的各种不同甚至是矛盾的经历，以及他们为拼凑自己作为父母的不和谐、交替的经历所做的努力。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 本研究探讨了深入的半结构式访谈进行了14个移民父母（10母亲和4父亲）从前苏联在以色列的儿童治疗康复设施的少年。

source: Acknowledging parents' perspectives and experiences can allow development of appropriate therapeutic strategies to support them and maximize their abilities to support their children.
hypothesis: 承认父母的观点和经验，可以制定适当的治疗策略来支持他们，最大限度地提高他们支持孩子的能力。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
hypothesis: 在过去的十年中，手持式激光诱导黄斑病变（HLIM）病例的报道急剧上升，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会继续下去，因为不受监管的在线获取高功率激光。

source: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.
hypothesis: 虽然HLIM有明显的临床特征，但它可能伪装成其他视网膜疾病并不罕见。

source: It is critical therefore to recognise the clinical and multimodal imaging characteristics of this important and potentially devastating condition.
hypothesis: 因此，认识这一重要且具有潜在破坏性的疾病的临床和多模式成像特征至关重要。

source: As HLIM patients are typically young, unique issues need to be considered, such as delayed presentation, difficult history, poor compliance and behavioural or psychiatric comorbidity.
hypothesis: 由于HLIM患者通常都是年轻人，因此需要考虑一些独特的问题，如表现延迟、病史困难、依从性差以及行为或精神共病。

source: In addition, we present a unique case of HLIM, resembling the presentation of a placoid disease variant and illustrating choroidal ischaemia using advanced retinal imaging, that offers further insight into the mechanisms of laser injury and its complications.
hypothesis: 此外，我们提出了一个独特的HLIM病例，类似于一种板状病变变体的表现，并利用先进的视网膜成像来说明脉络膜缺血，这为激光损伤及其并发症的机制提供了进一步的见解。

source: The issues addressed in this review aim to increase recognition of an increasingly important and trending condition with potentially profound visual complications.
hypothesis: 在这篇综述中讨论的问题旨在提高对一种日益重要和趋势性的疾病的认识，这种疾病具有潜在的深刻的视觉并发症。

source: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.
hypothesis: 本文将回顾激光损伤的临床和诊断特点，特别是多模式视网膜表现。

source: A meta-analysis of 2530 eyes from 48 real-world studies of therapies for macular oedema secondary to BRVO was conducted.
hypothesis: 对48项BRVO继发黄斑水肿的治疗研究中的2530只眼进行meta分析。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
hypothesis: 计算6、12和24个月时视力（VA）和中央亚区厚度（CST）变化的加权平均数和随机效应模型的加权估计数。

source: The mean baseline VA for the pooled data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the mean baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) µm.
hypothesis: 合并数据的平均基线VA为54.0（51.5，56.5）个字母，平均基线CST为501.3（483.5，519.1） µM

source: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).
hypothesis: 本文综述了视网膜分支静脉阻塞（BRVO）继发黄斑水肿的治疗方法。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in CST was -181.7 (-230.7, -132.7) µm at 12 months (n = 1325).
hypothesis: CST平均值（95%CI）变化的随机效应估计值为-181.7（-230.7，-132.7） µ12个月时的m（n = 1325).

source: Ocular and systemic adverse events were discussed in 79% and 42% of treatment arms respectively, with possible under-reporting.
hypothesis: 79%和42%的治疗组分别讨论了眼部和全身不良事件，可能有漏报。

source: Visual and anatomical gains achieved in the real-world for anti-VEGF therapy were not as impressive as seminal RCTs, possibly due to reduced injection frequency in the real world and differences in baseline characteristics.
hypothesis: 在现实世界中，抗血管内皮生长因子治疗所取得的视觉和解剖效果不如精液随机对照试验那么令人印象深刻，这可能是由于现实世界中注射频率的降低和基线特征的差异。

source: Baseline characteristics, visual, anatomical and safety outcomes were recorded.
hypothesis: 记录基线特征、视觉、解剖和安全性结果。

source: Primary outcome was change in VA (logMAR letters) at 12 months.
hypothesis: 主要结果是12个月时VA（logMAR字母）的变化。

source: Study quality was assessed using the quality appraisal checklist for case series developed by Institute of Health Economics.
hypothesis: 研究质量采用卫生经济学研究所制定的病例系列质量评估检查表进行评估。

source: The quality of studies varied considerably.
hypothesis: 研究的质量差别很大。

source: The clinical data of 48 patients with unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures who met the selection criteria between June 2014 and December 2019 were retrospectively analyzed.
hypothesis: 回顾性分析2014年6月至2019年12月间符合入选标准的48例不稳定骨盆前环骨折患者的临床资料。

source: Among them, 21 cases were treated with INFIX (INFIX group), and 27 cases were treated with plate (plate group).
hypothesis: 其中内固定组21例，钢板组27例。

source: There was no significant difference in gender, age, body mass index, cause of injury, time from injury to operation, Injury Severity Score (ISS), and fracture type between the two groups (  The patients in both groups were followed up for an average of 12.5 months (range, 6-16 months).
hypothesis: 两组患者在性别、年龄、体重指数、损伤原因、损伤至手术时间、损伤严重程度评分（ISS）、骨折类型等方面无显著性差异（两组患者平均随访12.5个月（6～16个月）。

source: Among them, 21 cases were treated with INFIX (INFIX group), and 27 cases were treated with plate (plate group).
hypothesis: 其中内固定组21例，钢板组27例。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
hypothesis: 比较骨盆前皮下内固定器（INFIX）与钢板内固定治疗不稳定型骨盆前环骨折的疗效。

source: There were 104 screws implanted in group A and 108 screws in group B.
hypothesis: A组植入螺钉104枚，B组植入螺钉1枚。

source: There was no significant difference in age, gender composition, body mass index, disease type, number of screws implanted, and segmental distribution between the two groups (  The operation time of group A was significantly longer than that in group B (  Compared with traditional freehand pedicle screw placement, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement significantly improves the accuracy and safety of screw placement without increasing the bleeding and postoperative drainage.
hypothesis: 两组在年龄、性别构成、体重指数、疾病类型、植入螺钉数量、节段分布等方面无显著性差异（A组手术时间明显长于B组（与传统徒手椎弓根螺钉置入术相比，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入在不增加出血和术后引流的前提下，显著提高了螺钉置入的准确性和安全性。

source: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.
hypothesis: 比较机器人系统辅助椎弓根螺钉置入术与徒手椎弓根螺钉置入术在上胸科手术中的安全性和准确性。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 在KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2和J&wdb-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱的不同检测条件下，探讨了卤代羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱法测定血液样品中乙醇含量的影响。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 在KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2和J&wdb-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱的不同检测条件下，探讨了卤代羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱法测定血液样品中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法采用顶空气相色谱双柱确证检测法对卤代羟基烷烃进行分析。

source: Objective To study the influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes inhalation anesthetic on the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 目的研究卤代羟基烷烃吸入麻醉剂对血液中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法采用顶空气相色谱双柱确证检测法对卤代羟基烷烃进行分析。

source: Conclusion Halogenated hydroxy-alkanes interfere with determination of ethanol content in blood by headspace gas chromatography.
hypothesis: 结论卤代羟基烷烃干扰了顶空气相色谱法测定血液中乙醇含量。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 采用KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚、异氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相近，特别是七氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相近，七氟醚对血液中乙醇含量的测定有明显干扰。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
hypothesis: 据世卫组织估计，季节性流感疫情每年在全球造成300万至500万严重病例和29万至65万死亡。

source: Currently, China has licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3) which includes split-virus influenza vaccine and subunit vaccine, quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV4) which is split, and trivalent live attenuated influenza vaccine (LAIV3) which was newly licensed.
hypothesis: 目前，我国已获得三价流感灭活疫苗（IIV3）的许可证，包括流感病毒裂解疫苗和亚单位疫苗、四价流感病毒裂解灭活疫苗（IIV4）和新获得许可证的三价流感减毒活疫苗（LAIV3）。

source: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
hypothesis: 除少数主要城市外，流感疫苗属于一类Ⅱ 疫苗，这意味着流感疫苗接种是自愿的，接种者必须为此付费。

source: The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences especially studies of China, including disease burden, effectiveness, Vaccine-avoidable disease burden, vaccine safety monitoring, and cost-effectiveness and cost-benefit.
hypothesis: 该版本的主要更新内容包括：第一，新的研究证据，特别是中国的研究，包括疾病负担、有效性、疫苗可避免疾病负担、疫苗安全性监测、成本效益和成本效益。

source: Second, policies and measures for influenza prevention and control issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.
hypothesis: 二是国家卫生委员会去年出台的流感防控政策措施。

source: Fourth, northern hemisphere influenza vaccination composition for the 2020-2021 season which included trivalent and quadrivalent influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 第四，北半球2020-2021年流感疫苗接种季节构成，包括三价和四价流感疫苗。

source: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
hypothesis: 本报告所述的建议包括：接种点诊所（POV）应为所有6个月及以上愿意接种流感疫苗且无禁忌症的人提供流感疫苗。

source: No preferential recommendation is made for one influenza vaccine product over another for persons for whom more than one licensed, recommended, and appropriate product is available.
hypothesis: 对于有一种以上许可、推荐和适当产品可供使用的人，一种流感疫苗产品不比另一种疫苗产品优先推荐。

source: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
hypothesis: 考虑到全球流行的COVID-19的情况，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险，尽量减少对COVID-19预防和控制的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗接种的重点是：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士，公共卫生专业人员，检疫专业人员；生活在养老院、福利院的弱势群体和照顾弱势群体的工作人员；在人口密度较高的场所工作或停留的人员，如幼儿园、中小学师生、罪犯、监狱工作人员等；其他流感高危人群，包括成人≥60岁、6-59个月的儿童、患有特定慢性病的人、6个月以下婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者、孕妇或计划在流感季节怀孕的妇女。

source: People whoever get IIV or LAIV all apply to the principle.
hypothesis: 不管谁得到IIV或LAIV都适用于这个原则。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
hypothesis: 据世卫组织估计，季节性流感疫情每年在全球造成300万至500万严重病例和29万至65万死亡。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
hypothesis: 据世卫组织估计，季节性流感疫情每年在全球造成300万至500万严重病例和29万至65万死亡。

source: Thirdly, new type seasonal influenza vaccine licensed and issued in 2020-2021 in China.
hypothesis: 第三，新型季节性流感疫苗在2020-2021年在中国获得许可和发放。

source: Influenza vaccine is also recommended for use in pregnant women during any trimester.
hypothesis: 流感疫苗也建议孕妇在怀孕期间使用。

source: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
hypothesis: 流感病毒感染是一种严重影响人类健康的呼吸道传染病。

source: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
hypothesis: 流感病毒可能具有频繁的抗原变异和变化，从而导致迅速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公众聚集场所流行和暴发。

source: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
hypothesis: 孕妇、幼儿、老年人和慢性病患者是流感病毒感染导致严重疾病和死亡的高危人群。

source: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
hypothesis: 尤其是在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。

source: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
hypothesis: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染及感染并发症的最有效方法。

source: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
hypothesis: 2018年和2019年，中国疾控中心发布了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南》。

source: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
hypothesis: 近一年来，国内外新的研究证据陆续发表，新型季节性流感疫苗在我国获得了许可。

source: To strengthen the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza and operational research on influenza vaccination in China, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG), updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .
hypothesis: 为加强我国流感防控技术指导和流感疫苗接种业务研究，国家免疫咨询委员会流感疫苗接种技术工作组，更新了2019-2020年技术指南，编制了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南（2020-2021）》。

source: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
hypothesis: 第五，2020-2021流感季节流感疫苗接种建议。

source: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
hypothesis: 6个月至8岁的儿童在第一个接种季节需要至少间隔4周注射2剂流感疫苗，以获得最佳保护。

source: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 8岁以上的人需要注射1剂流感疫苗。

source: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
hypothesis: 建议人们在10月底前接种流感疫苗。

source: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
hypothesis: 一旦有疫苗接种，就应立即提供流感疫苗接种。

source: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
hypothesis: 本指南适用于各级疾控中心流感防控工作人员、预防接种人员、儿科、内科、传染科医护人员和各级妇幼保健机构工作人员。

source: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
hypothesis: 这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 在KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2和J&wdb-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱的不同检测条件下，探讨了卤代羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱法测定血液样品中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Results The retention time of sevoflurane and enflurane was similar to that of ethanol and tert butanol respectively when using the J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column, and interfered with the detection of ethanol content in blood; only J&W DB-ALC1 gas chromatographic column can separate the sevoflurane and ethanol components, so as to eliminate their influence on the detection of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 结果七氟醚和安氟醚在J&wdb-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱上的保留时间分别与乙醇和叔丁醇的保留时间相近，干扰了血液中乙醇含量的测定；只有J&W DB-ALC1气相色谱柱才能分离七氟醚和乙醇成分，从而消除它们对血液中乙醇含量检测的影响。

source: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
hypothesis: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地鉴别干扰。

source: To evaluate the effectiveness of cement-injectable cannulated pedicle screw combined with multiple level Schwab grade Ⅰ osteotomy for chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures with kyphosis.
hypothesis: 评价骨水泥可注射空心椎弓根螺钉联合多节段Schwab分级的疗效Ⅰ 慢性胸腰段骨质疏松性骨折伴后凸畸形的截骨术。

source: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.
hypothesis: 无褥疮、血瘀性肺炎、深静脉血栓形成等并发症。

source: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
hypothesis: 回顾性分析2015年6月至2017年6月27例有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折合并后凸畸形患者的临床资料。

source: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).
hypothesis: 其中男8例，女19例，平均年龄69.5岁（56-81岁）。

source: The incisions healed by first intention in 26 cases, and 1 incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood glucose control.
hypothesis: 26例切口一期愈合，1例因血糖控制不佳，换药后切口愈合。

source: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 然而，这些药物通过玻璃体内注射给药，与威胁视力的并发症相关。

source: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.
hypothesis: 因此，人们非常感兴趣的是为抗Vegf制剂开发持续递送平台到眼后节。

source: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.

source: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.
hypothesis: 因此，人们非常感兴趣的是为抗Vegf制剂开发持续递送平台到眼后节。

source: Through the above, this review attempts to provide an overview of the sustained delivery platforms in their various phases of development.
hypothesis: 通过以上内容，本次审查试图概述持续交付平台在其各个发展阶段的持续交付平台。

source: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.
hypothesis: 抗血管内皮生长因子（抗Vegf）已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。

source: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).

source: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
hypothesis: 这些并发症中最可怕的是眼内炎，这是一种严重的眼部感染，视力预后极差。

source: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
hypothesis: 视网膜疾病患者通常必须接受多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。

source: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 每次注射都会产生危及视力的并发症风险。

source: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.
hypothesis: 其中包括非生物降解植入物、纳米制剂和水凝胶。

source: In this review, the barriers of drug delivery to the posterior segment of the eye will be explained.
hypothesis: 在本综述中，将解释药物给药到眼后节的障碍。

source: Finally, the current available strategies will be analysed with the above-mentioned characteristics in mind to determine the advantages and disadvantages of each sustained drug delivery modality.
hypothesis: 最后，将结合上述特点分析目前可用的策略，以确定每种持续给药方式的利弊。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字口腔修复技术通过提高口腔修复质量，增加新类型的修复，改变了从手工修复到计算机辅助制造的制造方法，为牙科实验室带来了新的操作模型，提高了口腔修复技术的学术地位，给中国口腔科技带来了巨大的变化。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology still has some problems, such as insufficient precision for some manufacturing methods and shortage of professionals.
hypothesis: 数字修复技术还存在一些问题，比如一些制造方法的精度不够，专业人才短缺等。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.

source: Scarce qualitative literature has focused on understanding the perspective of parents of adolescents involved in crime, and no prior literature has examined how the status of being a parent of an adolescent who is involved in delinquency intersects with being an immigrant parent.
hypothesis: 稀薄的质的文献集中在了解青少年的父母对参与犯罪的看法，没有先前的文献研究过参与犯罪的青少年的父母地位是如何与移民父母相交的。

source: The current phenomenological study examined, through the eyes of immigrant parents, how they comprehend their children's involvement in delinquent behavior.
hypothesis: 当前的现象学研究，通过移民父母的眼光，他们如何理解孩子参与不良行为。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 这项研究调查了在以色列对来自前苏联的14名移民父母(10名母亲和4名父亲)进行的半结构化的深入访谈，访问的对象是在因青年不良康复设施中接受治疗的儿童。

source: Data analysis revealed a gradual decline in children's behavior ascribed to the developmental stage of adolescence, the pressures of immigration, and cultural conflict.
hypothesis: 数据分析显示，儿童的行为逐渐下降，归因于青春期的发展阶段、移民的压力和文化冲突。

source: These three factors are interwoven together to create a fabric within which they see their children turning to crime.
hypothesis: 这三个因素交织在一起，形成了一个组织，他们看到自己的孩子变成犯罪。

source: Parents' gradual loss of control is balanced by attempts to idealize the parent-child relationship and to minimize the severity of the offenses committed.
hypothesis: 父母逐渐失去控制是通过试图理想化亲子关系和尽量减少犯罪的严重程度来平衡的。

source: They describe various differing and even contradictory experiences of themselves as parents and their struggles to piece together incohesive, alternating experiences of themselves as parents.
hypothesis: 他们描述了自己作为父母的各种不同甚至矛盾的经历，以及他们努力将自己作为父母的不拘束、交替的经历拼凑在一起的努力。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 这项研究调查了在以色列对来自前苏联的14名移民父母(10名母亲和4名父亲)进行的半结构化的深入访谈，访问的对象是在因青年不良康复设施中接受治疗的儿童。

source: Acknowledging parents' perspectives and experiences can allow development of appropriate therapeutic strategies to support them and maximize their abilities to support their children.
hypothesis: 承认父母的观点和经验可以使适当的治疗策略得到支持，并最大限度地发挥他们支持孩子的能力。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
hypothesis: 在过去的十年中，报告的手持激光诱发的黄斑病变(Hlim)病例急剧增加，这一令人关注的趋势可能因为不受管制的在线获得高倍激光而持续下去。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
hypothesis: 在过去的十年中，报告的手持激光诱发的黄斑病变(Hlim)病例急剧增加，这一令人关注的趋势可能因为不受管制的在线获得高倍激光而持续下去。

source: It is critical therefore to recognise the clinical and multimodal imaging characteristics of this important and potentially devastating condition.
hypothesis: 因此，认识这种重要和潜在破坏性疾病的临床和多模式成像特征至关重要。

source: As HLIM patients are typically young, unique issues need to be considered, such as delayed presentation, difficult history, poor compliance and behavioural or psychiatric comorbidity.
hypothesis: 由于胰岛素患者通常年轻，需要考虑独特的问题，如延迟就诊、困难病史、依从性差和行为或精神共病。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
hypothesis: 在过去的十年中，报告的手持激光诱发的黄斑病变(Hlim)病例急剧增加，这一令人关注的趋势可能因为不受管制的在线获得高倍激光而持续下去。

source: The issues addressed in this review aim to increase recognition of an increasingly important and trending condition with potentially profound visual complications.
hypothesis: 本综述中涉及的问题旨在提高对一种越来越重要和趋势性疾病的认识，并伴有潜在的深刻视觉并发症。

source: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.
hypothesis: 本文将回顾激光损伤的临床和诊断特点，特别强调多模式视网膜表现。

source: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).
hypothesis: 本综述评估了视网膜分支静脉阻塞继发黄斑水肿的真实证据(Brvo)。

source: A meta-analysis of 2530 eyes from 48 real-world studies of therapies for macular oedema secondary to BRVO was conducted.
hypothesis: 从48项治疗Brvo继发黄斑水肿的实际研究中对2530只眼进行了荟萃分析。

source: Baseline characteristics, visual, anatomical and safety outcomes were recorded.
hypothesis: 记录基线特征、视觉、解剖和安全结局。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
hypothesis: 根据视力(Va)和中央子野厚度(Cst)在6、12和24个月时的变化计算随机效应模型的加权平均值和加权估计值。

source: Primary outcome was change in VA (logMAR letters) at 12 months.
hypothesis: 主要结果是12个月时Va（logMAR字母）的变化。

source: Ocular and systemic adverse events were discussed in 79% and 42% of treatment arms respectively, with possible under-reporting.
hypothesis: 分别在79%和42%的治疗组中讨论了眼部和全身不良事件，可能被漏报。

source: Visual and anatomical gains achieved in the real-world for anti-VEGF therapy were not as impressive as seminal RCTs, possibly due to reduced injection frequency in the real world and differences in baseline characteristics.
hypothesis: 在真实世界中抗Vegf治疗获得的视觉和解剖获益不如精液RCT显著，可能是由于现实世界中注射频率降低和基线特征的差异。

source: There is an urgent need for consensus on the minimum efficacy, treatment burden and safety data to collect to strengthen the real-world evidence base.
hypothesis: 迫切需要就最小疗效、治疗负担和安全性数据达成共识，以收集以加强现实证据基础。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
hypothesis: 根据视力(Va)和中央子野厚度(Cst)在6、12和24个月时的变化计算随机效应模型的加权平均值和加权估计值。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
hypothesis: 根据视力(Va)和中央子野厚度(Cst)在6、12和24个月时的变化计算随机效应模型的加权平均值和加权估计值。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in VA was 14.6 (12.5, 16.7) letters at 12 months (n = 1727).
hypothesis: 12个月时Va中平均(95% Ci)变化的随机效应估计值为14.6 (12.5, 16.7 )字母(n=1727 )。

source: Study quality was assessed using the quality appraisal checklist for case series developed by Institute of Health Economics.
hypothesis: 使用卫生经济研究所开发的病例系列的质量评价检查表评估研究质量。

source: The quality of studies varied considerably.
hypothesis: 研究质量差异很大。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
hypothesis: 比较前路骨盆内固定器与钢板内固定治疗不稳定骨盆前环骨折的疗效。

source: The clinical data of 48 patients with unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures who met the selection criteria between June 2014 and December 2019 were retrospectively analyzed.
hypothesis: 回顾性分析2014年6月至2019年12月期间符合选择标准的48例不稳定前骨盆环骨折患者的临床资料。

source: There was no significant difference in gender, age, body mass index, cause of injury, time from injury to operation, Injury Severity Score (ISS), and fracture type between the two groups (  The patients in both groups were followed up for an average of 12.5 months (range, 6-16 months).
hypothesis: 两组之间的性别、年龄、体重指数、受伤原因、从受伤到手术时间、损伤严重度评分（Iss）和骨折类型无显著差异（两组患者平均随访12.5个月（范围：6-16个月）。

source: Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, including 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).
hypothesis: 2017年12月至2019年12月期间，研究纳入了39例上胸椎弓根螺钉内固定病例，包括19例机器人组（a组，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入）和20例写手组（B组，写手椎弓根螺钉置入）。

source: There were 104 screws implanted in group A and 108 screws in group B.
hypothesis: A组有104枚螺钉植入，B组有108枚螺钉植入。

source: There was no significant difference in age, gender composition, body mass index, disease type, number of screws implanted, and segmental distribution between the two groups (  The operation time of group A was significantly longer than that in group B (  Compared with traditional freehand pedicle screw placement, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement significantly improves the accuracy and safety of screw placement without increasing the bleeding and postoperative drainage.
hypothesis: 两组之间的年龄、性别组合、体重指数、疾病类型、种植螺钉次数、种植螺钉次数和分布均无显著差异（A组的手术时间明显长于B组（与传统的带蒂螺钉放置相比，机器人辅助的椎弓根螺钉放置显著提高螺钉放置的准确性和安全性，而不增加出血和术后引流）。

source: Objective To study the influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes inhalation anesthetic on the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 目的探讨羟基-烷基卤化液吸入麻醉剂对血液中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 使用Kb-BAC1 /Kb-BAC2气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

source: Conclusion Halogenated hydroxy-alkanes interfere with determination of ethanol content in blood by headspace gas chromatography.
hypothesis: 结论卤化羟基-烷烃可用顶空气相色谱法测定血液中乙醇含量。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法采用顶空气相色谱法和双柱验证法对卤代羟基-烷烃进行检测。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法采用顶空气相色谱法和双柱验证法对卤代羟基-烷烃进行检测。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 在Kb-BAC1 /Kb-BAC2和J&W Db-ALC1 /Db-ALC2气相色谱柱的不同检测条件下，探讨了卤代羟基-烷烃对血样乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
hypothesis: 根据谁估计，季节性流感疫情已经导致全球每年300万至500万重症病例和29万至6.5万人死亡。

source: Currently, China has licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3) which includes split-virus influenza vaccine and subunit vaccine, quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV4) which is split, and trivalent live attenuated influenza vaccine (LAIV3) which was newly licensed.
hypothesis: 目前，中国已经批准了三价灭活流感疫苗(IIV3 )，包括分裂病毒流感疫苗和亚单位疫苗、分裂四价灭活流感疫苗(IIV4 )和新批准的三价衰减流感活疫苗(LAIV3 )。

source: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
hypothesis: 除了少数几个大城市，流感疫苗是二类疫苗，也就是说流感疫苗接种是自愿的，接种者必须为此买单。

source: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
hypothesis: 2018年和2019年，中国中心发布了《中国季节性流感疫苗接种技术指南》。

source: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
hypothesis: 近一年来，国内外新的研究证据陆续出炉，国内已经批准了季节性流感疫苗新品。

source: To strengthen the technical guidance for prevention and control of influenza and operational research on influenza vaccination in China, the National Immunization Advisory Committee (NIAC) Influenza Vaccination Technical Working Group (TWG), updated the 2019-2020 technical guidelines and compiled the "Technical guidelines for seasonal influenza vaccination in China (2020-2021)" .
hypothesis: 加强流感预防和控制的技术指导和流感疫苗接种的操作研究在中国,国家免疫咨询委员会(新亚克)流感疫苗技术工作组(Twg),更新了2019-2020年技术指南和编制“技术指南在中国季节性流感疫苗接种(2020-2021 )”。

source: The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences especially studies of China, including disease burden, effectiveness, Vaccine-avoidable disease burden, vaccine safety monitoring, and cost-effectiveness and cost-benefit.
hypothesis: 该版本的主要更新包括以下内容：一是新的研究证据，尤其是中国的研究，包括疾病负担、有效性、疫苗可避免的疾病负担、疫苗安全监测以及成本效益和成本效益。

source: Second, policies and measures for influenza prevention and control issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.
hypothesis: 第二，国家卫生健康委员会(卫计委)过去一年发布的防控流感的政策措施。

source: Thirdly, new type seasonal influenza vaccine licensed and issued in 2020-2021 in China.
hypothesis: 第三，中国在2020-2021年批准和发行新型季节性流感疫苗。

source: Fourth, northern hemisphere influenza vaccination composition for the 2020-2021 season which included trivalent and quadrivalent influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 第四，2020-2021赛季的北半球流感疫苗接种组成，包括三价和四价流感疫苗。

source: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
hypothesis: 本报告所述建议包括以下内容：疫苗接种点门诊(PoVs)应向所有6个月及以上愿意接种疫苗且无禁忌证的患者提供流感疫苗接种。

source: No preferential recommendation is made for one influenza vaccine product over another for persons for whom more than one licensed, recommended, and appropriate product is available.
hypothesis: 一种流感疫苗产品比另一种流感疫苗产品没有优惠建议，对于一种以上有许可、推荐和适当产品的人。

source: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
hypothesis: 考虑到Covid-19全球大流行的情况，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险，尽量减少对Covid-19防控的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗接种的优先次序如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士、公共卫生专业人员、检疫专业人员； 生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体和照顾弱势群体的工作人员； 人们在人口密度高的地方工作或停留，如幼儿园、中小学的师生、囚犯和监狱工作人员； 其他流感高危人群，包括≥ 60岁成人、6-59岁儿童、特定慢性病患者、< 6个月婴儿的家人和看护人，以及计划在流感季节怀孕的孕妇或妇女。

source: Children aged 6 months through 8 years require 2 doses of influenza vaccine administered a minimum of 4 weeks apart during their first season of vaccination for optimal protection.
hypothesis: 6个月至8岁的儿童需要接种2剂流感疫苗，在接种第一季至少间隔4周，以达到最佳保护。

source: People whoever get IIV or LAIV all apply to the principle.
hypothesis: 得到Iiv或Lav的人都适用该原则。

source: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
hypothesis: 本报告所述建议包括以下内容：疫苗接种点门诊(PoVs)应向所有6个月及以上愿意接种疫苗且无禁忌证的患者提供流感疫苗接种。

source: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
hypothesis: 接种流感疫苗应尽快接种。

source: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
hypothesis: 这些指导方针旨在供各级中华全国妇幼保健中心的工作人员使用，他们致力于防治流感、预防疫情、医疗保健工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。

source: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
hypothesis: 随着新证据的出现，这些准则将定期更新。

source: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
hypothesis: 流感病毒感染是一种严重影响人体健康的呼吸道传染病。

source: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
hypothesis: 流感病毒可能具有频繁的抗原变异和变化，这可能导致迅速和广泛的传播，导致学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共聚集地的年度流行和暴发。

source: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
hypothesis: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是流感病毒感染相关的重病和死亡的高危人群。

source: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
hypothesis: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，Covid-19大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病同时传播。

source: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
hypothesis: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。

source: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
hypothesis: 第五，2020-2021流感季节的流感疫苗接种建议。

source: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 8岁以上人群需要1剂流感疫苗。

source: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
hypothesis: 建议人们在10月底前接种流感疫苗。

source: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
hypothesis: 对于10月底前无法接种疫苗的群众，全季将继续提供流感疫苗接种。

source: Influenza vaccine is also recommended for use in pregnant women during any trimester.
hypothesis: 流感疫苗也被推荐用于妊娠期的孕妇。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 在Kb-BAC1 /Kb-BAC2和J&W Db-ALC1 /Db-ALC2气相色谱柱的不同检测条件下，探讨了卤代羟基-烷烃对血样乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 使用Kb-BAC1 /Kb-BAC2气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

source: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
hypothesis: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地鉴别干扰。

source: To evaluate the effectiveness of cement-injectable cannulated pedicle screw combined with multiple level Schwab grade Ⅰ osteotomy for chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures with kyphosis.
hypothesis: 目的评价骨水泥注射空心椎弓根螺钉联合多节段施瓦布I级截骨术治疗慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折合并脊柱后凸的有效性。

source: The incisions healed by first intention in 26 cases, and 1 incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood glucose control.
hypothesis: 一期愈合切口26例，换药后1切口因血糖控制不佳愈合。

source: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.
hypothesis: 无褥疮、间叶性肺炎、深静脉血栓形成等并发症。

source: All patients were followed up 8-24 months, with an average of 16.6 months.
hypothesis: 全部患者随访8-24个月，平均16.6个月。

source: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
hypothesis: 回顾性分析2015年6月至2017年6月期间治疗的27例症状性慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折合并脊柱后凸患者的临床资料。

source: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).
hypothesis: 其中男性8例，女性19例，平均年龄69.5岁(56 ～ 81岁)。

source: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 然而，这些药物是通过玻璃体内注射与视力威胁并发症相关的。

source: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 然而，这些药物是通过玻璃体内注射与视力威胁并发症相关的。

source: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.
hypothesis: 因此，人们对开发用于抗VEGF剂到眼后段的持续递送平台非常感兴趣。

source: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.
hypothesis: 这些包括不可生物降解的植入物，纳米制剂和水凝胶。

source: The characteristics of an ideal sustained delivery platform will then be discussed.
hypothesis: 然后将讨论理想的持续交付平台的特点。

source: Through the above, this review attempts to provide an overview of the sustained delivery platforms in their various phases of development.
hypothesis: 通过以上所述，本次审查试图概述其各个发展阶段的持续交付平台。

source: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.
hypothesis: 抗血管内皮生长因子（抗VEGF）已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。

source: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
hypothesis: 这些包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性（n-AMD），增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变（PDR）和视网膜静脉阻塞（RVO）。

source: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
hypothesis: 这些并发症中最令人担忧的是眼内炎，一种严重的眼部感染，视力效果极差。

source: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
hypothesis: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须在达到所需的治疗效果之前进行多次注射。

source: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.
hypothesis: 近年来，已经有了各种概念化的策略。

source: In this review, the barriers of drug delivery to the posterior segment of the eye will be explained.
hypothesis: 在这篇综述中，将解释药物输送到眼后段的障碍。

source: Finally, the current available strategies will be analysed with the above-mentioned characteristics in mind to determine the advantages and disadvantages of each sustained drug delivery modality.
hypothesis: 最后，将根据上述特征分析当前可用的策略，以确定每种持续给药方式的优缺点。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字口腔修复技术通过提高假体质量，增加新型修复体，将修复体的制造方法从手工制作改为计算机辅助制造，为牙科实验室带来新的操作模式，为中国的口腔修复技术带来了巨大变化，并促进口腔修复技术的学术地位。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology still has some problems, such as insufficient precision for some manufacturing methods and shortage of professionals.
hypothesis: 数字口腔修复技术仍然存在一些问题，例如某些制造方法的精度不足以及专业人员短缺。

source: Technicians and administrators of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems and seize the opportunities, to improve the level of prosthodontic technology and train the highly educated professionals.
hypothesis: 口腔修复技术的技术人员和管理人员应面对问题，抓住机遇，提高口腔修复技术水平，培养受过高等教育的专业人员。

source: At the same time, attentions should be payed to the advantages of the traditional prosthodontic technology while grasping the development of the digital prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 同时，在掌握数字口腔修复技术的发展的同时，应该关注传统口腔修复技术的优势。

source: The dentists and the dental technicians should learn together and enhance communication to each other, to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.
hypothesis: 牙医和牙科技术人员应该共同学习，加强沟通，促进中国数字口腔修复技术的进步。

source: Scarce qualitative literature has focused on understanding the perspective of parents of adolescents involved in crime, and no prior literature has examined how the status of being a parent of an adolescent who is involved in delinquency intersects with being an immigrant parent.
hypothesis: 稀缺的定性文献侧重于理解参与犯罪的青少年父母的观点，以前的文献没有研究过作为参与犯罪的青少年父母的地位与作为移民父母的地位如何相交。

source: The current phenomenological study examined, through the eyes of immigrant parents, how they comprehend their children's involvement in delinquent behavior.
hypothesis: 目前的现象学研究通过移民父母的眼睛研究了他们如何理解他们的孩子参与违法行为。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 本研究调查了来自以色列前苏联的14名移民父母（10名母亲和4名父亲）对在犯罪青年康复设施接受治疗的儿童进行的深入半结构式访谈。

source: Data analysis revealed a gradual decline in children's behavior ascribed to the developmental stage of adolescence, the pressures of immigration, and cultural conflict.
hypothesis: 数据分析显示，由于青春期的发展阶段，移民的压力和文化冲突，儿童的行为逐渐下降。

source: These three factors are interwoven together to create a fabric within which they see their children turning to crime.
hypothesis: 这三个因素交织在一起，形成一个织物，在其中他们看到他们的孩子转向犯罪。

source: Parents' gradual loss of control is balanced by attempts to idealize the parent-child relationship and to minimize the severity of the offenses committed.
hypothesis: 父母逐渐失去控制权是通过试图理想化亲子关系并尽量减少所犯犯罪的严重程度来平衡的。

source: They describe various differing and even contradictory experiences of themselves as parents and their struggles to piece together incohesive, alternating experiences of themselves as parents.
hypothesis: 他们将自己作为父母的各种不同甚至矛盾的经历描述为他们努力将自己作为父母的不连贯，交替的经历拼凑在一起。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 本研究调查了来自以色列前苏联的14名移民父母（10名母亲和4名父亲）对在犯罪青年康复设施接受治疗的儿童进行的深入半结构式访谈。

source: Despite the critical role they can play in their children's rehabilitation, as well as the distress that they themselves experience, parents of children involved in delinquent behavior have often been ignored in research.
hypothesis: 尽管他们可以在孩子的康复中发挥关键作用，以及他们自己经历的痛苦，但参与违法行为的孩子的父母往往在研究中被忽视。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
hypothesis: 在过去十年中，报告的手持式激光诱发黄斑病变（HLIM）病例急剧增加，由于不受管制的在线访问高功率激光器，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。

source: It is critical therefore to recognise the clinical and multimodal imaging characteristics of this important and potentially devastating condition.
hypothesis: 因此，认识到这种重要且可能具有破坏性的病症的临床和多模式成像特征至关重要。

source: As HLIM patients are typically young, unique issues need to be considered, such as delayed presentation, difficult history, poor compliance and behavioural or psychiatric comorbidity.
hypothesis: 由于HLIM患者通常年轻，因此需要考虑独特的问题，例如延迟介绍，病史困难，依从性差以及行为或精神病合并症。

source: In addition, we present a unique case of HLIM, resembling the presentation of a placoid disease variant and illustrating choroidal ischaemia using advanced retinal imaging, that offers further insight into the mechanisms of laser injury and its complications.
hypothesis: 此外，我们提出了一个独特的HLIM病例，类似于盘状病变的表现，并使用先进的视网膜成像说明脉络膜缺血，这为激光损伤及其并发症的机制提供了进一步的见解。

source: The issues addressed in this review aim to increase recognition of an increasingly important and trending condition with potentially profound visual complications.
hypothesis: 本评价所涉及的问题旨在提高对日益重要和趋势的认识，并可能带来深刻的视觉并发症。

source: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.
hypothesis: 尽管HLIM具有独特的临床特征，但并不罕见，它可能会伪装成其他视网膜疾病。

source: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.
hypothesis: 本文将回顾激光损伤的临床和诊断特征，特别强调多模式视网膜发现。

source: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).
hypothesis: 本综述评估了继发于视网膜分支静脉阻塞（BRVO）的黄斑水肿管理的真实证据。

source: Baseline characteristics, visual, anatomical and safety outcomes were recorded.
hypothesis: 记录基线特征，视觉，解剖和安全性结果。

source: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).
hypothesis: 本综述评估了继发于视网膜分支静脉阻塞（BRVO）的黄斑水肿管理的真实证据。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
hypothesis: 计算随机效应模型的加权平均值和加权估计值，用于6,12和24个月时的视敏度（VA）和中心子场厚度（CST）变化。

source: Ocular and systemic adverse events were discussed in 79% and 42% of treatment arms respectively, with possible under-reporting.
hypothesis: 分别有79%和42%的治疗组讨论了眼部和全身不良事件，可能报告不足。

source: Visual and anatomical gains achieved in the real-world for anti-VEGF therapy were not as impressive as seminal RCTs, possibly due to reduced injection frequency in the real world and differences in baseline characteristics.
hypothesis: 在现实世界中实现的抗VEGF治疗的视觉和解剖学增益并不像开创性的随机对照试验那样令人印象深刻，这可能是由于现实世界中注射频率降低和基线特征差异所致。

source: Primary outcome was change in VA (logMAR letters) at 12 months.
hypothesis: 主要结果是12个月时VA（logMAR信件）的变化。

source: The mean baseline VA for the pooled data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the mean baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) µm.
hypothesis: 汇总数据的平均基线VA为54.0（51.5,56.5）个字母，平均基线CST为501.3（483.5519.1） µm。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
hypothesis: 计算随机效应模型的加权平均值和加权估计值，用于6,12和24个月时的视敏度（VA）和中心子场厚度（CST）变化。

source: There is an urgent need for consensus on the minimum efficacy, treatment burden and safety data to collect to strengthen the real-world evidence base.
hypothesis: 迫切需要就收集的最低效力，治疗负担和安全性数据达成共识，以加强现实世界的证据基础。

source: A meta-analysis of 2530 eyes from 48 real-world studies of therapies for macular oedema secondary to BRVO was conducted.
hypothesis: 对来自48个现实世界BRVO继发性黄斑水肿治疗研究的2530只眼进行了荟萃分析。

source: Study quality was assessed using the quality appraisal checklist for case series developed by Institute of Health Economics.
hypothesis: 使用卫生经济研究所开发的病例系列质量评估清单评估研究质量。

source: The quality of studies varied considerably.
hypothesis: 研究质量差异很大。

source: The clinical data of 48 patients with unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures who met the selection criteria between June 2014 and December 2019 were retrospectively analyzed.
hypothesis: 回顾性分析2014年6月至2019年12月符合选择标准的48例不稳定型前盆腔环骨折患者的临床资料。

source: Among them, 21 cases were treated with INFIX (INFIX group), and 27 cases were treated with plate (plate group).
hypothesis: 其中，INFIX治疗21例（INFIX组），plate治疗27例（plate组）。

source: There was no significant difference in gender, age, body mass index, cause of injury, time from injury to operation, Injury Severity Score (ISS), and fracture type between the two groups (  The patients in both groups were followed up for an average of 12.5 months (range, 6-16 months).
hypothesis: 两组患者的性别，年龄，体重指数，损伤原因，从受伤到手术的时间，损伤严重程度评分（ISS）和骨折类型无显着差异（两组患者均随访平均12.5个月（范围6-16个月）。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
hypothesis: 比较前皮下骨盆内固定器（INFIX）和钢板内固定治疗不稳定型骨盆前环骨折的疗效。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
hypothesis: 比较前皮下骨盆内固定器（INFIX）和钢板内固定治疗不稳定型骨盆前环骨折的疗效。

source: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.
hypothesis: 比较机器人系统辅助椎弓根螺钉置入与上胸外科徒手椎弓根螺钉置入的安全性和准确性。

source: There was no significant difference in age, gender composition, body mass index, disease type, number of screws implanted, and segmental distribution between the two groups (  The operation time of group A was significantly longer than that in group B (  Compared with traditional freehand pedicle screw placement, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement significantly improves the accuracy and safety of screw placement without increasing the bleeding and postoperative drainage.
hypothesis: 两组患者的年龄，性别构成，体重指数，疾病类型，植入螺钉数量和节段分布无显着差异（A组手术时间明显长于B组（与传统徒手椎弓根螺钉置入，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入显着提高了螺钉置入的准确性和安全性，而不会增加出血和术后引流。

source: Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, including 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).
hypothesis: 2017年12月至2019年12月，本研究纳入39例上胸椎椎弓根螺钉内固定，其中机器人组19例（A组，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入），徒手组20例（B组，徒手椎弓根螺钉放置）。

source: There were 104 screws implanted in group A and 108 screws in group B.
hypothesis: A组植入104颗螺钉，B组植入108颗螺钉。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 使用KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚，异氟醚和乙醇的保留时间相似，尤其是七氟醚和乙醇的保留时间，七氟醚明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

source: Conclusion Halogenated hydroxy-alkanes interfere with determination of ethanol content in blood by headspace gas chromatography.
hypothesis: 结论卤代羟基烷烃干扰顶空气相色谱法测定血液中乙醇含量。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法采用顶空气相色谱-双柱确证检测法分析卤代羟基烷烃。

source: Objective To study the influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes inhalation anesthetic on the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 目的研究卤代羟基烷烃吸入麻醉剂对血液中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法采用顶空气相色谱-双柱确证检测法分析卤代羟基烷烃。

source: Results The retention time of sevoflurane and enflurane was similar to that of ethanol and tert butanol respectively when using the J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column, and interfered with the detection of ethanol content in blood; only J&W DB-ALC1 gas chromatographic column can separate the sevoflurane and ethanol components, so as to eliminate their influence on the detection of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 结果使用J＆W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱时，七氟醚和恩氟烷的保留时间分别与乙醇和叔丁醇的保留时间相似，干扰了血液中乙醇含量的检测；只有J＆W DB-ALC1气相色谱柱可以分离七氟醚和乙醇成分，以消除它们对血液中乙醇含量检测的影响。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 在KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2和J＆W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2气相色谱柱的不同检测条件下，研究了卤代羟基烷烃对顶空气相色谱法测定血样中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
hypothesis: 流感病毒可以具有频繁的抗原变异和变化，这可以导致快速和广泛的传播，导致在学校，幼儿园和疗养院等公共场所的年度流行病和爆发。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
hypothesis: 根据世界卫生组织的估计，季节性流感疫情每年造成300万至500万例严重病例，全球死亡29万至65万人。

source: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
hypothesis: 孕妇，幼儿，老年人和慢性病患者患流感病毒感染的严重疾病和死亡风险很高。

source: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
hypothesis: 特别是，在未来的冬季春季，新型冠状病毒肺炎大流行可能与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。

source: Currently, China has licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3) which includes split-virus influenza vaccine and subunit vaccine, quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV4) which is split, and trivalent live attenuated influenza vaccine (LAIV3) which was newly licensed.
hypothesis: 目前，中国已获得三价灭活流感疫苗（IIV3）许可，其中包括分裂病毒流感疫苗和亚单位疫苗，分裂的四价灭活流感疫苗（IIV4）和新许可的三价减毒活流感疫苗（LAIV3）。

source: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
hypothesis: 除少数主要城市外，流感疫苗属于一类Ⅱ 疫苗，这意味着流感疫苗接种是自愿的，接受者必须支付。

source: The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences especially studies of China, including disease burden, effectiveness, Vaccine-avoidable disease burden, vaccine safety monitoring, and cost-effectiveness and cost-benefit.
hypothesis: 本版本的主要更新包括：首先，新的研究证据，特别是中国的研究，包括疾病负担，有效性，疫苗可避免的疾病负担，疫苗安全监测，成本效益和成本效益。

source: Thirdly, new type seasonal influenza vaccine licensed and issued in 2020-2021 in China.
hypothesis: 第三，新型季节性流感疫苗于2020-2021年在中国获得许可并颁发。

source: Fourth, northern hemisphere influenza vaccination composition for the 2020-2021 season which included trivalent and quadrivalent influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 第四，2020-2021年北半球流感疫苗接种组合物，其中包括三价和四价流感疫苗。

source: No preferential recommendation is made for one influenza vaccine product over another for persons for whom more than one licensed, recommended, and appropriate product is available.
hypothesis: 对于有多个许可，推荐和适当产品的人，不建议对一种流感疫苗产品优先于另一种流感疫苗产品。

source: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
hypothesis: 考虑到全球新型冠状病毒肺炎大流行的情况，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险并尽量减少对新型冠状病毒肺炎预防和控制的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗接种的以下优先事项：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士，公共卫生专业人员，检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体以及照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；人们在人口密度高的地方工作或逗留，如幼儿园，小学和中学的师生，囚犯和监狱工作人员；其他高危人群，包括成年人≥60岁，6-59个月的儿童，特定慢性病患者，6个月以下婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者，以及计划在流感季节怀孕的孕妇或妇女。
