source: The article considers the COVID-19 pandemic impact on the population mental health, the main psychogenic and somatogenic mental disorders associated with COVID-19 are distinguished.
hypothesis: В статье рассмотрено влияние пандемии COVID-19 на психическое здоровье населения и выделены основные психогенные и соматогенные психические расстройства, ассоциируемые с COVID-19.

source: The comorbid PTSD clinical features are described.
hypothesis: Описаны клинические особенности коморбидного ПТСР.

source: The mental health risk factors for health workers are presented.
hypothesis: Представлены факторы риска для психического здоровья медицинских работников.

source: The psychotherapeutic and psychopharmaceutical approaches are proposed.
hypothesis: Предложены психотерапевтический и психофармацевтический подходы.

source: However, despite successful use of lithium in the treatment of affective disorders for almost 40 years, the mechanisms of its therapeutic action are still poorly understood.
hypothesis: Однако, несмотря на успешное применение лития в лечении аффективных расстройств в течение почти 40 лет, механизмы его терапевтического действия до сих пор плохо изучены.

source: This review presents and summarizes the current literature about the use of lithium in treatment of affective disorders, as well as its effects on cellular physiology, with a separate description of the effect of this ion on the functioning of nerve tissue and ion-molecular mechanisms.
hypothesis: В данном обзоре представлена и обобщена современная литература об использовании лития в лечении аффективных расстройств, а также его влиянии на клеточную физиологию, с отдельным описанием влияния этого иона на функционирование нервной ткани и ионно-молекулярные механизмы.

source: Inducing of pathological autoimmune response contributes to the development of Miller Fischer and Guillain-Barré syndrome.
hypothesis: Индуцирование патологического аутоиммунного ответа способствует развитию синдрома Миллера-Фишера и Гийена-Барре.

source: The number of COVID-19 patients is increasing worldwide and the number of patients with neurological manifestations of a new coronavirus infection is increasing as well.
hypothesis: Во всем мире растет число пациентов с COVID-19, а также увеличивается число пациентов с неврологическими проявлениями новой коронавирусной инфекции.

source: Pathognomonic for COVID-19 is the presence of cephalgic syndrome, infectious-toxic encephalopathy, hypo- and anosmia and ageusia.
hypothesis: Патогномоничным для COVID-19 симптомом является наличие цефалгического синдрома, инфекционно-токсической энцефалопатии, гипосмии, аносмии и агевзии.

source: There is also a special form of COVID-19-associated stroke.
hypothesis: Существует также особая форма инсульта, ассоциированная с COVID-19.

source: Almost all post-COVID-19 patients complain of severe fatigue, emotional lability, and sometimes have features of asthenic-neurotic, anxiety-phobic disorders and apato-abulic syndromes, which require rehabilitation measures, as well as courses of restorative neurotrophic and nootropic therapy.
hypothesis: Почти все пациенты, перенесшие COVID-19, жалуются на сильную усталость, эмоциональную лабильность, а иногда имеют признаки астено-невротических, тревожно-фобических расстройств и апато-абулического синдрома, требующих реабилитационных мероприятий, а также курсов восстановительной нейротрофической и ноотропной терапии.

source: The features of vertebral pain (VP) and quality of life in postmenopausal women were analyzed depending on the number and location of vertebral fractures (VF).
hypothesis: Проанализированы особенности вертебрального болевого синдрома (ВБС) и качества жизни у женщин в постменопаузе в зависимости от количества и локализации переломов позвонков (ПП).

source: Most indices of 11-component Numerical Rating Scale at the thoracic spine were significantly higher only in females with two or more VF.
hypothesis: Большинство показателей 11-компонентной числовой рейтинговой шкалы в грудном отделе позвоночника были значительно выше только у женщин с двумя и более ПП.

source: In patients with thoracic spine fractures most parameters of VP measured at this level were significantly higher compared to control values, whereas in patients with lumbar spine fractures most indices did not differ from the corresponding parameters in subjects without fractures.
hypothesis: У пациенток с переломами грудного отдела позвоночника большинство параметров ВБC, измеренных на этом уровне, были достоверно выше контрольных значений, тогда как у пациенток с переломами поясничного отдела позвоночника большинство показателей не отличались от соответствующих параметров у субъектов без переломов.

source: It was found that the intensity of pain in thoracic and lumbar spines, according to McGill pain index, was significantly higher in patients with two or more VF compared to women without any fractures, and absence of differences in subjects with a single VF.
hypothesis: Было обнаружено, что интенсивность боли в грудном и поясничном отделах позвоночника, согласно опроснику Мак-Гилла по установлению интенсивности боли, была достоверно выше у пациенток с двумя и более ПП по сравнению с женщинами без переломов, а при единичном ПП различия у субъектов отсутствовали.

source: There were no established significant differences of quality of life indices according to the EuroQol-5D questionnaire in senior women depending on the number and location of VF, while disturbances of daily activity parameters according to the Roland-Morris questionnaire were found in patients with 2 or more VF.
hypothesis: Существенных различий в показателях качества жизни по опроснику EuroQol-5D у женщин старшего возраста в зависимости от количества и расположения ПП не выявлено, а у пациенток с 2 и более ПП выявлены нарушения параметров повседневной деятельности по опроснику Роланда-Морриса.

source: Novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19, besides affecting the respiratory system, may lead to central and peripheral nervous system disorders and also cause muscular symptoms.
hypothesis: Новый коронавирус SARS-CoV-2 и COVID-19, помимо воздействия на дыхательную систему, могут приводить к нарушениям центральной и периферической нервной системы, а также вызывать мышечные симптомы.

source: The authors review the literature and own clinical case with respect to nervous system involvement in COVID-19 patients.
hypothesis: Авторы анализируют литературу и собственный клинический случай в отношении вовлечения нервной системы у пациентов с COVID-19.

source: There is a correlation between the severity of COVID-19 and the severity and frequency of neurologic complications.
hypothesis: Существует корреляция между тяжестью COVID-19 и степенью и частотой неврологических осложнений.

source: Severe neurologic symptoms are primarily observed in patients with severe COVID-19.
hypothesis: Серьезные неврологические симптомы в первую очередь наблюдаются у пациентов с тяжелым течением COVID-19.

source: Neurologic-associated symptoms may include stroke, acute necrotizing encephalopathy, and Guillen-Barre syndrome.
hypothesis: Неврологические симптомы могут включать инсульт, острую некротизирующую энцефалопатию и синдром Гийена-Барре.

source: Diseases that potentially aggravate COVID-19 and increase the risk of neurologic complications include arterial hypertension, diabetes, chronic diseases of the heart and respiratory system.
hypothesis: Заболевания, которые потенциально усугубляют COVID-19 и повышают риск неврологических осложнений, включают артериальную гипертензию, диабет, хронические заболевания сердца и дыхательной системы.

source: The probable impact of human coronaviruses on chronic and progressive diseases of the nervous system with particular respect to multiple sclerosis is reviewed.
hypothesis: Рассмотрено вероятное влияние коронавирусов человека на хронические и прогрессирующие заболевания нервной системы, особенно в отношении рассеянного склероза.

source: A triage plan for stroke and MS patients during the COVID-19 pandemic, depending on the risk of coronavirus infection, is presented.
hypothesis: Представлен план сортировки пациентов, перенесших инсульт, и пациентов с РС во время пандемии COVID-19 в зависимости от риска заражения коронавирусом.

source: New prospects associated with the use of laser radiation of different wavelengths in the ultraviolet (365 nm) and the green emission spectrum (525 nm) have appeared in recent years.
hypothesis: В последние годы появились новые перспективы, связанные с использованием лазерного излучения разных длин волн в ультрафиолетовом (365 нм) и зеленом спектре излучения (525 нм).

source: The high prevalence of the trophic leg ulcers necessitates the search for more effective methods of conservative treatment.
hypothesis: Высокая распространенность трофических язв нижних конечностей обуславливает необходимость поиска более эффективных методов консервативного лечения.

source: Development and scientific justification for the low-intensity laser radiation of different wavelengths combined use in patients with trophic leg ulcers and chronic venous insufficiency (CVI). 102 patients with trophic leg ulcers and CVI were examined.
hypothesis: Разработка и научное обоснование комбинированного применения низкоинтенсивного лазерного излучения разных длин волн у пациентов с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне хронической венозной недостаточности (ХВН). Обследованы 102 пациента с трофическими язвами нижних конечностей на фоне ХВН.

source: They were divided into 3 equal groups using simple randomization.
hypothesis: Они были разделены на 3 равные группы методом простой рандомизации.

source: Patients in the control group received only traditional conservative therapy; comparison group - traditional conservative therapy and an intravenous laser blood irradiation (ILBI) (λ - 635 nm); the main group - traditional conservative therapy and different wavelengths laser therapy (LT) course.
hypothesis: В контрольной группе пациенты получали только традиционную консервативную терапию, в группе сравнения — традиционную консервативную терапию и курс процедур внутривенного лазерного облучения крови (ВЛОК) (λ — 635 нм); в основной группе — традиционную консервативную терапию и курс процедур лазеротерапии (ЛТ) разных длин волн.

source: A more significant improvement in the clinical condition occurred under the influence of the course application of combined different wavelengths laser therapy in patients with trophic venous leg ulcers.
hypothesis: Более значительное улучшение клинического состояния произошло под воздействием курсового применения комбинированной лазеротерапии разной длины волны у больных с трофическими венозными язвами нижних конечностей.

source: Compared to patients who received traditional conservative therapy and in combination with ILBI 635 nm, the speed of reparative regeneration of trophic ulcers increased, the time for cleansing trophic ulcers from devitalized tissues was reduced.
hypothesis: По сравнению с пациентами, получавшими традиционную консервативную терапию и в комплексе с ВЛОК 635 нм, увеличивалась скорость репаративной регенерации трофических язв, сокращалось время очищения трофических язв от девитализированных тканей.

source: Computer capillaroscopy data showed that the positive effect of laser exposure on all parts of the microcirculation underlies its therapeutic efficacy.
hypothesis: Данные компьютерной капилляроскопии показали, что в основе терапевтической эффективности лазерного воздействия лежит его положительное влияние на все звенья микроциркуляции.

source: The WHO Classification of Digestive System Tumors (WHO, 5th Edition, 2019) presents new provisions on the morphological, molecular genetic, and therapeutic aspects of hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).
hypothesis: Классификация ВОЗ опухолей пищеварительной системы (ВОЗ, 5-е издание, 2019 г.) представляет новые положения о морфологических, молекулярно-генетических и терапевтических аспектах гепатоцеллюлярной карциномы (ГЦК).

source: This classification versus the 2010 edition underwent substantial changes.
hypothesis: В классификации произошли значительные изменения по сравнению с редакцией 2010 г.

source: Undifferentiated carcinoma (ICD-0: 8020/3) was excluded.
hypothesis: Недифференцированная карцинома (МКБ-0: 8020/3) была исключена.

source: The TNM staging system introduces additional gradations.
hypothesis: Система стадирования TNM вводит дополнительные градации.

source: Based on new evidence, HCC types and subtypes (scirrhous, clear cell, steatohepatic, and others) were identified depending on gene mutations according to ICD-11.
hypothesis: На основе новых данных типы и подтипы ГЦК (скиррозный, светлоклеточный, стеатогепатический и другие) были идентифицированы в зависимости от генных мутаций в соответствии с МКБ-11.

source: The classification changes are of not only important theoretical, but also applied significance.
hypothesis: Изменения в классификации имеют не только важное теоретическое, но и прикладное значение.

source: These are valuable for oncologists and pathologists.
hypothesis: Они важны для онкологов и патологоанатомов.

source: To evaluate the effectiveness of use of low-frequency «thresholdless» transcranial magnetic stimulation in the treatment of patients in acute period of ischemic stroke.
hypothesis: Оценить эффективность применения низкочастотной «беспороговой» транскраниальной магнитной стимуляции в лечении пациентов в остром периоде ишемического инсульта.

source: As you know, complete successful recovery in stroke patients occurs only in 8% of cases, 20% need constant care.
hypothesis: Как известно, полное успешное выздоровление у пациентов с инсультом происходит только в 8% случаев, 20% нуждаются в постоянном уходе.

source: The use of innovative rehabilitation technologies, namely «thresholdless» low-frequency transcranial magnetic stimulation, will speed up the process of restoring impaired functions, increase independence in everyday life and, accordingly, the quality of life.
hypothesis: Использование инновационных реабилитационных технологий, а именно «беспороговой» низкочастотной транскраниальной магнитной стимуляции, ускорит процесс восстановления нарушенных функций, повысит самостоятельность в повседневной жизни и, соответственно, качество жизни.

source: The study included 93 patients aged from 49 to 68 years on second-third days of ischemic stroke.
hypothesis: В исследование были включены 93 пациента в возрасте от 49 до 68 лет на второй-третий день ишемического инсульта.

source: The 1st (main) group
hypothesis: 1-я (основная) группа

source: This article deals with the bibliographic information relating to the Saratov period of life of Alexander Nikolayevich Bakulev, his scientific and practical activity at the Department of Hospital Surgery of the Saratov Medical University under the leadership of the Department's founder, Sergey Ivanovich Spasokukotsky having exerted the key influence on the formation of A.N. Bakulev as a surgeon and scientist.
hypothesis: В статье рассматриваются библиографические сведения о саратовском периоде жизни Александра Николаевича Бакулева, его научно-практической деятельности на кафедре госпитальной хирургии Саратовского медицинского университета под руководством основателя кафедры Сергея Ивановича Спасокукоцкого, оказавшей ключевое влияние на становление А.Н. Бакулева как хирурга и ученого.

source: The measurement of the film thickness of the composite cement Variolink Esthetic («Ivoclar-Vivadent», Liechtenstein) and the microhybrid composite Enamel («Micerium», Italy) was carried out according to ISO 4049: 2009 standards with a load force of 5 kg.
hypothesis: Измерение толщины пленки композитного цемента Variolink Esthetic («Ivoclar-Vivadent», Лихтенштейн) и микрогибридного композитного материала Enamel («Micerium», Италия) проводилось по стандартам ISO 4049:2009 с силой нагрузки в 5 кг.

source: After preheating, the film thickness was changed from 23 microns (at 15 kg) to 44 microns (at 5 kg).
hypothesis: После предварительного нагрева толщина пленки была изменена с 23 мкм (при 15 кг) до 44 мкм (при 5 кг).

source: One of the promising geroprotectors restoring the pineal melatonin synthesis is the AEDG (Ala-Glu-Asp-Gly) peptide.
hypothesis: Одним из перспективных геропротекторов, восстанавливающих синтез мелатонина шишковидной железой, является пептид AEDG (Ала-Глу-Асп-Гли).

source: AEDG peptide increases in 1,7 times the 6-sulfatoxymelatonin (6-SOMT) excretion in the urine of middle-aged people.
hypothesis: Пептид AEDG увеличивает в 1,7 раза экскрецию 6-сульфатоксимелатонина (6-СОМТ) с мочой у людей среднего возраста.

source: Moreover, AEDG peptide normalized circadian Clock and Csnk1e genes hyper expression in leukocytes in 1,9-2,1 times and increases the Cry2 gene hypo expression in peripheral blood lymphocytes in 2 times in people with reduced melatonin-producing epiphysis function.
hypothesis: Кроме того, пептид AEDG нормализует повышенную экспрессию циркадных генов Clock и Csnk1e в лейкоцитах в 1,9–2,1 раза и повышает сниженную гипоэкспрессию гена Cry2 в лимфоцитах периферической крови в 2 раза у людей со сниженной мелатонин-продуцирующей функцией эпифиза.

source: The geroprotective effect of the AEDG peptide is based on its ability to restore the epiphysis melatonin-producing function by means regulation of human circadian genes expression.
hypothesis: Геропротекторный эффект пептида AEDG основан на его способности восстанавливать мелатонин-продуцирующую функцию эпифиза посредством регуляции экспрессии циркадных генов человека.

source: Night work provides biorhythms desynchronization, disorder of melatonin-producing function and accelerated pineal gland aging.
hypothesis: Работа в ночное время приводит к десинхронизации биоритмов, нарушению выработки мелатонина и преждевременному старению эпифиза.

source: To date, descriptive results of a clinical and morphological study of novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection, mainly of the lungs, have appeared.
hypothesis: На сегодняшний день появились описательные результаты клинико-морфологического исследования новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19, преимущественно касательно легких.

source: However, in other organs, primarily in the cardiovascular system, there are substantial structural changes that lead to multiple organ dysfunction and contribute to death.
hypothesis: Однако в других органах, прежде всего в сердечно-сосудистой системе, происходят значительные структурные изменения, которые приводят к полиорганной дисфункции и вызывают летальный исход.

source: To analyze the thanatogenetic significance of novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection in different age and gender groups and to describe the main morphopathological manifestations in various organs.
hypothesis: Проанализировать танатогенетическую роль новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19 в разных возрастных и гендерных группах и описать основные морфопатологические проявления в различных органах.

source: The investigators carried out a comprehensive analysis of 700 autopsies of people disease from the novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection, which included an examination of gross changes reflected in the autopsy protocols and forensic medical examination reports, as well as that of microscopic changes detected during histological examination of organs.
hypothesis: Исследователи выполнили комплексный анализ 700 аутопсий пациентов с новой коронавирусной инфекцией COVID-19, включая изучение макроскопических изменений, отраженных в протоколах патолого-анатомических вскрытий и судебно-медицинских актах, а также микроскопических изменений, выявленных при гистологическом исследовании органов.

source: Immunohistochemistry (IHC) using mouse or rabbit antibodies to CD34, CD68, EMA, Ki67, caspase-3, and VEGF was employed in some observations.
hypothesis: В некоторых наблюдениях применялся метод иммуногистохимии (ИГХ) с использованием мышиных или кроличьих антител к маркерам CD34, CD68, EMA, Ki67, каспазе-3 и фактору роста эндотелия сосудов.

source: The novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection was the primary cause of death.
hypothesis: Основной причиной смерти стала новая коронавирусная инфекция COVID-19.

source: Acute respiratory and pulmonary heart failure and multiple organ dysfunction became the leading thanatogenetic mechanisms in COVID-19.
hypothesis: Ведущими танатогенетическими механизмами при COVID-19 стали острая дыхательная и легочно-сердечная недостаточность, полиорганная дисфункция.

source: Cardiovascular disease, diabetes mellitus, and obesity were the most common diseases in patients with COVID-19.
hypothesis: Наиболее частыми заболеваниями у больных с COVID-19 были сердечно-сосудистая патология, сахарный диабет и ожирение.

source: The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as by microcirculation disorders.
hypothesis: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.

source: Acute dyscirculatory and ischemic changes in the parenchymal organs dominated in tissue damage caused by the virus.
hypothesis: В паренхиматозных органах доминировали острые дисциркуляторные и ишемические изменения на фоне вирусного поражения тканей.

source: The changes in different organs of those who have died from the new coronavirus COVID-19 infection are stereotyped and include the manifestations of virus-induced action and a systemic inflammatory response with mainly microvasculature alteration, which leads to the development of coagulopathies and, accordingly, to total hypoxia.
hypothesis: Изменения в различных органах умерших от новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19 носят стереотипный характер и включают в себя проявления вирусиндуцированного действия и системного воспалительного ответа с преимущественно микроциркуляторным изменением, что приводит к развитию коагулопатий и, соответственно, к тотальной гипоксии.

source: We identified 28 countries with imported cases of COVID-19 as at 26 February 2020.
hypothesis: По состоянию на 26 февраля 2020 г. мы выявили 28 стран с завозными случаями COVID-19.

source: We modelled the risk of SARS-CoV-2 importation by estimating survival probability, expressing median time of importation as a function of effective distance.
hypothesis: Мы смоделировали риск передачи SARS-CoV-2, оценив вероятность выживания, выразив среднее время ввоза в виде функции эффективного расстояния.

source: To estimate the effect of airline travel restrictions on the risk of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) importation.
hypothesis: Оценить влияние ограничений авиаперевозок на риск ввоза тяжелого коронавируса с острым респираторным синдромом 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

source: We extracted passenger volume data for the entire global airline network, as well as the dates of the implementation of travel restrictions and the observation of the first case of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in each country or territory, from publicly available sources.
hypothesis: Мы получили из общедоступных источников данные об объеме пассажирских перевозок по всей глобальной сети авиакомпаний, а также о датах введения ограничений на поездки и наблюдения первого случая коронавирусной болезни (COVID-19) в каждой стране или территории.

source: We calculated effective distance between every airport and the city of Wuhan, China.
hypothesis: Мы рассчитали эффективное расстояние между каждым аэропортом и городом Ухань, Китай.

source: We calculated the relative change in importation risk under three different hypothetical scenarios that all resulted in different passenger volumes.
hypothesis: Мы рассчитали относительное изменение риска ввоза по трем различным гипотетическим сценариям, каждый из которых привел к разным объемам пассажиропотока.

source: The arrival time of the virus at these countries ranged from 39 to 80 days since identification of the first case in Wuhan.
hypothesis: Время прибытия вируса в эти страны колебалось от 39 до 80 дней с момента выявления первого случая в Ухане.

source: Our analysis of relative change in risk indicated that strategies of reducing global passenger volume and imposing travel restrictions at a further 10 hub airports would be equally effective in reducing the risk of importation of SARS-CoV-2; however, this reduction is very limited with a close-to-zero median relative change in risk.
hypothesis: Проведенный нами анализ относительного изменения риска показал, что стратегии сокращения глобального пассажиропотока и введения ограничений на поездки еще в 10 узловых аэропортах будут одинаково эффективны для снижения риска завоза SARS-CoV-2; однако это снижение очень ограничено с близким к нулю средним относительным изменением риска.

source: The hypothetical variations in observed travel restrictions were not sufficient to prevent the global spread of SARS-CoV-2; further research should also consider travel by land and sea.
hypothesis: Гипотетические различия в наблюдаемых ограничениях на поездки оказались недостаточными для предотвращения глобального распространения SARS-CoV-2; в дальнейших исследованиях следует также учесть путешествия по суше и морю.

source: Our study highlights the importance of strengthening local capacities for disease monitoring and control.
hypothesis: Наше исследование подчеркивает важность укрепления местного потенциала для мониторинга и контроля болезней.

source: In the paper published in issue 2 (2020) of the Burdenko's Journal of Neurosurgery, the authors justifiably propose a technique of bilateral extraintracranial vascular microanastomosis (EICMA) in case of rapidly developing stenotic lesions of the intracranial arteries in order to compensate the marked hypoperfusion in the basins of the anterior cerebral artery and middle cerebral artery on both sides.
hypothesis: В статье, опубликованной в № 2 (2020 г.) журнала «Вопросы нейрохирургии» Института нейрохирургии им. Бурденко, авторы обоснованно предлагают методику двустороннего экстраинтракраниального сосудистого микроанастомоза (ЭИКМА) при быстроразвивающемся стенозирующем поражении внутричерепных артерий с целью компенсации выраженной гипоперфузии в бассейнах передней мозговой артерии и средней мозговой артерии с обеих сторон.

source: This allows to significantly reduce the risks of possible ischemic stroke in the earliest period.
hypothesis: Это позволяет значительно снизить риски возможного ишемического инсульта на самом раннем сроке.

source: However, in other organs, primarily in the cardiovascular system, there are substantial structural changes that lead to multiple organ dysfunction and contribute to death.
hypothesis: Однако в других органах, прежде всего в сердечно-сосудистой системе, происходят значительные структурные изменения, которые приводят к полиорганной дисфункции и вызывают летальный исход.

source: To analyze the thanatogenetic significance of novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection in different age and gender groups and to describe the main morphopathological manifestations in various organs.
hypothesis: Проанализировать танатогенетическую роль новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19 в разных возрастных и гендерных группах и описать основные морфопатологические проявления в различных органах.

source: Acute respiratory and pulmonary heart failure and multiple organ dysfunction became the leading thanatogenetic mechanisms in COVID-19.
hypothesis: Ведущими танатогенетическими механизмами при COVID-19 стали острая дыхательная и легочно-сердечная недостаточность, полиорганная дисфункция.

source: Cardiovascular disease, diabetes mellitus, and obesity were the most common diseases in patients with COVID-19.
hypothesis: Наиболее частыми заболеваниями у больных с COVID-19 были сердечно-сосудистая патология, сахарный диабет и ожирение.

source: The most pronounced lung changes in COVID-19 were determined with a predominance of multiple total bilateral lesions of the lower lobes of the lungs, which was manifested by virus-induced changes in the parenchyma and stroma, as well as by microcirculation disorders.
hypothesis: Наиболее выраженные изменения в легких при COVID-19 определялись с преобладанием множественных общих двусторонних поражений нижних долей легких, что проявлялось вирусноиндуцированными изменениями паренхимы и стромы, а также нарушениями микроциркуляции.

source: To date, descriptive results of a clinical and morphological study of novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection, mainly of the lungs, have appeared.
hypothesis: На сегодняшний день появились описательные результаты клинико-морфологического исследования новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19, преимущественно касательно легких.

source: The investigators carried out a comprehensive analysis of 700 autopsies of people disease from the novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection, which included an examination of gross changes reflected in the autopsy protocols and forensic medical examination reports, as well as that of microscopic changes detected during histological examination of organs.
hypothesis: Исследователи выполнили комплексный анализ 700 аутопсий пациентов с новой коронавирусной инфекцией COVID-19, включая изучение макроскопических изменений, отраженных в протоколах патолого-анатомических вскрытий и судебно-медицинских актах, а также микроскопических изменений, выявленных при гистологическом исследовании органов.

source: Immunohistochemistry (IHC) using mouse or rabbit antibodies to CD34, CD68, EMA, Ki67, caspase-3, and VEGF was employed in some observations.
hypothesis: В некоторых наблюдениях применялся метод иммуногистохимии (ИГХ) с использованием мышиных или кроличьих антител к маркерам CD34, CD68, EMA, Ki67, каспазе-3 и фактору роста эндотелия сосудов.

source: The novel coronavirus COVID-19 infection was the primary cause of death.
hypothesis: Основной причиной смерти стала новая коронавирусная инфекция COVID-19.

source: Acute dyscirculatory and ischemic changes in the parenchymal organs dominated in tissue damage caused by the virus.
hypothesis: В паренхиматозных органах доминировали острые дисциркуляторные и ишемические изменения на фоне вирусного поражения тканей.

source: The changes in different organs of those who have died from the new coronavirus COVID-19 infection are stereotyped and include the manifestations of virus-induced action and a systemic inflammatory response with mainly microvasculature alteration, which leads to the development of coagulopathies and, accordingly, to total hypoxia.
hypothesis: Изменения в различных органах умерших от новой коронавирусной инфекции COVID-19 носят стереотипный характер и включают в себя проявления вирусиндуцированного действия и системного воспалительного ответа с преимущественно микроциркуляторным изменением, что приводит к развитию коагулопатий и, соответственно, к тотальной гипоксии.

source: AID is characterized by low serum ferritin and transferrin saturation (TS).
hypothesis: La CFA se caractérise par une faible saturation sérique en ferritine et en transferrine (ST).

source: FID is characterized by elevated serum ferritin, normal or low TS, and normal sTfR levels.
hypothesis: La CFF est caractérisée par une ferritine sérique élevée, une Tf normale ou basse et des taux de sTfR normaux.

source: There are two types of ID : 1) absolute ID (AID), in case of decrease in iron reserves and circulating iron, or 2) functional ID (FID), in case of decrease in circulating iron, while reserves are preserved or increased.
hypothesis: Il existe deux types de CF : 1) la CF absolue (CFA), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer et du fer circulant, ou 2) la CF fonctionnelle (CFF), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer circulant, alors que les réserves sont préservées ou augmentées.

source: Iron deficiency in adults : to understand what biological evaluation should be carried out
hypothesis: Carence en fer chez l'adulte : déterminer l'évaluation biologique qui doit être réalisée

source: Iron is a major mineral in the human body.
hypothesis: Le fer est un minéral majeur dans le corps humain.

source: It participates in various metabolisms, including oxygen transport in hemoglobin.
hypothesis: Il participe à divers métabolismes, dont le transport de l’oxygène dans l’hémoglobine.

source: Iron deficiency (ID) is characterized by a deficit in circulating iron.
hypothesis: La carence en fer (CF) se caractérise par un déficit en fer circulant.

source: AID is mainly due to bleeding, usually gastrointestinal, while FID is linked to the inflammatory syndrome.
hypothesis: La CFA est principalement due à des saignements, généralement gastro-intestinaux, tandis que la CFF est liée au syndrome inflammatoire.

source: Hypochromic microcytic anemia is frequent.
hypothesis: L'anémie microcytaire hypochrome est fréquente.

source: Furthermore, C-reactive protein levels are high, and there is non-regenerative non-macrocytic anemia.
hypothesis: De plus, les niveaux de protéine C-réactive sont élevés et il existe une anémie non régénérative non macrocytaire.

source: New biological tests (serum hepcidin) may be useful in case of doubt.
hypothesis: De nouveaux tests biologiques (hepcidine sérique) peuvent être utiles en cas de doute.

source: However, they are not yet commonly used.
hypothesis: Cependant, ils ne sont pas encore couramment utilisés.

source: Visual prostheses aim at restoring useful vision to patients who have become blind.
hypothesis: Les prothèses visuelles visent à restaurer la vision utile des patients devenus aveugles.

source: This useful vision should enable them to regain autonomy in society for navigation, face recognition or reading.
hypothesis: Cette vision utile devrait leur permettre de retrouver leur autonomie dans la société pour la navigation, la reconnaissance faciale ou la lecture.

source: Other innovating strategies have obtained proofs of concepts in rodents but require a further validation in large animals prior to their evaluation on patients.
hypothesis: D'autres stratégies innovantes ont été démontrées sur les rongeurs, mais nécessitent une validation supplémentaire chez les grands animaux avant leur évaluation sur les patients.

source: Optogenetic therapy, an alternative strategy, has now reached the stage of clinical trials at the retinal level while moving forward at the cortical level.
hypothesis: Une stratégie alternative, la thérapie optogénétique, est désormais en phase d'essais cliniques au niveau de la rétine, puis au niveau cortical.

source: Various prostheses, in particular cortical prostheses, are currently in clinical trials for optic neuropathies (glaucoma).
hypothesis: Diverses prothèses, notamment corticales, font actuellement l'objet d'essais cliniques pour des neuropathies optiques (glaucome).

source: Vision restoration: science fiction or reality?
hypothesis: Restauration de la vision : science-fiction ou réalité ?

source: Two retinal prostheses have already obtained market authorization for patients affected by retinal dystrophies while a new device is in clinical trials for patients affected by age-related macular degeneration.
hypothesis: Deux prothèses rétiniennes ont déjà obtenu une autorisation de mise sur le marché pour les patients atteints de dystrophies rétiniennes, tandis qu'un nouveau dispositif fait l'objet d'essais cliniques pour les patients atteints de dégénérescence maculaire liée à l'âge.

source: Restoring vision should therefore become a reality for many patients even if this vision will not be as extensive and perfect as natural vision.
hypothesis: La restauration de la vision devrait donc devenir une réalité pour de nombreux patients même si cette vision ne sera pas aussi étendue et parfaite que la vision naturelle.

source: A model to predict SARS-CoV-2 infection based on the first three-month surveillance data in Brazil
hypothesis: Un modèle visant à prédire l'infection par le SRAS-CoV-2 selon les données de surveillance des trois premiers mois au Brésil

source: COVID-19 diagnosis is a critical problem, mainly due to the lack or delay in the test results.
hypothesis: Le diagnostic de la COVID-19 est un problème critique, principalement en raison de l'absence ou du retard des résultats des tests.

source: We analysed suspected patients reported to the National Surveillance System that corresponded to the following case definition: patients with respiratory symptoms and fever, who travelled to regions with local or community transmission or who had close contact with a suspected or confirmed case.
hypothesis: Nous avons analysé les patients suspects signalés au Système national de surveillance qui correspondaient à la définition de cas suivante : patients présentant des symptômes respiratoires et de la fièvre, ayant voyagé dans des régions de transmission locale ou communautaire ou ayant été en contact étroit avec un cas suspect ou confirmé.

source: Based on variables routinely collected, we obtained a multiple model using logistic regression.
hypothesis: Sur la base de variables recueillies régulièrement, nous avons obtenu un modèle multiple en utilisant la régression logistique.

source: With a data subset including 80% of patients from Sao Paulo (SP) and Rio Janeiro (RJ), we obtained a function which reached an AUC of 95.54% (95% CI: 94.41-96.67%) for the diagnosis of COVID-19 and accuracy of 90.1% (sensitivity 87.62% and specificity 92.02%).
hypothesis: Avec un sous-ensemble de données incluant 80 % de patients de Sao Paulo (SP) et de Rio Janeiro (RJ), nous avons obtenu une fonction qui a atteint une ASC de 95,54 % (IC à 95 % : 94,41 à 96,67 %) pour le diagnostic de la COVID-19 et une précision de 90,1 % (sensibilité 87,62 % et spécificité 92,02 %).

source: In a validation dataset including the other 20% of patients from SP and RJ, this model exhibited an AUC of 95.01% (92.51-97.5%) and accuracy of 89.47% (sensitivity 87.32% and specificity 91.36%).
hypothesis: Dans un ensemble de données de validation incluant les 20 % restants de patients de SP et RJ, ce modèle présentait une ASC de 95,01 % (92,51-97,5 %) et une précision de 89,47 % (sensibilité 87,32 % et spécificité 91,36 %).

source: We obtained a model suitable for the clinical diagnosis of COVID-19 based on routinely collected surveillance data.
hypothesis: Nous avons obtenu un modèle adapté au diagnostic clinique de la COVID-19 basé sur des données de surveillance recueillies automatiquement.

source: We aimed to obtain a model to predict SARS-CoV-2 infection in suspected patients reported to the Brazilian surveillance system.
hypothesis: Nous avons cherché à obtenir un modèle pour prédire l'infection par le SRAS-CoV-2 chez les patients suspects signalés au système de surveillance brésilien.

source: The area under the receiver operating characteristic curve (AUC) and accuracy indicators were used for validation.
hypothesis: La zone sous la courbe caractéristique de fonctionnement du récepteur (AUC) et les indicateurs de précision ont été utilisés pour la validation.

source: We described 1468 COVID-19 cases (confirmed by RT-PCR) and 4271 patients with other illnesses.
hypothesis: Nous avons décrit 1 468 cas de COVID-19 (confirmés par RT-PCR) et 4 271 patients atteints d'autres maladies.

source: In the older patient, it would be part of a whole organ disease with the onset of osteoarthritis.
hypothesis: Chez le patient âgé, cela ferait partie d'une maladie d'organe en phase terminale avec l'apparition de l'arthrose.

source: It is effective for pain relief and motion recovery.
hypothesis: Il est efficace pour soulager la douleur et la récupération motrice.

source: Although it produces postoperative instability, secondary reconstruction is not always required.
hypothesis: Bien qu'elle entraîne une instabilité postopératoire, la reconstruction secondaire n'est pas toujours nécessaire.

source: Degenerative lesions of the anterior cruciate ligament: a frequent but poorly understood phenomenon
hypothesis: Lésions dégénératives du ligament croisé antérieur : un phénomène fréquent, mais mal compris

source: Making more use of MRI, degenerative lesions of the anterior cruciate ligament are more frequently diagnosed.
hypothesis: L'utilisation poussée de l'IRM permet de diagnostiquer plus fréquemment les lésions dégénératives du ligament croisé antérieur.

source: Three separates entities are reported (mucoid degeneration, ganglion cyst and mucoid degeneration with ganglion cysts) but it is probably a continuum of the same degenerative process.
hypothesis: Trois entités distinctes sont rapportées (dégénérescence mucoïde, kyste ganglionnaire et dégénérescence mucoïde avec kystes ganglionnaires), mais il s'agit probablement d'un continuum du même processus dégénératif.

source: In middle aged individuals, it would result of repeated microtrauma in the setting of a narrow intercondylar notch and/or increased posterior tibial slope.
hypothesis: Chez les personnes d'âge moyen, cela se traduirait par des microtraumatismes répétés associés à une échancrure intercondylienne étroite et/ou à une augmentation de la pente tibiale postérieure.

source: Most cases are incidental findings.
hypothesis: La plupart des cas sont des découvertes fortuites.

source: For symptomatic patients, a complete resection of the ligament is our first option when conservative treatment failed.
hypothesis: Pour les patients symptomatiques, une résection complète du ligament est notre première option en cas d'échec du traitement conservateur.

source: As a practice example, the division of pediatric oncology from the Children's Hospital St. Gallen describes their use and experience of two different methods of integrative medicine on a daily basis.
hypothesis: À titre d'exemple pratique, la division d'oncologie pédiatrique de l'Hôpital des Enfants de St Gall décrit leur utilisation et leur expérience de deux méthodes différentes de médecine intégrative au quotidien.

source: Integrative medicine in pediatric oncology
hypothesis: Médecine intégrative en oncologie pédiatrique

source: This article provides an overview of the integrative medicine approach in pediatric oncology that combines conventional medicine with complementary therapies.
hypothesis: Cet article donne un aperçu de l'approche de médecine intégrative en oncologie pédiatrique qui combine la médecine conventionnelle avec des thérapies complémentaires.

source: However, this review article also shows the lack of studies dedicated to integrative medicine in pediatric oncology, particularly regarding efficacy and safety of the different applications.
hypothesis: Cependant, cet article de synthèse montre également le manque d'études consacrées à la médecine intégrative en oncologie pédiatrique, notamment en ce qui concerne l'efficacité et la sécurité des différentes applications.

source: New developments in systemic sclerosis-associated interstitial lung disease
hypothesis: Nouveaux développements dans la maladie pulmonaire interstitielle associée à la sclérodermie systémique

source: Interstitial lung disease is a frequent complication of systemic sclerosis and has now become the leading cause of death in this disorder.
hypothesis: La maladie pulmonaire interstitielle est une complication fréquente de la sclérodermie systémique et est devenue la principale cause de décès dans cette maladie.

source: It mainly occurs during the first five years after the diagnosis of systemic sclerosis.
hypothesis: Elle se survient principalement au cours des cinq premières années après le diagnostic de sclérodermie systémique.

source: The most common radio-pathological presentation is nonspecific interstitial pneumonia, followed by usual interstitial pneumonia.
hypothesis: La présentation radiopathologique la plus fréquente est la pneumonie interstitielle non spécifique, suivie de la pneumonie interstitielle habituelle.

source: Various risk factors are associated with the occurrence of interstitial lung disease, including the presence of anti-topoisomerase I antibodies (Scl-70) and the diffuse cutaneous form of systemic sclerosis.
hypothesis: Divers facteurs de risque sont associés à la survenue d'une pneumopathie interstitielle, notamment la présence d'anticorps anti-topoisomérase I (Scl-70) et la forme cutanée diffuse de la sclérodermie systémique.

source: The classical immunosuppressive treatment of systemic sclerosis-associated interstitial lung disease is evolving, as recent studies suggest a beneficial effect of biological agents such as rituximab and tocilizumab, and antifibrotic drugs such as nintedanib.
hypothesis: Le traitement immunosuppresseur classique de la pneumopathie interstitielle associée à la sclérodermie systémique évolue, car des études récentes suggèrent un effet bénéfique d’agents biologiques tels que le rituximab et le tocilizumab, et de médicaments antifibrotiques tels que le nintédanib.

source: A child having a hoarse, raspy or broken voice, is not normal.
hypothesis: Un enfant ayant une voix éraillée, rauque ou cassée, n’est pas normal.

source: Voice disorder in children : what can be done ?
hypothesis: Troubles de la voix chez l'enfant : que faire ?

source: Child voice problems are too often ignored and neglected.
hypothesis: Les problèmes de voix des enfants sont trop souvent ignorés et négligés.

source: Such problem should be treated as quickly as possible, as they have important academic and social consequences and significant implications for the choice of their future adult life.
hypothesis: Ces problèmes devraient être traités le plus rapidement possible, car ils ont des conséquences académiques et sociales importantes et une incidence non négligeable sur le choix de leur avenir en tant qu'adultes.

source: The problem must be solved before adolescence, because many professions and activities are not accessible to dysphonic children.
hypothesis: Le problème doit être résolu avant l'adolescence, car de nombreuses professions et activités ne sont pas accessibles aux enfants dysphoniques.

source: Our society gives a lot of importance to the voice, but curiously without having sufficient knowledge of vocal hygiene.
hypothesis: Notre société accorde beaucoup d'importance à la voix, mais curieusement sans avoir une connaissance suffisante de l'hygiène vocale.

source: Information and awareness among doctors and parents is paramount so that school-aged children can benefit from adequate treatment.
hypothesis: L’information et la sensibilisation des médecins et des parents sont primordiales pour que les enfants d’âge scolaire puissent bénéficier d’un traitement adéquat.

source: Depletion of myocyte' s adenosine triphosate (ATP) leads to an increase in intracellular calcium and myocyte death.
hypothesis: L'épuisement de l'adénosine triphosphate (ATP) des myocytes entraîne une augmentation du calcium intracellulaire et la mort des myocytes.

source: Rhabdomyolysis: early management
hypothesis: Rhabdomyolyse : prise en charge précoce

source: Rhabdomyolysis is defined by myalgia, potentially painful myoedema and muscular weakness due to death of muscular fiber in the striated muscle.
hypothesis: La rhabdomyolyse est définie par une myalgie, un myxœdème potentiellement douloureux et une faiblesse musculaire due à la dégradation de la fibre musculaire dans le muscle strié.

source: Frequent etiologies include physical effort, intoxication (alcohol, drugs and medication) and physical trauma.
hypothesis: Les étiologies fréquentes comprennent l’effort physique, l’intoxication (alcool, drogues et médicaments) et les traumatismes physiques.

source: Diagnosis relies on creatine kinase (CK) levels.
hypothesis: Le diagnostic repose sur les niveaux de créatine kinase (CK).

source: The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes an asymptomatic increased amount of CK as well as severe, life threatening complications such as acute renal failure and electrolyte disorders.
hypothesis: Le spectre clinique de la rhabdomyolyse comprend une augmentation asymptomatique du taux de CK ainsi que des complications graves, mettant en jeu le pronostic vital, telles que l'insuffisance rénale aiguë et les troubles électrolytiques.

source: Treatment is based on prevention and addressing complications.
hypothesis: Le traitement est basé sur la prévention et le traitement des complications.

source: The aim of our retrospective study is to analyse the results of endoscopic macro-clips used for closing intestinal breaches in the real life.
hypothesis: L'objectif de notre étude rétrospective est d'analyser les résultats des macro clips endoscopiques utilisés pour refermer les brèches intestinales dans la vie réelle.

source: Post-endoscopic, spontaneous perforations and surgical fistulas are included.
hypothesis: Les perforations post-endoscopiques spontanées et les fistules chirurgicales sont incluses.

source: Efficacy of macro-clips for perforations and fistulas following endoscopic or surgical procedures. Retrospective analysis of 25 consecutive cases
hypothesis: Efficacité des macro-clips pour les perforations et les fistules à la suite d'interventions endoscopiques ou chirurgicales. Analyse rétrospective de 25 cas consécutifs

source: Our results are compared with principal published series.
hypothesis: Nos résultats sont comparés aux principales séries publiées.

source: Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from endoscopic perforation, surgical fistula, invasive medical procedure or spontaneous perforation.
hypothesis: Entre 2010 et 2015, 25 patients consécutifs ont subi une suture endoscopique avec des macro-clips afin de sceller une brèche résultant d'une perforation endoscopique, d'une fistule chirurgicale, d'un acte médical invasif ou d'une perforation spontanée.

source: The endoscopic efficacy was immediate for all patients whose perforation was of endoscopic aetiology.
hypothesis: L'efficacité endoscopique a été immédiate pour tous les patients dont la perforation était d'étiologie endoscopique.

source: None of them required surgery.
hypothesis: Aucun d'entre eux n'a nécessité d'intervention chirurgicale.

source: Secondary complementary endoscopic treatment was only used in 6/25 patients.
hypothesis: Le traitement endoscopique complémentaire secondaire n'a été utilisé que chez 6 patients sur 25.

source: All of them had non-endoscopic aetiology for their perforation.
hypothesis: Tous avaient une étiologie non endoscopique pour leur perforation.

source: The survival at 1 month was 84 % and at 3 months of 76 %.
hypothesis: La survie à 1 mois était de 84 % et à 3 mois de 76 %.

source: Our results confirm the high efficiency of macro-clips in the treatment of endoscopic breaches in a regional hospital center.
hypothesis: Nos résultats confirment la grande efficacité des macro clips dans le traitement des brèches endoscopiques dans un centre hospitalier régional.

source: The use of macro-clips seems less convincing for the closure of some postoperative fistula.
hypothesis: L'utilisation de macro-clips semble moins convaincante pour la fermeture de certaines fistules postopératoires.

source: The suture with macro-clips associated with endoscopic and medical treatments allowed to avoid surgical redo in some cases.
hypothesis: La suture avec des macro-clips associée à des traitements endoscopiques et médicaux a permis d'éviter une reprise chirurgicale dans certains cas.

source: There are two types of ID : 1) absolute ID (AID), in case of decrease in iron reserves and circulating iron, or 2) functional ID (FID), in case of decrease in circulating iron, while reserves are preserved or increased.
hypothesis: Il existe deux types de CF : 1) la CF absolue (CFA), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer et du fer circulant, ou 2) la CF fonctionnelle (CFF), en cas de diminution des réserves de fer circulant, alors que les réserves sont préservées ou augmentées.

source: FID is characterized by elevated serum ferritin, normal or low TS, and normal sTfR levels.
hypothesis: La CFF est caractérisée par une ferritine sérique élevée, une Tf normale ou basse et des taux de sTfR normaux.

source: AID is characterized by low serum ferritin and transferrin saturation (TS).
hypothesis: La CFA se caractérise par une faible saturation sérique en ferritine et en transferrine (Tf).

source: Iron deficiency in adults : to understand what biological evaluation should be carried out
hypothesis: Carence en fer chez l'adulte : comprendre quelle évaluation biologique doit être réalisée

source: Iron is a major mineral in the human body.
hypothesis: Le fer est un minéral majeur dans le corps humain.

source: It participates in various metabolisms, including oxygen transport in hemoglobin.
hypothesis: Il participe à divers métabolismes, dont le transport de l’oxygène dans l’hémoglobine.

source: Iron deficiency (ID) is characterized by a deficit in circulating iron.
hypothesis: La carence en fer (CF) se caractérise par un déficit en fer circulant.

source: AID is mainly due to bleeding, usually gastrointestinal, while FID is linked to the inflammatory syndrome.
hypothesis: La CFA est principalement due à des saignements, généralement gastro-intestinaux, tandis que la CFF est liée au syndrome inflammatoire.

source: Hypochromic microcytic anemia is frequent.
hypothesis: L'anémie microcytaire hypochrome est fréquente.

source: Furthermore, C-reactive protein levels are high, and there is non-regenerative non-macrocytic anemia.
hypothesis: De plus, les niveaux de protéine C-réactive sont élevés et il existe une anémie non régénérative non macrocytaire.

source: New biological tests (serum hepcidin) may be useful in case of doubt.
hypothesis: De nouveaux tests biologiques (hepcidine sérique) peuvent être utiles en cas de doute.

source: However, they are not yet commonly used.
hypothesis: Cependant, ils ne sont pas encore couramment utilisés.

source: This useful vision should enable them to regain autonomy in society for navigation, face recognition or reading.
hypothesis: Cette vision utile devrait leur permettre de retrouver leur autonomie dans la société pour la navigation, la reconnaissance faciale ou la lecture.

source: Various prostheses, in particular cortical prostheses, are currently in clinical trials for optic neuropathies (glaucoma).
hypothesis: Diverses prothèses, notamment corticales, font actuellement l'objet d'essais cliniques pour des neuropathies optiques (glaucome).

source: Other innovating strategies have obtained proofs of concepts in rodents but require a further validation in large animals prior to their evaluation on patients.
hypothesis: D'autres stratégies innovantes ont été démontrées sur les rongeurs, mais nécessitent une validation supplémentaire chez les grands animaux avant leur évaluation sur les patients.

source: Visual prostheses aim at restoring useful vision to patients who have become blind.
hypothesis: Les prothèses visuelles visent à restaurer la vision utile des patients devenus aveugles.

source: Optogenetic therapy, an alternative strategy, has now reached the stage of clinical trials at the retinal level while moving forward at the cortical level.
hypothesis: Une stratégie alternative, la thérapie optogénétique, est désormais en phase d'essais cliniques au niveau de la rétine, puis au niveau cortical.

source: Vision restoration: science fiction or reality?
hypothesis: Restauration de la vision : science-fiction ou réalité ?

source: Two retinal prostheses have already obtained market authorization for patients affected by retinal dystrophies while a new device is in clinical trials for patients affected by age-related macular degeneration.
hypothesis: Deux prothèses rétiniennes ont déjà obtenu une autorisation de mise sur le marché pour les patients atteints de dystrophies rétiniennes, tandis qu'un nouveau dispositif fait l'objet d'essais cliniques pour les patients atteints de dégénérescence maculaire liée à l'âge.

source: Restoring vision should therefore become a reality for many patients even if this vision will not be as extensive and perfect as natural vision.
hypothesis: La restauration de la vision devrait donc devenir une réalité pour de nombreux patients même si cette vision ne sera pas aussi étendue et parfaite que la vision naturelle.

source: A model to predict SARS-CoV-2 infection based on the first three-month surveillance data in Brazil
hypothesis: Un modèle pour prédire l'infection par le SRAS-CoV-2 selon les données de surveillance des trois premiers mois au Brésil

source: COVID-19 diagnosis is a critical problem, mainly due to the lack or delay in the test results.
hypothesis: Le diagnostic de la COVID-19 est un problème critique, principalement en raison de l'absence ou du retard des résultats des tests.

source: We analysed suspected patients reported to the National Surveillance System that corresponded to the following case definition: patients with respiratory symptoms and fever, who travelled to regions with local or community transmission or who had close contact with a suspected or confirmed case.
hypothesis: Nous avons analysé les patients suspects signalés au Système national de surveillance qui correspondaient à la définition de cas suivante : patients présentant des symptômes respiratoires et de la fièvre, ayant voyagé dans des régions de transmission locale ou communautaire ou ayant été en contact étroit avec un cas suspect ou confirmé.

source: Based on variables routinely collected, we obtained a multiple model using logistic regression.
hypothesis: Sur la base de variables recueillies régulièrement, nous avons obtenu un modèle multiple en utilisant la régression logistique.

source: The area under the receiver operating characteristic curve (AUC) and accuracy indicators were used for validation.
hypothesis: L'aire sous la courbe caractéristique de fonctionnement du récepteur (ASC) et les indicateurs de précision ont été utilisés pour la validation.

source: With a data subset including 80% of patients from Sao Paulo (SP) and Rio Janeiro (RJ), we obtained a function which reached an AUC of 95.54% (95% CI: 94.41-96.67%) for the diagnosis of COVID-19 and accuracy of 90.1% (sensitivity 87.62% and specificity 92.02%).
hypothesis: Avec un sous-ensemble de données incluant 80 % de patients de Sao Paulo (SP) et de Rio Janeiro (RJ), nous avons obtenu une fonction qui a atteint une ASC de 95,54 % (IC à 95 % : 94,41 à 96,67 %) pour le diagnostic de la COVID-19 et une précision de 90,1 % (sensibilité 87,62 % et spécificité 92,02 %).

source: In a validation dataset including the other 20% of patients from SP and RJ, this model exhibited an AUC of 95.01% (92.51-97.5%) and accuracy of 89.47% (sensitivity 87.32% and specificity 91.36%).
hypothesis: Dans un ensemble de données de validation incluant les 20 % restants de patients de SP et RJ, ce modèle présentait une ASC de 95,01 % (92,51-97,5 %) et une précision de 89,47 % (sensibilité 87,32 % et spécificité 91,36 %).

source: We obtained a model suitable for the clinical diagnosis of COVID-19 based on routinely collected surveillance data.
hypothesis: Nous avons obtenu un modèle adapté au diagnostic clinique de la COVID-19 basé sur des données de surveillance recueillies automatiquement.

source: Applications of this tool include early identification for specific treatment and isolation, rational use of laboratory tests, and input for modelling epidemiological trends.
hypothesis: Les applications de cet outil comprennent l'identification précoce pour un traitement et un isolement spécifiques, l'utilisation rationnelle des tests de laboratoire et la prémisse dans la modélisation des tendances épidémiologiques.

source: We aimed to obtain a model to predict SARS-CoV-2 infection in suspected patients reported to the Brazilian surveillance system.
hypothesis: Nous avons cherché à obtenir un modèle pour prédire l'infection par le SRAS-CoV-2 chez les patients suspects signalés au système de surveillance brésilien.

source: We described 1468 COVID-19 cases (confirmed by RT-PCR) and 4271 patients with other illnesses.
hypothesis: Nous avons décrit 1 468 cas de COVID-19 (confirmés par RT-PCR) et 4 271 patients atteints d'autres maladies.

source: In the older patient, it would be part of a whole organ disease with the onset of osteoarthritis.
hypothesis: Chez le patient âgé, cela ferait partie d'une maladie d'organe en phase terminale avec l'apparition de l'arthrose.

source: It is effective for pain relief and motion recovery.
hypothesis: Il est efficace pour soulager la douleur et la récupération motrice.

source: Although it produces postoperative instability, secondary reconstruction is not always required.
hypothesis: Bien qu'elle entraîne une instabilité postopératoire, la reconstruction secondaire n'est pas toujours nécessaire.

source: Degenerative lesions of the anterior cruciate ligament: a frequent but poorly understood phenomenon
hypothesis: Lésions dégénératives du ligament croisé antérieur : un phénomène fréquent, mais mal compris

source: Making more use of MRI, degenerative lesions of the anterior cruciate ligament are more frequently diagnosed.
hypothesis: L'utilisation poussée de l'IRM permet de diagnostiquer plus fréquemment les lésions dégénératives du ligament croisé antérieur.

source: Three separates entities are reported (mucoid degeneration, ganglion cyst and mucoid degeneration with ganglion cysts) but it is probably a continuum of the same degenerative process.
hypothesis: Trois entités distinctes sont rapportées (dégénérescence mucoïde, kyste ganglionnaire et dégénérescence mucoïde avec kystes ganglionnaires), mais il s'agit probablement d'un continuum du même processus dégénératif.

source: In middle aged individuals, it would result of repeated microtrauma in the setting of a narrow intercondylar notch and/or increased posterior tibial slope.
hypothesis: Chez les personnes d'âge moyen, cela se traduirait par des microtraumatismes répétés associés à une échancrure intercondylienne étroite et/ou à une augmentation de la pente tibiale postérieure.

source: Most cases are incidental findings.
hypothesis: La plupart des cas sont des découvertes fortuites.

source: For symptomatic patients, a complete resection of the ligament is our first option when conservative treatment failed.
hypothesis: Pour les patients symptomatiques, une résection complète du ligament est notre première option en cas d'échec du traitement conservateur.

source: As a practice example, the division of pediatric oncology from the Children's Hospital St. Gallen describes their use and experience of two different methods of integrative medicine on a daily basis.
hypothesis: À titre d'exemple pratique, la division d'oncologie pédiatrique de l'Hôpital des Enfants de St Gall décrit leur utilisation et leur expérience de deux méthodes différentes de médecine intégrative au quotidien.

source: Integrative medicine in pediatric oncology
hypothesis: Médecine intégrative en oncologie pédiatrique

source: This article provides an overview of the integrative medicine approach in pediatric oncology that combines conventional medicine with complementary therapies.
hypothesis: Cet article donne un aperçu de l'approche de médecine intégrative en oncologie pédiatrique qui combine la médecine conventionnelle avec des thérapies complémentaires.

source: However, this review article also shows the lack of studies dedicated to integrative medicine in pediatric oncology, particularly regarding efficacy and safety of the different applications.
hypothesis: Cependant, cet article de synthèse montre également le manque d'études consacrées à la médecine intégrative en oncologie pédiatrique, notamment en ce qui concerne l'efficacité et la sécurité des différentes applications.

source: New developments in systemic sclerosis-associated interstitial lung disease
hypothesis: Nouveaux développements dans la pneumopathie interstitielle associée à la sclérose systémique

source: Interstitial lung disease is a frequent complication of systemic sclerosis and has now become the leading cause of death in this disorder.
hypothesis: La maladie pulmonaire interstitielle est une complication fréquente de la sclérose systémique et est devenue la principale cause de décès dans cette maladie.

source: It mainly occurs during the first five years after the diagnosis of systemic sclerosis.
hypothesis: Elle survient principalement au cours des cinq premières années suivant le diagnostic de sclérose systémique.

source: The most common radio-pathological presentation is nonspecific interstitial pneumonia, followed by usual interstitial pneumonia.
hypothesis: La présentation radiopathologique la plus fréquente est la pneumonie interstitielle non spécifique, suivie de la pneumonie interstitielle habituelle.

source: The classical immunosuppressive treatment of systemic sclerosis-associated interstitial lung disease is evolving, as recent studies suggest a beneficial effect of biological agents such as rituximab and tocilizumab, and antifibrotic drugs such as nintedanib.
hypothesis: Le traitement immunosuppresseur classique de la maladie pulmonaire interstitielle associée à la sclérose systémique évolue, car des études récentes suggèrent un effet bénéfique d’agents biologiques tels que le rituximab et le tocilizumab, et de médicaments antifibrotiques tels que le nintédanib.

source: Various risk factors are associated with the occurrence of interstitial lung disease, including the presence of anti-topoisomerase I antibodies (Scl-70) and the diffuse cutaneous form of systemic sclerosis.
hypothesis: Divers facteurs de risque sont associés à la survenue d'une pneumopathie interstitielle, notamment la présence d'anticorps anti-topoisomérase I (Scl-70) et la forme cutanée diffuse de la sclérodermie systémique.

source: A child having a hoarse, raspy or broken voice, is not normal.
hypothesis: Un enfant ayant une voix éraillée, rauque ou cassée, n’est pas normal.

source: Such problem should be treated as quickly as possible, as they have important academic and social consequences and significant implications for the choice of their future adult life.
hypothesis: Ces problèmes devraient être traités le plus rapidement possible, car ils ont des conséquences académiques et sociales importantes et des implications importantes pour le choix de leur future vie adulte.

source: Voice disorder in children : what can be done ?
hypothesis: Troubles de la voix chez l'enfant : que faire ?

source: Child voice problems are too often ignored and neglected.
hypothesis: Les problèmes de voix des enfants sont trop souvent ignorés et négligés.

source: The problem must be solved before adolescence, because many professions and activities are not accessible to dysphonic children.
hypothesis: Le problème doit être résolu avant l'adolescence, car de nombreuses professions et activités ne sont pas accessibles aux enfants dysphoniques.

source: Our society gives a lot of importance to the voice, but curiously without having sufficient knowledge of vocal hygiene.
hypothesis: Notre société accorde beaucoup d'importance à la voix, mais curieusement sans avoir une connaissance suffisante de l'hygiène vocale.

source: Information and awareness among doctors and parents is paramount so that school-aged children can benefit from adequate treatment.
hypothesis: L’information et la sensibilisation des médecins et des parents sont primordiales pour que les enfants d’âge scolaire puissent bénéficier d’un traitement adéquat.

source: Depletion of myocyte' s adenosine triphosate (ATP) leads to an increase in intracellular calcium and myocyte death.
hypothesis: L'épuisement de l'adénosine triphosphate (ATP) des myocytes entraîne une augmentation du calcium intracellulaire et la mort des myocytes.

source: Rhabdomyolysis: early management
hypothesis: Rhabdomyolyse : prise en charge précoce

source: Rhabdomyolysis is defined by myalgia, potentially painful myoedema and muscular weakness due to death of muscular fiber in the striated muscle.
hypothesis: La rhabdomyolyse est définie par une myalgie, un myxœdème potentiellement douloureux et une faiblesse musculaire due à la dégradation de la fibre musculaire dans le muscle strié.

source: Frequent etiologies include physical effort, intoxication (alcohol, drugs and medication) and physical trauma.
hypothesis: Les étiologies fréquentes comprennent l’effort physique, l’intoxication (alcool, drogues et médicaments) et les traumatismes physiques.

source: Diagnosis relies on creatine kinase (CK) levels.
hypothesis: Le diagnostic repose sur les niveaux de créatine kinase (CK).

source: The clinical spectrum of rhabdomyolysis includes an asymptomatic increased amount of CK as well as severe, life threatening complications such as acute renal failure and electrolyte disorders.
hypothesis: Le spectre clinique de la rhabdomyolyse comprend une augmentation asymptomatique du taux de CK ainsi que des complications graves, mettant en jeu le pronostic vital, telles que l'insuffisance rénale aiguë et les troubles électrolytiques.

source: Treatment is based on prevention and addressing complications.
hypothesis: Le traitement est basé sur la prévention et le traitement des complications.

source: Efficacy of macro-clips for perforations and fistulas following endoscopic or surgical procedures. Retrospective analysis of 25 consecutive cases
hypothesis: Efficacité des macro clips pour les perforations et les fistules à la suite d'interventions endoscopiques ou chirurgicales. Analyse rétrospective de 25 cas consécutifs

source: The aim of our retrospective study is to analyse the results of endoscopic macro-clips used for closing intestinal breaches in the real life.
hypothesis: L'objectif de notre étude rétrospective est d'analyser les résultats des macro clips endoscopiques utilisés pour fermer les brèches intestinales dans la vie réelle.

source: Our results confirm the high efficiency of macro-clips in the treatment of endoscopic breaches in a regional hospital center.
hypothesis: Nos résultats confirment la grande efficacité des macro clips dans le traitement des brèches endoscopiques dans un centre hospitalier régional.

source: Post-endoscopic, spontaneous perforations and surgical fistulas are included.
hypothesis: Les perforations post-endoscopiques spontanées et les fistules chirurgicales sont incluses.

source: Our results are compared with principal published series.
hypothesis: Nos résultats sont comparés aux principales séries publiées.

source: Between 2010 and 2015, 25 consecutive patients underwent an endoscopic suture with macro-clips to seal a breach resulting from endoscopic perforation, surgical fistula, invasive medical procedure or spontaneous perforation.
hypothesis: Entre 2010 et 2015, 25 patients consécutifs ont subi une suture endoscopique avec des macro clips pour sceller une brèche résultant d'une perforation endoscopique, d'une fistule chirurgicale, d'un acte médical invasif ou d'une perforation spontanée.

source: The endoscopic efficacy was immediate for all patients whose perforation was of endoscopic aetiology.
hypothesis: L'efficacité endoscopique a été immédiate pour tous les patients dont la perforation était d'étiologie endoscopique.

source: None of them required surgery.
hypothesis: Aucun d'entre eux n'a nécessité d'intervention chirurgicale.

source: Secondary complementary endoscopic treatment was only used in 6/25 patients.
hypothesis: Le traitement endoscopique complémentaire secondaire n'a été utilisé que chez 6 patients sur 25.

source: All of them had non-endoscopic aetiology for their perforation.
hypothesis: Tous avaient une étiologie non endoscopique pour leur perforation.

source: The survival at 1 month was 84 % and at 3 months of 76 %.
hypothesis: La survie à 1 mois était de 84 % et à 3 mois de 76 %.

source: The use of macro-clips seems less convincing for the closure of some postoperative fistula.
hypothesis: L'utilisation de macro-clips semble moins convaincante pour la fermeture de certaines fistules postopératoires.

source: The suture with macro-clips associated with endoscopic and medical treatments allowed to avoid surgical redo in some cases.
hypothesis: La suture avec des macro-clips associée à des traitements endoscopiques et médicaux a permis d'éviter une reprise chirurgicale dans certains cas.

source: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 但是，这些药物通过玻璃体内注射给药，与损害视力的并发症有关。

source: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.
hypothesis: 因此，人们对持续开发向眼后段输送抗-VEGF 药物的平台产生了浓厚的兴趣。

source: The characteristics of an ideal sustained delivery platform will then be discussed.
hypothesis: 然后将讨论理想型持续性递送平台的特征。

source: Finally, the current available strategies will be analysed with the above-mentioned characteristics in mind to determine the advantages and disadvantages of each sustained drug delivery modality.
hypothesis: 最后，将在分析现有战略时考虑到上述特征，以确定每种持续性药物输送方式的优缺点。

source: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.
hypothesis: 抗血管内皮生长因子（抗-VEGF）已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。

source: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
hypothesis: 这些疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。

source: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
hypothesis: 这些并发症中最可怕的是眼内炎，这是一种严重的眼部感染，会造成视力严重低下。

source: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
hypothesis: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须进行多次注射才能达到预期的治疗效果。

source: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 每次注射都会产生风险，此类风险会出现危及视力的并发症。

source: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.
hypothesis: 近年来，已经出现了各种概念化的策略。

source: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.
hypothesis: 这包括不可生物降解的植入物、纳米配方和水凝胶。

source: In this review, the barriers of drug delivery to the posterior segment of the eye will be explained.
hypothesis: 本综述将阐释药物输送至眼后段所面临的障碍。

source: Through the above, this review attempts to provide an overview of the sustained delivery platforms in their various phases of development.
hypothesis: 通过上述内容，本综述试图提供持续性输送平台在各个开发阶段的概览。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字化修复技术提高修复体质量，增加新的修复体类型，将修复体制造方式从手工制造转变为计算机辅助制造，引入全新的口腔实验室的操作模式及巩固修复技术的学术地位，给中国的修复技术带来巨变。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.

hypothesis: 数字化修复技术提高修复体质量，增加新的修复体类型，将修复体制造方式从手工制造转变为计算机辅助制造，引入全新的口腔实验室的操作模式及巩固修复技术的学术地位，给中国的修复技术带来巨变。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 数字化修复技术提高修复体质量，增加新的修复体类型，将修复体制造方式从手工制造转变为计算机辅助制造，引入全新的口腔实验室的操作模式及巩固修复技术的学术地位，给中国的修复技术带来巨变。

source: The current phenomenological study examined, through the eyes of immigrant parents, how they comprehend their children's involvement in delinquent behavior.
hypothesis: 通过移民父母的视角，目前的现象学研究研究了他们如何理解孩子参与违法行为。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 这项研究调查了 14 名在以色列的前苏联移民父母（10 位母亲和 4 位父亲），以对在犯罪青年康复机构接受治疗的儿童进行深入的半结构化访谈。

source: Data analysis revealed a gradual decline in children's behavior ascribed to the developmental stage of adolescence, the pressures of immigration, and cultural conflict.
hypothesis: 数据分析显示，由于青春期发育阶段、移民压力和文化冲突，使得儿童的行为逐渐下降。

source: These three factors are interwoven together to create a fabric within which they see their children turning to crime.
hypothesis: 这三个因素交织在一起，形成了一种结构，他们看到自己的孩子在该结构中走向犯罪。

source: Parents' gradual loss of control is balanced by attempts to idealize the parent-child relationship and to minimize the severity of the offenses committed.
hypothesis: 在父母逐渐失去控制的平衡中，他们试图将父母与子女的关系理想化，并尽量减少罪行的严重程度。

source: They describe various differing and even contradictory experiences of themselves as parents and their struggles to piece together incohesive, alternating experiences of themselves as parents.
hypothesis: 他们描述了自己作为父母的各种不同甚至矛盾的经历，以及他们如何努力将自己作为父母没有凝聚力、交替的经历拼凑起来。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 这项研究调查了 14 名在以色列的前苏联移民父母（10 位母亲和 4 位父亲），以对在犯罪青年康复机构接受治疗的儿童进行深入的半结构化访谈。

source: Despite the critical role they can play in their children's rehabilitation, as well as the distress that they themselves experience, parents of children involved in delinquent behavior have often been ignored in research.
hypothesis: 尽管他们可以在孩子的康复过程中发挥关键作用，而且他们自己也经历过痛苦，但在研究中，参与违法行为孩子的父母常常被忽视。

source: Scarce qualitative literature has focused on understanding the perspective of parents of adolescents involved in crime, and no prior literature has examined how the status of being a parent of an adolescent who is involved in delinquency intersects with being an immigrant parent.
hypothesis: 很少有定性文献侧重于理解参与犯罪的青少年父母的观点，并且之前没有文献研究过参与犯罪的青少年父母的地位与移民父母地位之间的关系。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
hypothesis: 据报道，过去十年中，手持式激光诱导性黄斑病变 (HLIM) 病例急剧上升，由于不受监管的高功率激光器在线访问，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。

source: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.
hypothesis: 尽管 HLIM 具有明显的临床特征，但它可能掩饰为其他视网膜疾病。

source: It is critical therefore to recognise the clinical and multimodal imaging characteristics of this important and potentially devastating condition.
hypothesis: 因此，认识到这种重要且具潜在破坏性疾病的临床和多模式成像特征至关重要。
