source: In addition, we present a unique case of HLIM, resembling the presentation of a placoid disease variant and illustrating choroidal ischaemia using advanced retinal imaging, that offers further insight into the mechanisms of laser injury and its complications.
hypothesis: 此外，我们提出了一个独特的 HLIM 病例，类似于 placoid 疾病变异的呈现，并使用先进的视网膜成像说明脉络膜缺血，从而进一步了解激光损伤的机制及其并发症。

source: The issues addressed in this review aim to increase recognition of an increasingly important and trending condition with potentially profound visual complications.
hypothesis: 本综述涉及的问题旨在提高人们对这一日益重要的、具有潜在深远视觉并发症的趋势性疾病的认识。

source: As HLIM patients are typically young, unique issues need to be considered, such as delayed presentation, difficult history, poor compliance and behavioural or psychiatric comorbidity.
hypothesis: 由于 HLIM 患者通常是年轻人，因此需要考虑独特的问题，例如延迟就诊、病史困难、依从性差以及行为或精神合并症。

source: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.
hypothesis: 本文将回顾激光损伤的临床和诊断特征，特别强调多模态视网膜的发现。

source: A meta-analysis of 2530 eyes from 48 real-world studies of therapies for macular oedema secondary to BRVO was conducted.
hypothesis: 对 48 项来自真实世界的关于 BRVO 继发性黄斑水肿治疗研究中的 2530 只眼睛进行了荟萃分析。

source: Baseline characteristics, visual, anatomical and safety outcomes were recorded.
hypothesis: 记录基线特征、视力、解剖学与安全结果。

source: Visual and anatomical gains achieved in the real-world for anti-VEGF therapy were not as impressive as seminal RCTs, possibly due to reduced injection frequency in the real world and differences in baseline characteristics.
hypothesis: 在真实世界中，抗 VEGF 治疗在视觉和解剖学领域所获的成果不如开创性的 RCT 一般令人印象深刻，这可能是由于真实世界中注射频率有所减少且基线特征存在差异。

source: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).
hypothesis: 本综述评估了视网膜分支静脉阻塞 (BRVO) 继发黄斑水肿治疗的真实依据。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
hypothesis: 计算了随机效应模型的加权平均值与加权估计值，以显示 6 个月、12 个月和 24 个月时的视敏度 (VA) 与中央视网膜厚度 (CST) 的变化。

source: Primary outcome was change in VA (logMAR letters) at 12 months.
hypothesis: 主要结果为 12 个月时 VA（logMAR 字母） 的变化。

source: Study quality was assessed using the quality appraisal checklist for case series developed by Institute of Health Economics.
hypothesis: 使用健康经济学研究所为系列病例开发的质量评估清单评估研究质量。

source: The mean baseline VA for the pooled data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the mean baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) µm.
hypothesis: 汇总数据的平均基线 VA 为 54.0 (51.5，56.5) 个字母，平均基线 CST 为 501.3 (483.5，519.1) 微米。

source: The quality of studies varied considerably.
hypothesis: 研究的质量存在极大的差异。

source: Ocular and systemic adverse events were discussed in 79% and 42% of treatment arms respectively, with possible under-reporting.
hypothesis: 分别在 79% 和 42% 的治疗组讨论了眼部与全身不良事件，但可能存在漏报。

source: There is an urgent need for consensus on the minimum efficacy, treatment burden and safety data to collect to strengthen the real-world evidence base.
hypothesis: 目前迫切需要就最低功效、治疗负担与安全数据的收集达成共识，以增强真实世界的证据基础。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
hypothesis: 比较前皮下盆腔内固定器 (INFIX) 和板内固定治疗不稳定前盆腔环骨折的有效性。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
hypothesis: 比较前皮下盆腔内固定器 (INFIX) 和板内固定治疗不稳定前盆腔环骨折的有效性。

source: Among them, 21 cases were treated with INFIX (INFIX group), and 27 cases were treated with plate (plate group).
hypothesis: 其中，21 例病例采用 INFIX（INFIX 组）治疗，27 例采用板块治疗（板块组）。

source: There was no significant difference in gender, age, body mass index, cause of injury, time from injury to operation, Injury Severity Score (ISS), and fracture type between the two groups (  The patients in both groups were followed up for an average of 12.5 months (range, 6-16 months).
hypothesis: 两组患者在性别、年龄、体重指数、受伤原因、受伤至手术时间、损伤严重度评分 (ISS) 及骨折类型间无显著差异（两组患者平均随访时间为 12.5 个月，范围为 6~16 个月）。

source: Among them, 21 cases were treated with INFIX (INFIX group), and 27 cases were treated with plate (plate group).
hypothesis: 其中，21 例病例采用 INFIX（INFIX 组）治疗，27 例采用板块治疗（板块组）。

source: There was no significant difference in age, gender composition, body mass index, disease type, number of screws implanted, and segmental distribution between the two groups (  The operation time of group A was significantly longer than that in group B (  Compared with traditional freehand pedicle screw placement, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement significantly improves the accuracy and safety of screw placement without increasing the bleeding and postoperative drainage.
hypothesis: 两组患者在年龄、性别构成、体重指数、疾病类型、植入螺钉数量、节段分布等方面均无显著差异（A 组手术时间明显长于 B 组，（与传统徒手椎弓根螺钉置入术相比，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入术在不增加出血和术后引流的情况下，明显提高螺钉置入的准确性和安全性。

source: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.
hypothesis: 比较上胸外科手术中机器人辅助与徒手椎弓根螺钉置入的安全性和准确性。

source: Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, including 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).
hypothesis: 2017 年 12 月至 2019 年 12 月，本研究共纳入 39 例胸椎弓根螺钉内固定患者，其中 19 例为机器人组（A 组、机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入组），20 例为徒手组（B 组、徒手椎弓根螺钉置入组）。

source: There were 104 screws implanted in group A and 108 screws in group B.
hypothesis: A 组置入了 104 个螺钉， B 组置入了 108 个螺钉。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 探讨了在 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 和 J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 气相色谱柱不同检测条件下，探讨卤代羟基烷对顶空气相色谱法测定血样中乙醇含量的影响。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

source: Conclusion Halogenated hydroxy-alkanes interfere with determination of ethanol content in blood by headspace gas chromatography.
hypothesis: 结论 卤代羟基烷烃干扰顶空-气相色谱法测定血液中乙醇含量。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 探讨了在 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 和 J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 气相色谱柱不同检测条件下，探讨卤代羟基烷对顶空气相色谱法测定血样中乙醇含量的影响。

source: Objective To study the influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes inhalation anesthetic on the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 目的 研究卤代羟基烷烃吸入麻醉剂对血液中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法 采用顶空-气相色谱法和双柱确证法分析卤代羟基烷烃。

source: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
hypothesis: 流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，这导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。

source: Currently, China has licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3) which includes split-virus influenza vaccine and subunit vaccine, quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV4) which is split, and trivalent live attenuated influenza vaccine (LAIV3) which was newly licensed.
hypothesis: 目前，中国已批准三价灭活流感疫苗 (IIV3)，包括分裂病毒流感疫苗和亚单位疫苗，分裂四价灭活流感疫苗 (IIV4) 和新批准的三价减毒活流感疫苗 (LAIV3)。

source: Second, policies and measures for influenza prevention and control issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.
hypothesis: 二、近一年来国家卫生健康委员会 (PRC) 出台流感防控政策和措施。

source: Thirdly, new type seasonal influenza vaccine licensed and issued in 2020-2021 in China.
hypothesis: 三、2020-2021 年，我国新型季节性流感疫苗获批上市。

source: Fourth, northern hemisphere influenza vaccination composition for the 2020-2021 season which included trivalent and quadrivalent influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 四、2020-2021 年，北半球流感疫苗接种组成，包括三价和四价流感疫苗。

source: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
hypothesis: 本报告中描述的建议包括以下内容：疫苗接种点诊所 (POV) 应向所有 6 个月及以上愿意接种疫苗、无禁忌症人士提供流感疫苗接种。

source: No preferential recommendation is made for one influenza vaccine product over another for persons for whom more than one licensed, recommended, and appropriate product is available.
hypothesis: 对于获得一种以上许可、推荐和适当产品的人，不会优先推荐一种流感疫苗产品。

source: People whoever get IIV or LAIV all apply to the principle.
hypothesis: 获 IIV 或 LAIV 的人都适用该原则。

source: Influenza vaccine is also recommended for use in pregnant women during any trimester.
hypothesis: 推荐怀孕三个月内的孕妇接种流感疫苗。

source: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
hypothesis: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
hypothesis: 根据世卫组织的预估，季节性流感疫情每年在全球产生 300 万 - 500 万严重病例和 29 万 - 65 万死亡病例。

source: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
hypothesis: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病、死亡。

source: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
hypothesis: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与流感等其他呼吸道传染病共同传播。

source: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
hypothesis: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。

source: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
hypothesis: 除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于二类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。

source: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
hypothesis: 2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。

source: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
hypothesis: 过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。

source: The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences especially studies of China, including disease burden, effectiveness, Vaccine-avoidable disease burden, vaccine safety monitoring, and cost-effectiveness and cost-benefit.
hypothesis: 本版主要更新内容包括：一、增添新的研究证据，特别是对中国的研究，包括疾病负担、有效性、疫苗可避免的疾病负担、疫苗安全性监测、成本效果及成本效益。

source: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
hypothesis: 五、2020-2021 年流感季节，流感疫苗接种建议。

source: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
hypothesis: 考虑到全球 COVID-19 大流行的情势，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险，最大限度地减少对 COVID-19 预防和控制的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗的优先接种对象如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士、公共卫生专业人员、检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体以及照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在高人口密度场所工作或停留的人员，如幼儿园、中小学教师和学生、囚犯和监狱工作人员；其他高风险流感群体，包括 60 岁以上的成年人、 6-59 个月的儿童、特定慢性疾病患者、6 个月以下婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者、孕妇及计划在流感季节期间怀孕的女士。

source: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.
hypothesis: 如果他们在 2019-2020 年流感季或前一季已接种疫苗，建议接种 1 剂。

source: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 8 岁以上人群需要接种 1 剂流感疫苗。

source: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
hypothesis: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。

source: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
hypothesis: 一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，应尽快接种。

source: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
hypothesis: 对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。

source: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
hypothesis: 本指南供各级疾病预防控制中心从事流感控制和预防的工作人员、PoV 工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。

source: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
hypothesis: 这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 探讨了在 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 和 J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 气相色谱柱不同检测条件下，探讨卤代羟基烷对顶空气相色谱法测定血样中乙醇含量的影响。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

source: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
hypothesis: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地辨别干扰。

source: To evaluate the effectiveness of cement-injectable cannulated pedicle screw combined with multiple level Schwab grade Ⅰ osteotomy for chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures with kyphosis.
hypothesis: 评估注射型中空骨水泥椎弓根螺钉联合多节段 Schwab Ⅰ级截骨术治疗伴有脊柱后凸的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折的有效性。

source: The incisions healed by first intention in 26 cases, and 1 incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood glucose control.
hypothesis: 26 例切口出现一期愈合，但有 1 例因血糖控制不佳切口于换药后愈合。

source: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
hypothesis: 回顾性分析在 2015 年 6 月至 2017 年 6 月期间治疗的 27 名有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸患者的临床数据。

source: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).
hypothesis: 其中男性 8 人，女性 19 人，平均年龄 69.5 岁（范围为 56-81 岁）。

source: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.
hypothesis: 无褥疮、坠积性肺炎、深静脉血栓形成等并发症。

source: All patients were followed up 8-24 months, with an average of 16.6 months.
hypothesis: 对所有患者进行 8～24 个月的随访，平均 16.6 个月。

source: However, these drugs are administered via intravitreal injections that are associated with sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 但是，此类药物通过玻璃体内注射给药，与损害视力的并发症有关。

source: The characteristics of an ideal sustained delivery platform will then be discussed.
hypothesis: 然后将讨论理想型持续性递送平台的特征。

source: Finally, the current available strategies will be analysed with the above-mentioned characteristics in mind to determine the advantages and disadvantages of each sustained drug delivery modality.
hypothesis: 最后，将在分析现有战略时考虑到上述特征，以确定每种持续性药物输送方式的优缺点。

source: Anti-vascular endothelial growth factors (anti-VEGF) have become the most common treatment modality for many retinal diseases.
hypothesis: 抗血管内皮生长因子（抗-VEGF）已成为许多视网膜疾病最常见的治疗方式。

source: These include neovascular age-related macular degeneration (n-AMD), proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR) and retinal vein occlusions (RVO).
hypothesis: 此类疾病包括新生血管性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (n-AMD)、增殖性糖尿病视网膜病变 (PDR) 与视网膜静脉阻塞 (RVO)。

source: The most feared of these complications is endophthalmitis, a severe infection of the eye with extremely poor visual outcomes.
hypothesis: 此类并发症中最可怕的是眼内炎，这是一种严重的眼部感染，会造成视力严重低下。

source: Patients with retinal diseases typically have to undergo multiple injections before achieving the desired therapeutic effect.
hypothesis: 患有视网膜疾病的患者通常必须进行多次注射才能实现所需的治疗效果。

source: Each injection incurs the risk of the sight-threatening complications.
hypothesis: 每次注射都会产生风险，此类风险会导致出现危及视力的并发症。

source: As such, there has been great interest in developing sustained delivery platforms for anti-VEGF agents to the posterior segment of the eye.
hypothesis: 正因如此，人们对开发持续向眼后段输送抗-VEGF 药物的平台产生了浓厚的兴趣。

source: In recent years, there have been various strategies that have been conceptualised.
hypothesis: 近年来，已经出现了各种概念化的策略。

source: These include non-biodegradable implants, nano-formulations and hydrogels.
hypothesis: 其中包括不可生物降解的植入物、纳米配方和水凝胶。

source: In this review, the barriers of drug delivery to the posterior segment of the eye will be explained.
hypothesis: 本综述将阐释药物输送至眼后段所面临的障碍。

source: Through the above, this review attempts to provide an overview of the sustained delivery platforms in their various phases of development.
hypothesis: 通过以上内容，本综述试图提供持续性输送平台在各个开发阶段的概览。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology has brought great changes to the prosthodontic technology in China by improving the quality of prostheses, adding new types of restorations, changing the manufacturing methods of restorations from handmade to computer-aided manufacturing, bringing new operating models of dental laboratories, and promoting the academic status of the prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 通过提高修复体质量、增加新型修复体、将修复体制造方式从手工制造转变为计算机辅助制造、引入全新的口腔实验室的操作模式，以及巩固修复技术的学术地位，数字化口腔修复技术使中国的口腔修复技术发生了巨变。

source: Digital prosthodontic technology still has some problems, such as insufficient precision for some manufacturing methods and shortage of professionals.
hypothesis: 数字化口腔修复技术仍然存在一些问题，如某些制造方法的精度不够，以及专业人员的短缺。

source: Technicians and administrators of prosthodontic technology should face up to the problems and seize the opportunities, to improve the level of prosthodontic technology and train the highly educated professionals.
hypothesis: 口腔修复技术的技术人员与管理人员应正视问题、抓住机遇、提高口腔修复技术水平、培养高素质的专业人才。

source: At the same time, attentions should be payed to the advantages of the traditional prosthodontic technology while grasping the development of the digital prosthodontic technology.
hypothesis: 在把握数字化口腔修复技术发展机遇的同时，要重视传统口腔修复技术的优势。

source: The dentists and the dental technicians should learn together and enhance communication to each other, to promote the progress of digital prosthodontic technology in China.
hypothesis: 牙医和牙科技师要共同学习，加强相互沟通，推动中国数字化口腔修复技术的进步。

source: Scarce qualitative literature has focused on understanding the perspective of parents of adolescents involved in crime, and no prior literature has examined how the status of being a parent of an adolescent who is involved in delinquency intersects with being an immigrant parent.
hypothesis: 稀缺的定性文献侧重于理解参与犯罪的青少年父母的观点，以前没有文献研究过参与犯罪的青少年父母的地位与移民父母地位之间的关系。

source: The current phenomenological study examined, through the eyes of immigrant parents, how they comprehend their children's involvement in delinquent behavior.
hypothesis: 目前的现象学研究通过移民父母的视角，研究了他们如何理解孩子参与违法行为。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 这项研究调查了 14 名在以色列的前苏联移民父母（10 位母亲和 4 位父亲），以对在犯罪青年康复机构接受治疗的儿童进行深入的半结构化访谈。

source: Data analysis revealed a gradual decline in children's behavior ascribed to the developmental stage of adolescence, the pressures of immigration, and cultural conflict.
hypothesis: 数据分析显示，由于青春期发育阶段、移民压力和文化冲突，使得儿童的行为逐渐下降。

source: These three factors are interwoven together to create a fabric within which they see their children turning to crime.
hypothesis: 这三个因素交织在一起，形成了一种结构，他们看到自己的孩子该结构中走向犯罪。

source: Parents' gradual loss of control is balanced by attempts to idealize the parent-child relationship and to minimize the severity of the offenses committed.
hypothesis: 在父母逐渐失去控制的平衡中，他们试图将父母与子女的关系理想化，并尽量减少所犯罪行的严重程度。

source: They describe various differing and even contradictory experiences of themselves as parents and their struggles to piece together incohesive, alternating experiences of themselves as parents.
hypothesis: 他们描述了自己作为父母的各种不同甚至矛盾的经历，以及他们如何努力将自己作为父母没有凝聚力、交替的经历拼凑起来。

source: This study examined in-depth semistructured interviews conducted with fourteen immigrant parents (10 mothers and 4 fathers) from the former Soviet Union in Israel of children treated in rehabilitation facilities for delinquent youth.
hypothesis: 这项研究调查了 14 名在以色列的前苏联移民父母（10 位母亲和 4 位父亲），以对在犯罪青年康复机构接受治疗的儿童进行深入的半结构化访谈。

source: Despite the critical role they can play in their children's rehabilitation, as well as the distress that they themselves experience, parents of children involved in delinquent behavior have often been ignored in research.
hypothesis: 尽管他们可以在孩子的康复过程中发挥关键作用，而且他们自己也经历过痛苦，但在研究中，参与违法行为孩子的父母常常被忽视。

source: There has been a sharp rise of reported handheld laser-induced maculopathy (HLIM) cases over the past decade, a concerning trend that may continue due to unregulated online access to high power lasers.
hypothesis: 在过去十年中，报告的手持式激光诱导性黄斑病变 (HLIM) 病例急剧上升，由于不受监管的高功率激光器在线访问，这一令人担忧的趋势可能会持续下去。

source: It is critical therefore to recognise the clinical and multimodal imaging characteristics of this important and potentially devastating condition.
hypothesis: 因此，认识到这种重要且具潜在破坏性疾病的临床和多模式成像特征至关重要。

source: In addition, we present a unique case of HLIM, resembling the presentation of a placoid disease variant and illustrating choroidal ischaemia using advanced retinal imaging, that offers further insight into the mechanisms of laser injury and its complications.
hypothesis: 此外，我们提出了一个独特的 HLIM 病例，类似于 placoid 疾病变异的呈现，并使用先进的视网膜成像说明脉络膜缺血，从而进一步了解激光损伤的机制及其并发症。

source: The issues addressed in this review aim to increase recognition of an increasingly important and trending condition with potentially profound visual complications.
hypothesis: 本综述涉及的问题旨在提高人们对这一日益重要的、具有潜在深远视觉并发症的趋势性疾病的认识。

source: Though HLIM has distinct clinical features, not uncommonly it may masquerade as other retinal disorders.
hypothesis: 尽管 HLIM 具有明显的临床特征，但它可能伪装成其他视网膜疾病。

source: As HLIM patients are typically young, unique issues need to be considered, such as delayed presentation, difficult history, poor compliance and behavioural or psychiatric comorbidity.
hypothesis: 由于 HLIM 患者通常是年轻的，因此需要考虑独特的问题，例如延迟就诊、病史困难、依从性差以及行为或精神合并症。

source: This article will review the clinical and diagnostic features of laser injury, with a special emphasis on the multimodal retinal findings.
hypothesis: 本文将回顾激光损伤的临床和诊断特征，特别强调多模态视网膜的发现。

source: A meta-analysis of 2530 eyes from 48 real-world studies of therapies for macular oedema secondary to BRVO was conducted.
hypothesis: 对 48 项关于 BRVO 继发性黄斑水肿治疗的真实世界研究中的 2530 只眼睛进行了荟萃分析。

source: Baseline characteristics, visual, anatomical and safety outcomes were recorded.
hypothesis: 记录了基线特征、视力、解剖学与安全结果。

source: Visual and anatomical gains achieved in the real-world for anti-VEGF therapy were not as impressive as seminal RCTs, possibly due to reduced injection frequency in the real world and differences in baseline characteristics.
hypothesis: 在真实世界中，抗 VEGF 治疗在视觉和解剖学领域所获的成果不如开创性的 RCT 一般令人印象深刻，这可能是由于真实世界中注射频率有所减少且基线特征存在差异。

source: There is an urgent need for consensus on the minimum efficacy, treatment burden and safety data to collect to strengthen the real-world evidence base.
hypothesis: 目前迫切需要就最低功效、治疗负担与安全数据的收集达成共识，以增强真实世界的循证基础。

source: This review assessed the real-world evidence of the management of macular oedema secondary to branch retinal vein occlusion (BRVO).
hypothesis: 本综述针对视网膜分支静脉阻塞 (BRVO) 继发黄斑水肿治疗的真实世界依据进行了评估。

source: The weighted mean and weighted estimates from random-effects models were calculated for visual acuity (VA) and central subfield thickness (CST) changes at 6, 12 and 24 months.
hypothesis: 计算了随机效应模型的加权平均值与加权估计值，以显示 6 个月、12 个月和 24 个月时的视敏度 (VA) 与中央视网膜厚度 (CST) 的变化。

source: Primary outcome was change in VA (logMAR letters) at 12 months.
hypothesis: 主要结果为 12 个月时 VA（logMAR 字母） 的变化。

source: Study quality was assessed using the quality appraisal checklist for case series developed by Institute of Health Economics.
hypothesis: 使用卫生经济学研究所为系列病例开发的质量评估清单以评估研究质量。

source: The mean baseline VA for the pooled data was 54.0 (51.5, 56.5) letters and the mean baseline CST was 501.3 (483.5, 519.1) µm.
hypothesis: 汇总数据的平均基线 VA 为 54.0 (51.5，56.5) 个字母，平均基线 CST 为 501.3 (483.5，519.1) 微米。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in VA was 14.6 (12.5, 16.7) letters at 12 months (n = 1727).
hypothesis: 12 个月时 (n = 1727)，VA 平均 (95% CI) 变化的随机效应为 14.6 (12.5, 16.7) 个字母。

source: The random-effects estimate for mean (95% CI) change in CST was -181.7 (-230.7, -132.7) µm at 12 months (n = 1325).
The quality of studies varied considerably.
hypothesis: 研究的质量存在极大的差异。

source: Ocular and systemic adverse events were discussed in 79% and 42% of treatment arms respectively, with possible under-reporting.
hypothesis: 分别有 79% 和 42% 的治疗组讨论了眼部与全身不良事件，但可能存在漏报。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
hypothesis: 比较前皮下盆腔内固定器 (INFIX) 和板内固定治疗不稳定前盆腔环骨折的有效性。

source: To compare the effectiveness of anterior subcutaneous pelvic internal fixator (INFIX) and plate internal fixation in treatment of unstable anterior pelvic ring fractures.
hypothesis: 比较前皮下盆腔内固定器 (INFIX) 和板内固定治疗不稳定前盆腔环骨折的有效性。

source: Among them, 21 cases were treated with INFIX (INFIX group), and 27 cases were treated with plate (plate group).
hypothesis: 其中，21 例病例采用 INFIX（INFIX组）治疗，27 例采用板块治疗（板块组）。

source: There was no significant difference in gender, age, body mass index, cause of injury, time from injury to operation, Injury Severity Score (ISS), and fracture type between the two groups (  The patients in both groups were followed up for an average of 12.5 months (range, 6-16 months).
hypothesis: 两组患者在性别、年龄、体重指数、受伤原因、受伤至手术时间、损伤严重度评分 (ISS) 及骨折类型间无显著差异（两组患者平均随访时间为 12.5 个月，范围为 6~16 个月）。

source: Among them, 21 cases were treated with INFIX (INFIX group), and 27 cases were treated with plate (plate group).
hypothesis: 其中，21 例病例采用 INFIX（INFIX组）治疗，27 例采用板块治疗（板块组）。

source: There was no significant difference in age, gender composition, body mass index, disease type, number of screws implanted, and segmental distribution between the two groups (  The operation time of group A was significantly longer than that in group B (  Compared with traditional freehand pedicle screw placement, robot-assisted pedicle screw placement significantly improves the accuracy and safety of screw placement without increasing the bleeding and postoperative drainage.
hypothesis: 两组患者在年龄、性别构成、体重指数、疾病类型、植入螺钉数量、节段分布等方面均无显著差异（A 组手术时间明显长于 B 组，与传统徒手椎弓根螺钉置入术相比，机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入术在不增加出血和术后引流的情况下，明显提高螺钉置入的准确性和安全性。

source: To compare the safety and accuracy of pedicle screw placement assisted by robot system with freehand pedicle screw placement in upper thoracic surgery.
hypothesis: 比较上胸外科手术中机器人辅助与徒手椎弓根螺钉置入的安全性和准确性。

source: Between December 2017 and December 2019, 39 cases with upper thoracic pedicle screw internal fixation were included in the study, including 19 cases in robot group (group A, robot assisted pedicle screw placement) and 20 cases in freehand group (group B, freehand pedicle screw placement).
hypothesis: 2017 年 12 月至 2019 年 12 月，39 例胸椎弓根螺钉内固定患者被纳入研究、其中 19 例为机器人组（A 组、机器人辅助椎弓根螺钉置入组），20 例为徒手组（B 组、徒手椎弓根螺钉置入组）。

source: There were 104 screws implanted in group A and 108 screws in group B.
hypothesis: A 组置入了 104 个螺钉， B 组置入了 108 个螺钉。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 探讨了在 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 和 J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 气相色谱柱不同检测条件下，卤代羟基烷对采用顶空气相色谱法进行血样中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: Conclusion Halogenated hydroxy-alkanes interfere with determination of ethanol content in blood by headspace gas chromatography.
hypothesis: 结论 卤代羟基烷烃干扰顶空-气相色谱法测定血液中乙醇含量。

source: Objective To study the influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes inhalation anesthetic on the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 目的 研究卤代羟基烷烃吸入麻醉剂对血液中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: Methods Halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes were analyzed by headspace gas chromatography with double column confirmatory detection method.
hypothesis: 方法 采用顶空-气相色谱法和双柱确证法分析卤代羟基烷烃。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 探讨了在 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 和 J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 气相色谱柱不同检测条件下，卤代羟基烷对采用顶空气相色谱法进行血样中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: Especially, COVID-19 pandemic might co-circulate with other respiratory infectious diseases such as influenza in the coming winter-spring season.
hypothesis: 特别是，在即将到来的冬春季节，COVID-19 大流行可能会与其他呼吸道传染病如流感等共同传播。

source: Currently, China has licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3) which includes split-virus influenza vaccine and subunit vaccine, quadrivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV4) which is split, and trivalent live attenuated influenza vaccine (LAIV3) which was newly licensed.
hypothesis: 目前，中国已批准三价灭活流感疫苗 (IIV3)，包括分裂病毒流感疫苗和亚单位疫苗，分裂四价灭活流感疫苗 (IIV4) 和新批准的三价减毒活流感疫苗 (LAIV3)。

source: Except for a few major cities, influenza vaccine is a category Ⅱ vaccine, which means influenza vaccination is voluntary, and recipients must pay for it.
hypothesis: 除少数大城市外，流感疫苗属于 II.类疫苗，即自愿接种流感疫苗，且接种者必须付费。

source: The main updates in this version include the following: First, new research evidences especially studies of China, including disease burden, effectiveness, Vaccine-avoidable disease burden, vaccine safety monitoring, and cost-effectiveness and cost-benefit.
hypothesis: 本版主要更新内容包括：一，增添新的研究证据，特别是对中国的研究，包括疾病负担、有效性、疫苗可避免的疾病负担、疫苗安全性监测、成本效果及成本效益。

source: Fourth, northern hemisphere influenza vaccination composition for the 2020-2021 season which included trivalent and quadrivalent influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 四、2020-2021 年，北半球流感疫苗接种组成，包括三价和四价流感疫苗。

source: The recommendations described in this report include the following: Points of Vaccination clinics (PoVs) should provide influenza vaccination to all persons aged 6 months and above who are willing to be vaccinated and do not have contraindications.
hypothesis: 本报告中描述的建议包括以下内容：疫苗接种点诊所 (POV) 应向所有 6 个月及以上愿意接种疫苗、无禁忌症的人提供流感疫苗接种。

source: No preferential recommendation is made for one influenza vaccine product over another for persons for whom more than one licensed, recommended, and appropriate product is available.
hypothesis: 对于获得一种以上许可、推荐和适当产品的人，不会优先推荐一种疫苗产品。

source: Considering the situation of globally pandemic of COVID-19, to decrease the risk of influenza virus infection and minimize the impact on COVID-19 prevention and control, we recommend the following priority for seasonal influenza vaccination: healthcare workers, including clinical doctors and nurses, public health professionals, quarantine professionals; vulnerable groups living in nursing homes or welfare homes and staffs who take care those vulnerable groups; people work or stay in high population density places, such as teachers and students in kindergartens, primary and secondary school, prisoners and staffs of prisons; other high risk group of influenza, including adults ≥60 years of age, children aged 6-59 months, persons with specific chronic diseases, the family members and caregivers of infants <6 months of age, and pregnant women or women who plan to become pregnant during the influenza season.
hypothesis: 考虑到全球 COVID-19 大流行的情势，为了降低流感病毒感染的风险，最大限度地减少对 COVID-19 预防和控制的影响，我们建议季节性流感疫苗的优先接种对象如下：医护人员，包括临床医生和护士，公共卫生专业人员，检疫专业人员；生活在养老院或福利院的弱势群体以及照顾这些弱势群体的工作人员；在高人口密度场所工作或停留的人员，如幼儿园，中小学的教师和学生，囚犯和监狱工作人员；其他高风险流感群体，包括 60 岁以上的成年人， 6-59 个月的儿童，特定慢性疾病患者， 6 个月以下婴儿的家庭成员和照顾者，孕妇及计划在流感季节期间怀孕的女士。

source: People whoever get IIV or LAIV all apply to the principle.
hypothesis: 获 IIV 或 LAIV 的人都适用该原则。

source: Influenza vaccine is also recommended for use in pregnant women during any trimester.
hypothesis: 流感疫苗也被推荐用于怀孕三个月内的孕妇使用。

source: Thirdly, new type seasonal influenza vaccine licensed and issued in 2020-2021 in China.
hypothesis: 三、2020-2021 年，我国新型季节性流感疫苗获批上市。

source: Influenza virus infection is a respiratory infectious disease that can seriously affect human health.
hypothesis: 流感病毒感染是一种呼吸道传染病，会严重影响人类健康。

source: Influenza viruses can have frequent antigenic variation and changes, which can result in rapid and widespread transmission resulting in annual epidemics and outbreaks in places of public gathering such as schools, kindergartens and nursing homes.
hypothesis: 流感病毒可发生频繁的抗原变异和变化，这使其快速和广泛的传播，导致每年在学校、幼儿园和养老院等公共集会场所爆发流行病和疫情。

source: According to WHO estimation, seasonal influenza epidemics have caused an annually 3 to 5 million severe cases and 290 000 to 650 000 deaths globally.
hypothesis: 根据世卫组织的预估，季节性流感疫情每年在全球造成 300 万 - 500 万严重病例和 29 万 - 65 万死亡病例。

source: Pregnant women, young children, the elderly, and persons with chronic illnesses are at high risk for severe illness and death associated with influenza virus infection.
hypothesis: 孕妇、幼儿、老人和慢性病患者是感染流感病毒的高风险人群，他们极有可能感染严重疾病和死亡。

source: Seasonal influenza vaccination is the most effective way to prevent influenza virus infection and complications from infection.
hypothesis: 季节性流感疫苗接种是预防流感病毒感染和感染并发症的最有效方法。

source: In 2018 and 2019, the China CDC issued the "Technical Guidelines for Seasonal Influenza Vaccination in China" .
hypothesis: 2018 年和 2019 年，中国疾病预防控制中心发布了《中国流感疫苗预防接种技术指南》。

source: In the past year, new research evidences home and abroad have been published, and new seasonal influenza vaccine has been licensed in China.
hypothesis: 过去一年，国内外陆续发表新的研究证据，我国已批准新型季节性流感疫苗。

source: Second, policies and measures for influenza prevention and control issued by National Health Commission (PRC) in the past year.
hypothesis: 二、近一年来国家卫生健康委员会 (PRC) 出台的流感防控政策和措施。

source: Fifth, Influenza vaccination recommendations for 2020-2021 influenza season.
hypothesis: 五、2020-2021 年，流感季节时流感疫苗接种建议。

source: If they were vaccinated in 2019-2020 influenza season or a prior season, 1 dose is recommended.
hypothesis: 如果他们在 2019-2020 年流感季或前一季已接种疫苗，建议接种 1 剂。

source: People more than 8 years old require 1 dose of influenza vaccine.
hypothesis: 8 岁以上人群需要 1 剂流感疫苗。

source: It is recommended that people receive their influenza vaccination by the end of October.
hypothesis: 建议人们在 10 月底前接种流感疫苗。

source: Influenza vaccination should be offered as soon as the vaccination is available.
hypothesis: 一旦有可接种的流感疫苗，就应尽快接种。

source: For the people unable to be vaccinated before the end of October, influenza vaccination will continue to be offered for the whole season.
hypothesis: 对于不能在 10 月底前接种疫苗的人，将继续提供整季的流感疫苗接种。

source: These guidelines are intended for use by staff members of the CDCs at all levels who work on influenza control and prevention, PoVs staff members, healthcare workers from the departments of pediatrics, internal medicine, and infectious diseases, and staff members of maternity and child care institutions at all levels.
hypothesis: 本指南供各级疾病预防控制中心从事流感控制和预防的工作人员、PoV 工作人员、儿科、内科和传染病科的医护人员以及各级妇幼保健机构的工作人员使用。

source: These guidelines will be updated periodically as new evidence becomes available.
hypothesis: 这些指南将随着新证据的出现而定期更新。

source: The influence of halogenated hydroxyl-alkanes on determination of ethanol content in blood sample by headspace gas chromatography was explored under the different detection conditions of KB-BAC1/ KB-BAC2 and J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 gas chromatographic column.
hypothesis: 探讨了在 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 和 J&W DB-ALC1/DB-ALC2 气相色谱柱不同检测条件下，卤代羟基烷对采用顶空气相色谱法进行血样中乙醇含量测定的影响。

source: When using KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 gas chromatographic column, the retention time of sevoflurane, isoflurane and ethanol is similar, especially that of sevoflurane and ethanol, and sevoflurane obviously interferes with the determination of ethanol content in blood.
hypothesis: 使用 KB-BAC1/KB-BAC2 气相色谱柱时，七氟烷、异氟烷和乙醇的保留时间相似，特别是七氟烷和乙醇的保留时间，七氟烷明显干扰血液中乙醇含量的测定。

source: The interference can be discriminated effectively by choosing the suitable chromatographic column and double column confirmatory detection.
hypothesis: 通过选择合适的色谱柱和双柱确证检测，可以有效地区分干扰。

source: To evaluate the effectiveness of cement-injectable cannulated pedicle screw combined with multiple level Schwab grade Ⅰ osteotomy for chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures with kyphosis.
hypothesis: 评估注射型中空骨水泥椎弓根螺钉联合多节段 Schwab Ⅰ级截骨术治疗伴有脊柱后凸的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折的有效性。

source: The incisions healed by first intention in 26 cases, and 1 incision healed after dressing change due to poor blood glucose control.
hypothesis: 有 26 例切口出现一期愈合，因血糖控制不佳有 1 个切口于换药后愈合。

source: The clinical data of 27 patients with symptomatic chronic thoracolumbar osteoporotic fractures combined with kyphosis treated between June 2015 and June 2017 were retrospectively analysed.
hypothesis: 对于在 2015 年 6 月至 2017 年 6 月期间治疗的 27 名有症状的慢性胸腰椎骨质疏松性骨折伴脊柱后凸患者的临床数据进行了回顾性分析。

source: Among them, there were 8 males and 19 females, with an average age of 69.5 years (range, 56-81 years).
hypothesis: 其中男性 8 人，女性 19 人，平均年龄 69.5 岁（范围为 56-81 岁）。

source: There were no complications such as bedsore, hypostatic pneumonia, or deep venous thrombosis.
hypothesis: 无褥疮、坠积性肺炎、深静脉血栓形成等并发症。

source: All patients were followed up 8-24 months, with an average of 16.6 months.
hypothesis: 对所有患者进行 8～24 个月的随访，平均 16.6 个月。

source: In the last decades, only few improvements have been made in the comprehension of bladder cancer tumor leading to few improvements in the development of new diagnostic and therapeutic approaches.
hypothesis: En las últimas décadas, solo se han realizado pocas mejoras en la comprensión del tumor de cáncer de vejiga, lo que lleva a pocas mejoras en el desarrollo de nuevos enfoques diagnósticos y terapéuticos.

source: However, in the last years several step forwards in the field of precision medicine have been made.
hypothesis: Sin embargo, en los últimos años se han dado varios pasos adelante en el campo de la medicina de precisión.

source: In this review we focused on some of these elements such as the available biomarkers, the role of enhanced transurethral resection of the bladder and the role of the molecular classification in defining prognosis and therapeutic approaches in bladder cancer patients.
hypothesis: En esta revisión nos centramos en algunos de estos elementos, como los biomarcadores disponibles, el papel de la resección transuretral mejorada de la vejiga y el papel de la clasificación molecular en la definición del pronóstico y los enfoques terapéuticos en pacientes con cáncer de vejiga.

source: Although several progresses have been made, at the time none of the existing biomarkers appear to be able to safely avoid the need of cystoscopy during the follow up of bladder cancer patients.
hypothesis: Aunque se han logrado varios progresos, en este momento ninguno de los biomarcadores existentes parece ser capaz de evitar de manera segura la necesidad de cistoscopia durante el seguimiento de los pacientes con cáncer de vejiga.

source: Enhanced transurethral resection technique can in some cases reduce the risk of recurrence during follow up, although its impact on survival outcomes is still under debate.
hypothesis: La técnica de resección transuretral mejorada puede reducir en algunos casos el riesgo de recurrencia durante el seguimiento, aunque su impacto en los resultados de supervivencia sigue siendo objeto de debate.

source: Finally, the molecular classification of the bladder cancer represents one of the most exciting novelty in this field, improving consistently the knowledge of bladder cancer.
hypothesis: Finalmente, la clasificación molecular del cáncer de vejiga representa una de las novedades más interesantes en este campo, mejorando constantemente el conocimiento del cáncer de vejiga.

source: In the last decades, only few improvements have been made in the comprehension of bladder cancer tumor leading to few improvements in the development of new diagnostic and therapeutic approaches.
hypothesis: En las últimas décadas, solo se han realizado pocas mejoras en la comprensión del tumor de cáncer de vejiga, lo que lleva a pocas mejoras en el desarrollo de nuevos enfoques diagnósticos y terapéuticos.

source: Objective: the aim of this research was to explore the relationship between dietary pattern habits and compliance with screen-time guidelines in Spanish schoolchildren.
hypothesis: Objetivo: el objetivo de esta investigación fue explorar la relación entre los hábitos alimentarios y el cumplimiento de las pautas de tiempo frente a la pantalla en escolares españoles.

source: Material and methods: a cross-sectional and associative study was performed in a total of 370 schoolchildren (44.9 % girls) aged 6-13 (8.7 ± 1.8) years.
hypothesis: Material y métodos: se realizó un estudio transversal y asociativo en un total de 370 niños en edad escolar (44,9 %, niñas) de entre 6 y 13 años (8,7 ± 1,8) años.

source: Results: for boys, those who did not meet these guidelines presented lower chances of eating vegetables regularly (OR = 0.50; 95 % CI = 0.28-0.89) or more than once a day (OR = 0.43; 95 % CI = 0.22-0.85).
hypothesis: Resultados: para los niños, aquellos que no cumplieron con estas pautas presentaron menores posibilidades de comer vegetales regularmente (OR = 0,50; IC 95 % = 0,28-0,89) o más de una vez al día (OR = 0,43; IC 95 % = 0,22-0,85).

source: Material and methods: a cross-sectional and associative study was performed in a total of 370 schoolchildren (44.9 % girls) aged 6-13 (8.7 ± 1.8) years.
hypothesis: Material y métodos: se realizó un estudio transversal y asociativo en un total de 370 niños en edad escolar (44,9 %, niñas) de entre 6 y 13 años (8,7 ± 1,8) años.

source: Objective: the present study aimed to develop and validate a food frequency questionnaire (FFQ) to assess nutrient intake in Jordanian children.
hypothesis: Objetivo: el presente estudio tuvo como objetivo desarrollar y validar un cuestionario de frecuencia de alimentos (FFQ) para evaluar la ingesta de nutrientes en niños jordanos.

source: One hundred and thirty-six children aged 6-18 years were enrolled from selected schools in Amman, Jordan.
hypothesis: Se matricularon 136 niños de 6 a 18 años en escuelas seleccionadas de Ammán, Jordania.

source: Objective: the present study aimed to develop and validate a food frequency questionnaire (FFQ) to assess nutrient intake in Jordanian children.
hypothesis: Objetivo: el presente estudio tuvo como objetivo desarrollar y validar un cuestionario de frecuencia de alimentos (FFQ) para evaluar la ingesta de nutrientes en niños jordanos.

source: Methods: in this validation study, nutrient intake as obtained from a culturally sensitive quantitative FFQ was compared to nutrient intake as assessed by four 24-hour dietary recalls (24-HRs) between September 2017 and May 2018.
hypothesis: Métodos: en este estudio de validación, la ingesta de nutrientes obtenida a partir de un FFQ cuantitativo culturalmente sensible se comparó con la ingesta de nutrientes evaluada mediante cuatro recordatorios dietéticos de 24 horas (24 horas) entre septiembre de 2017 y mayo de 2018.

source: Objective: the present study aimed to develop and validate a food frequency questionnaire (FFQ) to assess nutrient intake in Jordanian children.
hypothesis: Objetivo: el presente estudio tuvo como objetivo desarrollar y validar un cuestionario de frecuencia de alimentos (FFQ) para evaluar la ingesta de nutrientes en niños jordanos.

source: Objective: the present study aimed to develop and validate a food frequency questionnaire (FFQ) to assess nutrient intake in Jordanian children.
hypothesis: Objetivo: el presente estudio tuvo como objetivo desarrollar y validar un cuestionario de frecuencia de alimentos (FFQ) para evaluar la ingesta de nutrientes en niños jordanos.

source: Objective: the present study aimed to develop and validate a food frequency questionnaire (FFQ) to assess nutrient intake in Jordanian children.
hypothesis: Objetivo: el presente estudio tuvo como objetivo desarrollar y validar un cuestionario de frecuencia de alimentos (FFQ) para evaluar la ingesta de nutrientes en niños jordanos.

source: Objective: the present study aimed to develop and validate a food frequency questionnaire (FFQ) to assess nutrient intake in Jordanian children.
hypothesis: Objetivo: el presente estudio tuvo como objetivo desarrollar y validar un cuestionario de frecuencia de alimentos (FFQ) para evaluar la ingesta de nutrientes en niños jordanos.

source: Bland-Altman plots showed a satisfactory agreement between the two methods for energy and proteins.
hypothesis: Los gráficos de Bland-Altman mostraron una concordancia satisfactoria entre los dos métodos para la energía y las proteínas.

source: Objective: the present study aimed to develop and validate a food frequency questionnaire (FFQ) to assess nutrient intake in Jordanian children.
hypothesis: Objetivo: el presente estudio tuvo como objetivo desarrollar y validar un cuestionario de frecuencia de alimentos (FFQ) para evaluar la ingesta de nutrientes en niños jordanos.

source: Objective: the present study aimed to develop and validate a food frequency questionnaire (FFQ) to assess nutrient intake in Jordanian children.
hypothesis: Objetivo: el presente estudio tuvo como objetivo desarrollar y validar un cuestionario de frecuencia de alimentos (FFQ) para evaluar la ingesta de nutrientes en niños jordanos.

source: Introduction: assessing the relationship between childhood diseases and nutrient intake is a crucial issue that requires valid and reliable dietary assessment tools in this period of physical and physiological development.
hypothesis: Introducción: la evaluación de la relación entre las enfermedades infantiles y la ingesta de nutrientes es un tema crucial que requiere herramientas válidas y confiables de evaluación dietética en este periodo de desarrollo físico y fisiológico.

source: For all nutrients, over 60 % of participants were classified into the same or adjacent quartile of crude and adjusted intake.
hypothesis: Para todos los nutrientes, más del 60 % de los participantes se clasificaron en el mismo cuartil o en el cuartil adyacente de ingesta bruta y ajustada.

source: Fifty percent of muscle-invasive bladder cancer (MIBC) patients succumb from metastatic disease despite radical cystectomy (RC).
hypothesis: El cincuenta por ciento de los pacientes con cáncer de vejiga con invasión muscular (CVIM) sucumben por enfermedad metastásica a pesar de la cistectomía radical (CR).

source: Neoadjuvant chemotherapy (NAC) and adjuvant chemotherapy (ACT) randomized clinical trials (RCT) investigated whether peri-operative chemotherapy improves survival.
hypothesis: Los ensayos clínicos aleatorizados (ECA) de quimioterapia neoadyuvante (QTN) y quimioterapia adyuvante (QTA) investigaron si la quimioterapia perioperatoria mejora la supervivencia.

source: More recently, immune checkpoint inhibitors (ICI) are explored as peri-operative single agent, ICI-ICI or ICI-chemotherapy combinations.
hypothesis: Más recientemente, los inhibidores de puntos de control inmunitarios (ICI, por sus siglas en inglés) se exploran como agentes únicos perioperatorios, ICI-ICI o combinaciones de ICI-quimioterapia.

source: Our goal is to provide the status of neoadjuvant and adjuvant treatment in MIBC.
hypothesis: Nuestro objetivo es proporcionar el estado del tratamiento neoadyuvante y adyuvante en CVIM.

source: Neoadjuvant chemotherapy (NAC) and adjuvant chemotherapy (ACT) randomized clinical trials (RCT) investigated whether peri-operative chemotherapy improves survival.
hypothesis: Los ensayos clínicos aleatorizados (ECA) de quimioterapia neoadyuvante (QTN) y quimioterapia adyuvante (QTA) investigaron si la quimioterapia perioperatoria mejora la supervivencia.

source: Meta-analyses indicated a small, but significant 5% improvement in overall survival in T2-T4N0M0 MIBC patients.
hypothesis: Los metanálisis indicaron una mejoría pequeña, pero significativa, del 5 % en la supervivencia general en pacientes con CVIM T2-T4N0M0.

source: NAC value in N+MIBC is not established and predictive value of associated~25-40% complete downstaging (pathologically confirmed complete regression, pCR) not unequivocally demonstrated.
hypothesis: El valor de QTN en el N+CVIM no está establecido y el valor predictivo de la reducción completa asociada ~25-40 % (regresión completa confirmada patológicamente, PCR) no se ha demostrado de manera inequívoca.

source: Novel neoadjuvant immune checkpoint inhibitors, alone or with chemotherapy, phase 2 trials demonstrate down staging and encouraging clinical results.
hypothesis: Nuevos inhibidores neoadyuvantes del punto de control inmunitario, solos o con quimioterapia, los ensayos de fase 2 demuestran reducción del estado y resultados clínicos alentadores.

source: Since the 1980s, NAC RCTs were performed in cisplatin-fit patients, mainly using cisplatin combination chemotherapy.
hypothesis: Desde la década de 1980, los ECA de NAC se realizaron en pacientes aptos para cisplatino, principalmente utilizando quimioterapia combinada con cisplatino.

source: The value of neoadjuvant treatment in node-positive MIBC is not clearly demonstrated requiring more accurate clinical staging and prospective studies.
hypothesis: El valor del tratamiento neoadyuvante en la CVIM con ganglios positivos no está claramente demostrado, lo que requiere una estadificación clínica más precisa y estudios prospectivos.

source: Molecular tumour subtyping will support selecting novel agents for neoadjuvant or adjuvant strategies.
hypothesis: La subtipificación de tumores moleculares apoyará la selección de nuevos agentes para estrategias neoadyuvantes o adyuvantes.

source: The literature on NAC and ACT trials in MIBC was reviewed.
hypothesis: Se revisó la literatura sobre ensayos de QTN y QTA en CVIM.

source: Adjuvant cisplatin-based chemotherapy RCTs were smaller, some prematurely stopped for poor accrual, and underpowered to demonstrate clear statistical evidence for a 5% overall survival advantage in pT3-T4N1-3M0 MIBC.
hypothesis: Los ECA de quimioterapia adyuvante basada en cisplatino fueron más pequeños, algunos se interrumpieron prematuramente debido a una escasa participación, y no tuvieron la potencia suficiente para demostrar pruebas estadísticas claras de una ventaja de supervivencia global del 5 % en el CVIM pT3-T4N1-3M0.

source: Adjuvant cisplatin-based chemotherapy may be considered in selected, chemo-naïve pT3-T4N+patients.
hypothesis: Se puede considerar la quimioterapia adyuvante basada en cisplatino en pacientes pT3-T4N+ seleccionados y sin tratamiento previo con quimioterapia.

source: Results from prospective checkpoint inhibitor immunotherapy RCTs are needed before immunotherapy becomes a recommended alternative for peri-operative treatment.
hypothesis: Se necesitan resultados de ECA prospectivos de inmunoterapia con inhibidores de puntos de control antes de que la inmunoterapia se convierta en una alternativa recomendada para el tratamiento perioperatorio.

source: Mostly MVAC or gemcitabine-cisplatin (GC) regimens were used without clear benefit of one regimen over the other.
hypothesis: La mayoría de los regímenes de MVAC o gemcitabina-cisplatino (GC) se utilizaron sin un beneficio claro de un régimen sobre el otro.

source: The study aimed to compare two concepts of rurality, one proposed by the Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics (IBGE) and the other by the World Bank, to determine which is better fitted to the territory's reality, besides analyzing the infant mortality profile of rural municipalities (counties) in the state of Paraíba, Brazil, according to the best criterion for rurality.
hypothesis: El estudio tuvo como objetivo comparar dos conceptos de ruralidad, uno propuesto por el Instituto Brasileño de Geografía y Estadística (IBGE) y el otro por el Banco Mundial, para determinar cuál se ajusta mejor a la realidad del territorio, además de analizar el perfil de mortalidad infantil de los municipios rurales (condados) en el estado de Paraíba, Brasil, según el mejor criterio para la ruralidad.

source: The method for analyzing rural/urban typologies was based on data mining, using the Apriori algorithm of association.
hypothesis: El método de análisis de las tipologías rural/urbano se basó en la minería de datos, utilizando el algoritmo de asociación Apriori.

source: The data were obtained from the Mortality Information System of the Brazilian Ministry of Health, from 2007 to 2016, and municipal indicators were from IBGE.
hypothesis: Los datos se obtuvieron del Sistema de Información de Mortalidad del Ministerio de Salud de Brasil, de 2007 a 2016, y los indicadores municipales fueron del IBGE.

source: The World Bank definition of rurality showed kappa = 0.337, compared to the IBGE definition, with kappa = 0.616. Among the 223 municipalities that were analyzed, the World Bank classified 130 (65.66%) correctly, and the IBGE 183 (82.06%).
hypothesis: La definición de ruralidad del Banco Mundial mostró kappa = 0,337, en comparación con la definición del IBGE, con kappa = 0,616. Entre los 223 municipios analizados, el Banco Mundial clasificó correctamente a 130 (65,66 %) y el IBGE, a 183 (82,06 %).

source: The study aimed to compare two concepts of rurality, one proposed by the Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics (IBGE) and the other by the World Bank, to determine which is better fitted to the territory's reality, besides analyzing the infant mortality profile of rural municipalities (counties) in the state of Paraíba, Brazil, according to the best criterion for rurality.
hypothesis: El estudio tuvo como objetivo comparar dos conceptos de ruralidad, uno propuesto por el Instituto Brasileño de Geografía y Estadística (IBGE) y el otro por el Banco Mundial, para determinar cuál se ajusta mejor a la realidad del territorio, además de analizar el perfil de mortalidad infantil de los municipios rurales (condados) en el estado de Paraíba, Brasil, según el mejor criterio para la ruralidad.

source: Underlying cause of death was classified as avoidable death via interventions by the Brazilian Unified National Health System (65.2%).
hypothesis: La causa subyacente de muerte fue clasificada como muerte evitable a través de intervenciones del Sistema Único de Salud de Brasil (65,2 %).

source: This classification allowed studying the infant mortality profile in rural municipalities, which was similar to the overall profile, except for maternal schooling.
hypothesis: Esta clasificación permitió estudiar el perfil de mortalidad infantil en los municipios rurales, que fue similar al perfil general, excepto por la escolaridad materna.

source: The urban/rural typology adopted by the IBGE was better than the World Bank at classifying the municipalities in Paraiba state.
hypothesis: La tipología urbana/rural adoptada por el IBGE fue mejor que la del Banco Mundial para clasificar los municipios del estado de Paraíba.

source: This was an observational epidemiological study conducted in the state of Paraíba.
hypothesis: Se trata de un estudio epidemiológico observacional realizado en el estado de Paraíba.

source: Infant mortality was analyzed with descriptive statistics.
hypothesis: La mortalidad infantil se analizó con estadística descriptiva.

source: Faced with the prospect of a collapsed health system due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the professionals involved in the Neonatal Screening Programme (NSP) of Catalonia had to adapt to this situation in a flexible, forceful and efficient manner.
hypothesis: Ante la perspectiva de un sistema de salud colapsado por la pandemia de COVID-19, los profesionales implicados en el Programa de Cribado Neonatal (NSP, por sus siglas en inglés) de Cataluña tuvieron que adaptarse a esta situación de forma flexible, contundente y eficiente.

source: The most important goals were to prevent the risk of infection in the professionals, in families and their newborns, as well as to ensure the same effectiveness for the early detection of the diseases included in our programme.
hypothesis: Los objetivos más importantes eran prevenir el riesgo de infección en los profesionales, en las familias y en sus recién nacidos, así como garantizar la misma eficacia para la detección precoz de las enfermedades incluidas en nuestro programa.

source: To this end, the laboratory was reorganised by dividing the staff into groups and the spaces were redistributed.
hypothesis: Para ello, se reorganizó el laboratorio dividiendo al personal en grupos y se redistribuyeron los espacios.

source: It was also necessary to modify several protocols and circuits, especially for the management of early discharges from maternity centres, and for the collection of the necessary second samples (from newborns with inconclusive results or for low quality samples).
hypothesis: También fue necesario modificar varios protocolos y circuitos, especialmente para la gestión de las altas tempranas de las maternidades, y para la recogida de las segundas muestras necesarias (de recién nacidos con resultados no concluyentes o de baja calidad).

source: In the specific case of cystic fibrosis detection, the implementation of a new strategy meant a 100% reduction in the request for second samples and a 70% reduction in the age of diagnosis of the newborn.
hypothesis: En el caso específico de la detección de fibrosis quística, la implementación de una nueva estrategia significó una reducción del 100 % en la solicitud de segundas muestras y una reducción del 70 % en la edad de diagnóstico del recién nacido.

source: Faced with the prospect of a collapsed health system due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the professionals involved in the Neonatal Screening Programme (NSP) of Catalonia had to adapt to this situation in a flexible, forceful and efficient manner.
hypothesis: Ante la perspectiva de un sistema de salud colapsado por la pandemia de COVID-19, los profesionales implicados en el Programa de Cribado Neonatal (NSP, por sus siglas en inglés) de Cataluña tuvieron que adaptarse a esta situación de forma flexible, contundente y eficiente.

source: The new processes and circuits implemented have been definitively consolidated, improving the efficiency of the programme.
hypothesis: Los nuevos procesos y circuitos implantados se han consolidado definitivamente, ya que mejoraron la eficacia del programa.

source: In general, a 36% reduction in the time of arrival of these second samples at the laboratory was achieved with respect to the previous circuit.
hypothesis: En general, se logró una reducción del 36 % en el tiempo de llegada de estas segundas muestras al laboratorio con respecto al circuito anterior.

source: The present systematic review examined post-migration variables impacting upon mental health outcomes among asylum-seeking and refugee populations in Europe.
hypothesis: La presente revisión sistemática examinó las variables posteriores a la migración que afectan a los resultados de salud mental entre las poblaciones solicitantes de asilo y refugiadas en Europa.

source: It focuses on the effects of post-settlement stressors (including length of asylum process and duration of stay, residency status and social integration) and their impact upon post-traumatic stress disorder, anxiety and depression.
hypothesis: Se centra en los efectos de los factores estresantes posteriores al asentamiento (incluida la duración del proceso de asilo y la duración de la estancia, el estado de residencia y la integración social) y su impacto en el trastorno de estrés postraumático, la ansiedad y la depresión.

source: Twenty-two studies were reviewed in this study.
hypothesis: En este estudio se revisaron veintidós estudios.

source: It focuses on the effects of post-settlement stressors (including length of asylum process and duration of stay, residency status and social integration) and their impact upon post-traumatic stress disorder, anxiety and depression.
hypothesis: Se centra en los efectos de los factores estresantes posteriores al asentamiento (incluida la duración del proceso de asilo y la duración de la estancia, el estado de residencia y la integración social) y su impacto en el trastorno de estrés postraumático, la ansiedad y la depresión.

source: Contrary to expectation, residency or legal status was posited as a marker for other explanatory variables, including loneliness, discrimination and communication or language problems, rather than being an explanatory variable itself.
hypothesis: Contrariamente a lo esperado, la residencia o el estatus legal se postuló como un marcador de otras variables explicativas, incluida la soledad, la discriminación y los problemas de comunicación o lenguaje, en lugar de ser una variable explicativa en sí misma.

source: However, in line with previous findings and as hypothesised in this review, there were statistically significant correlations found between family life, family separation and mental health outcomes.
hypothesis: Sin embargo, de acuerdo con hallazgos anteriores y según la hipótesis de esta revisión, se encontraron correlaciones estadísticamente significativas entre la vida familiar, la separación familiar y los resultados de salud mental.

source: This study aimed to identify patients eligible for a 48-h stay after colorectal resection, to provide guidance for early discharge planning.
hypothesis: Este estudio tuvo como objetivo identificar a los pacientes aptos para una estancia de 48 horas después de la resección colorrectal, a fin de proporcionar orientación para planificar el alta temprana.

source: Overall and severe (Clavien-Dindo grade IIIb or above) postoperative complication and readmission rates were compared between patients who were discharged within 48 h and those who had hospital stay of 48 h or more.
hypothesis: Se compararon las tasas de complicaciones postoperatorias globales e intensas (grado de Clavien-Dindo IIIb o superior) y de reingresos entre los pacientes que fueron dados de alta en 48 h y los que tuvieron una estancia hospitalaria de 48 h o superior.

source: Independent factors favouring a short hospital stay were age below 60 years (odds ratio (OR) 1·34; P = 0·002), ASA grade less than III (OR 1·42; P = 0·003), restrictive fluid management (less than 3000 ml on day of surgery: OR 1·46; P < 0·001), duration of surgery less than 180 min (OR 1·89; P < 0·001), minimally invasive approach (OR 1·92; P < 0·001) and wound contamination grade below III (OR 4·50; P < 0·001), whereas cancer diagnosis (OR 0·55; P < 0·001) and malnutrition
hypothesis: Los factores independientes que favorecieron una estancia hospitalaria corta fueron la edad inferior a 60 años (cociente de probabilidades [OR] de 1,34; p = 0,002), grado de AAS inferior a III (OR 1,42; P = 0,003), manejo restrictivo de líquidos (inferior a 3000 ml el día de la intervención: OR 1,46; P <0,001), duración de la intervención inferior a 180 min (OR 1,89; P <0,001), abordaje mínimamente invasivo (OR 1,92; P <0,001) y grado de contaminación de la herida inferior a III (OR 4,50; P <0,001), mientras que el diagnóstico de cáncer (OR 0,55; P <0,001) y la desnutrición

source: In these patients, outpatient colorectal surgery should be feasible on a large scale with logistical optimization.
hypothesis: En estos pacientes, la cirugía colorrectal ambulatoria debe ser factible a gran escala con una optimización logística.

source: A bi-institutional retrospective cohort study was undertaken of consecutive patients undergoing major elective colorectal resection for benign or malignant pathology within a comprehensive enhanced recovery pathway between 2011 and 2017.
hypothesis: Se llevó a cabo un estudio de cohortes retrospectivo en el que participaron pacientes consecutivos de dos centros, que se sometieron a una resección colorrectal mayor programada por trastorno benigno o maligno dentro de una vía integral de recuperación aumentada entre 2011 y 2017.

source: Multinominal logistic regression analysis was performed to ascertain significant factors associated with a short hospital stay (less than 48 h).
hypothesis: Se llevó a cabo un análisis de regresión logística multinominal para determinar los factores significativos asociados a una estancia hospitalaria corta (inferior a 48 h).

source: Spontaneous perforation of the common bile duct is rare.
hypothesis: La perforación espontánea del conducto biliar común es rara.

source: The cause is usually unknown, although it is sometimes related to the malformation of the bile duct.
hypothesis: La causa suele ser desconocida, aunque a veces está relacionada con la malformación del conducto biliar.

source: Female of 1 year, with abdominal distention, hyporexia and fever, tomography with ascites, surgical findings included retroperitoneal bilioma, peritonitis and perforation of common bile duct.
hypothesis: Mujer de 1 año, con distensión abdominal, hiporexia y fiebre, tomografía con ascitis. Los hallazgos quirúrgicos incluyeron bilioma retroperitoneal, peritonitis y perforación del conducto biliar común.

source: Block resection and primary hepato-duodenal anastomosis were performed.
hypothesis: Se realizó resección en bloque y anastomosis hepato-duodenal primaria.

source: Spontaneous perforation of the common bile duct tend to evolve insidiously and delay in diagnosis is frequent.
hypothesis: La perforación espontánea del colédoco tiende a evolucionar de manera insidiosa y es frecuente el retraso en el diagnóstico.

source: Surgical management is decisive, and there are different techniques described.
hypothesis: El manejo quirúrgico es decisivo y se describen diferentes técnicas.

source: A high index of suspicion is important, treatment must be individualized according to each patient.
hypothesis: Es importante un alto índice de sospecha, el tratamiento debe individualizarse de acuerdo a cada paciente.

source: Fixed-effects regressions with gender, age, and their interaction included as explanatory variables were conducted to calculate the average change in youth mental health, callous-unemotional traits, academic outcomes, substance use, and family functioning.
hypothesis: Se aplicaron regresiones de efectos fijos con el género, la edad y su interacción como variables explicativas, para calcular el cambio promedio en la salud mental juvenil, los rasgos de insensibilidad o de ausencia de emocionalidad, los resultados académicos, el consumo de sustancias tóxicas y el funcionamiento familiar.

source: Fixed-effects regressions with gender, age, and their interaction included as explanatory variables were conducted to calculate the average change in youth mental health, callous-unemotional traits, academic outcomes, substance use, and family functioning.
hypothesis: Se aplicaron regresiones de efectos fijos con el género, la edad y su interacción como variables explicativas, para calcular el cambio promedio en la salud mental juvenil, los rasgos de insensibilidad o de ausencia de emocionalidad, los resultados académicos, el consumo de sustancias tóxicas y el funcionamiento familiar.

source: Fixed-effects regressions with gender, age, and their interaction included as explanatory variables were conducted to calculate the average change in youth mental health, callous-unemotional traits, academic outcomes, substance use, and family functioning.
hypothesis: Se aplicaron regresiones de efectos fijos con el género, la edad y su interacción como variables explicativas, para calcular el cambio promedio en la salud mental juvenil, los rasgos de insensibilidad o de ausencia de emocionalidad, los resultados académicos, el consumo de sustancias tóxicas y el funcionamiento familiar.

source: Fixed-effects regressions with gender, age, and their interaction included as explanatory variables were conducted to calculate the average change in youth mental health, callous-unemotional traits, academic outcomes, substance use, and family functioning.
hypothesis: Se aplicaron regresiones de efectos fijos con el género, la edad y su interacción como variables explicativas, para calcular el cambio promedio en la salud mental juvenil, los rasgos de insensibilidad o de ausencia de emocionalidad, los resultados académicos, el consumo de sustancias tóxicas y el funcionamiento familiar.

source: The current study contributes to a sparse literature on moderators of Functional Family Therapy (FFT) by examining whether responsiveness to FFT, measured by a broad range of outcomes, varies by adolescent gender, age, and their interaction.
hypothesis: El estudio actual contribuye a la escasa literatura sobre los moderadores de la Terapia familiar funcional (FFT) al examinar si la capacidad de respuesta a la FFT, medida por una amplia gama de resultados, varía según el sexo del adolescente, la edad y su interacción.

source: This study was informed by 687 families (n, adolescents = 581; n, caregivers = 933) and utilized a pre-post comparison design.
hypothesis: En este estudio se contó con 687 familias (n, adolescentes = 581; n, cuidadores = 933) y se utilizó un diseño de comparación antes y después.

source: Moderation analyses revealed that according to parent report, girls had significantly greater improvements in peer problems and family functioning, and boys benefited more in increased liking of school.
hypothesis: Los análisis de moderación revelaron que, según el informe de los padres, las niñas habían tenido una mejora considerablemente superior de los problemas con los compañeros y el funcionamiento de la familia, y los niños se beneficiaban más de una mayor simpatía hacia la escuela.

source: There were differential effects by age, such that older youth had less beneficial mental health outcomes and a smaller decrease in frequency of hash use.
hypothesis: Hubo efectos diferenciales por edad, de modo que los jóvenes de mayor edad tuvieron resultados de salud mental menos beneficiosos y una disminución menor en la frecuencia del consumo de hachís.

source: The caregivers of 435 children (211 females, 224 males; mean age 12y; SD 3y 11mo; age range 5-18y) with intellectual disability and autism spectrum disorder, cerebral palsy, Down syndrome, or Rett syndrome reported on their child's functioning (dependence for managing personal needs, mobility, communication, eye contact when speaking), frequency of participation, and QoL. Linear regression and mediation analyses were used to evaluate the relationships between child functioning, participation, and QoL. Children with greater dependency for managing personal needs and limited eye contact when speaking experienced poorer QoL. Less impaired functioning was associated with more frequent participation, which, in turn, was associated with a 3-point gain in QoL for each additional point in frequency of participation (coefficient=2.67, 95% confidence interval 1.56-3.78).
hypothesis: Los cuidadores de 435 niños (211 mujeres, 224 hombres; edad media 12 años; DE de 3 años y 11 meses; intervalo de edad 5-18 años) con discapacidad intelectual y trastorno del espectro autista, parálisis cerebral, síndrome de Down o síndrome de Rett facilitaron información sobre la funcionalidad de sus hijos (dependencia para gestionar necesidades personales, movilidad, comunicación, contacto visual al hablar), la frecuencia de participación y la CdV. Se utilizaron análisis de mediación y regresión lineal para evaluar las relaciones entre la funcionalidad, la participación y la CdV del niño. Los niños con mayor dependencia para gestionar sus necesidades personales y con contacto visual limitado al hablar presentaron una CdV peor. Una funcionalidad menos deteriorada se asoció a una participación más frecuente, lo que, a su vez, se asoció a una ganancia de 3 puntos en la calidad de vida por cada punto adicional en la frecuencia de participación (coeficiente = 2,67, intervalo de confianza al 95 %: 1,56-3,78).

source: To investigate associations between functioning, community participation, and quality of life (QoL) and identify whether participation mediates the effects of functioning on QoL.
hypothesis: Investigar las asociaciones entre la funcionalidad, la participación comunitaria y la calidad de vida (CdV) e identificar si la participación influye en los efectos del funcionamiento sobre la CdV.

source: Greater levels of impairments with poorer functioning, notably a high level of dependence, were associated with poorer QoL. Poorer QoL can be partly explained by less frequent community participation.
hypothesis: Los mayores niveles de deficiencia con peor funcionamiento, especialmente un elevado nivel de dependencia, se asociaron a una CdV peor, que puede explicarse en parte por una participación menos frecuente en la comunidad.

source: To investigate associations between functioning, community participation, and quality of life (QoL) and identify whether participation mediates the effects of functioning on QoL.
hypothesis: Investigar las asociaciones entre la funcionalidad, la participación comunitaria y la calidad de vida (CdV) e identificar si la participación influye en los efectos del funcionamiento sobre la CdV.

source: The data are from the Birth in Brazil study, a national survey consisting of 23,894 postpartum women and their newborn infants.
hypothesis: Los datos provienen del estudio Nacimiento en Brasil, una encuesta nacional que consta de 23.894 mujeres posparto y sus recién nacidos.

source: The data are from the Birth in Brazil study, a national survey consisting of 23,894 postpartum women and their newborn infants.
hypothesis: Los datos provienen del estudio Nacimiento en Brasil, una encuesta nacional que consta de 23.894 mujeres posparto y sus recién nacidos.

source: The study revealed social, economic, and maternal care disparities between the women according to age bracket.
hypothesis: El estudio reveló disparidades sociales, económicas y de atención materna entre las mujeres según el tramo de edad.

source: The highest proportions of teenage mothers were in the least developed regions of Brazil (North and Northeast) and in the poorest economic classes.
hypothesis: Las mayores proporciones de madres adolescentes se encontraban en las regiones menos desarrolladas de Brasil (Norte y Nordeste) y en las clases económicas más pobres.

source: The study outcome was gestational age, considering all the premature births (gestational age < 37 weeks) and term births (gestational age 37 weeks to 41 weeks and 6 days).
hypothesis: El resultado del estudio fue la edad gestacional, considerando todos los partos prematuros (edad gestacional < 37 semanas) y nacidos a término (edad gestacional 37 semanas a 41 semanas y 6 días).

source: After matching for socioeconomic and obstetric care characteristics, the highest odds of spontaneous prematurity were seen in younger adolescents compared to older adolescents (OR = 1.49; 95%CI: 1.07-2.06), and young adults (OR = 2.38; 95%CI: 1.82-3.12).
hypothesis: Después de emparejar las características socioeconómicas y de atención obstétrica, las probabilidades más altas de prematuridad espontánea se observaron en adolescentes más jóvenes en comparación con adolescentes mayores (OR = 1,49; IC del 95 %: 1,07-2,06) y adultos jóvenes (OR = 2,38; IC del 95 %: 1,82-3,12).

source: The study aims to evaluate the association between teenage pregnancy and prematurity.
hypothesis: El estudio tiene como objetivo evaluar la asociación entre el embarazo en la adolescencia y la prematuridad.

source: The information was obtained from interviews with the mothers during their postpartum hospital stay.
hypothesis: La información se obtuvo de entrevistas con las madres durante su estancia hospitalaria posparto.

source: There are a variety of instruments and indicators to assess continuity of care; however there is a lack of those that describe the result of coordination between the health care levels.
hypothesis: Hay una variedad de instrumentos e indicadores para evaluar la continuidad de la atención; sin embargo faltan aquellos que describen el resultado de la coordinación entre los niveles de atención de salud.

source: There are a variety of instruments and indicators to assess continuity of care; however there is a lack of those that describe the result of coordination between the health care levels.
hypothesis: Hay una variedad de instrumentos e indicadores para evaluar la continuidad de la atención; sin embargo faltan aquellos que describen el resultado de la coordinación entre los niveles de atención de salud.

source: Two indicators were analyzed: the outcome of the reference to general surgery, categorized as resolved, withdrawal and not resolved; and the time of solution of the surgical problem, which measures the median in calendar days from the issuance of the reference to the counter-reference for the reason of original sending.
hypothesis: Se analizaron dos indicadores: el resultado de la referencia a cirugía general, categorizado como resuelto, retiro y no resuelto; y el tiempo de solución del problema quirúrgico, que mide la mediana en días naturales desde la emisión de la referencia hasta la contrarreferencia por motivo de envío original.

source: The indicators were compared by characteristics of the patient and the first level physician.
hypothesis: Los indicadores fueron comparados por las características del paciente y del médico de primer nivel.

source: The overall solution time of the surgical problem in the medical unit is within the range built with previous studies, but in specific diagnoses there are significant variations.
hypothesis: El tiempo total de solución del problema quirúrgico en la unidad médica está dentro del rango establecido con estudios previos, pero en los diagnósticos específicos existen variaciones significativas.

source: The frequency of solution of the surgical problem was high for diagnoses of greater risk.
